analyzed: atha dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ
adhikaraṇam a pā
śabda antare karma bhedaḥ kṛta anubandha tvāt
bhāvanā bheda phalībhūta apūrva bheda upayogi bhāva artha adhikaraṇa rūpa upodghāta prasakta anuprasakta ādau samāpte dhunā śabda antarāt bhedaḥ bhidhīyate
jyotiṣṭoma prakaraṇa sthānām
somena yajeta
hiraṇyam ātreyāya dadāti
dākṣiṇāni juhoti ityādīnām vibhinna dhātvarthānām bhāvanā bheda bodhaka tvam asti na vā iti
cintāyām jyotiṣṭomena svarga kāmaḥ yajeta iti anena svarga karmaka bhāvanā mātre lāghavāt vihite
tad anuvādena soma ādi vākyaiḥ soma ādi viśiṣṭa yāga ādi vidhānāt sarveṣām ca utpanna śiṣṭa tvena
guṇa nyāya abhāvāt na bhāvanā bhedaḥ
na ca aneka dhātvarthānām eka jātīya yatna janya tva asaṃbhavaḥ
bādhaka abhāvāt
na ca prakṛti artha anvita sva artha abhidhāyaka tvāt pratyayānām phala vākya sthena ākhyātena dhātvartha anavacchinna śuddha bhāvanā vidhāna anupapattiḥ
ākhyātena dhātvartha avacchinna bhāvanā abhidhāne tad aṃśe vidhi vyāpāra abhāvāt
ataeva guṇa phala saṃbandha sthale dhātvartha anuvāde pi bhāvanā mātra vidhānam
atas eva ca phala vākye yajiḥ prakṛta sarva dhātvartha upalakṣaṇam
jyotiṣṭoma padam ca chatri nyāyena sarvanāmadheyam iti prāpte kārya mātra vṛtti dharmasya
vijātīya yāga tva ādeḥ kiñcid prati kāryatā avacchedaka tva āvaśyaka tvena tad avacchinnam prati
upasthitasya yatnasya eva vaijātya parikalpanayā vijātīya yatna tvena eva kāraṇa tvam
atas ca prati dhātvartha vaijātyāt bhāvanā vaijātya siddhiḥ
vibhinna dhātvarthaka tvam eva ca śabda antara tvam

original: ataeva “tistra āhutīrjuhotī” tyatra saṃkhyayā homabhede siddhe śabdāntarādevoktavidhādbhāvanābhedaḥ natu mūloktāditi dhyeyam /
analyzed: ataeva tistraḥ āhutīḥ juhoti iti atra saṃkhyayā homa bhede siddhe śabda antarāt eva ukta vidhāt bhāvanā bhedaḥ na tu mūla uktāt iti dhyeyam
kiñca prāpta bhāvanā anuvādena soma yāga ādi aneka vidhāne vākya bheda āpatteḥ tad tad guṇa dhātvartha ubhaya viśiṣṭa bhāvanā vidhānam eva tad tad vākye aṅgīkartavyam

original: tatraca cāturthikanyāyena jyotiṣṭomapadābhidheyasya somayāgasyaiva svargavākyena phalasaṃbandho 'nyeṣāntu tadaṅgatvam /
analyzed: tatra ca cāturthika nyāyena jyotiṣṭoma pada abhidheyasya soma yāgasya eva svarga vākyena phala saṃbandhaḥ nyeṣām tu tad aṅga tvam

original: naca -------- svargavākya eva yāgabhāvanotpattipūrvakaṃ phalasaṃbandhaḥ somavākyenaca somamātravidhānamiti -------- vācyam;
analyzed: naca svarga vākye eva yāga bhāvanā utpatti pūrvakam phala saṃbandhaḥ soma vākyena ca soma mātra vidhānam iti vācyam
svarga vākye rājasūya nyāyena iṣṭi paśu yāgānām eva phala saṃbandha āpattau yāga antara vidhāne pramāṇa abhāvāt
tatas ca paśu ādi avaruddhe soma vidhi anupapatteḥ soma vākye karma antara vidhi avaśyaṃbhāvaḥ
prayojanam soma yāga mātra prādhānyam
iti prathamam śabda antara adhikaraṇam
adhyāya artha bhāvanā bheda nirūpaṇasya iha pāde vasara saṃgatiḥ
śabda antara pramāṇasya eva prathamatas nirūpaṇe nimittam
eka prakaraṇa gata śabda antarasya atra udāharaṇa tvam
adhyāya artha bhūta bhāvanā bheda nirūpaṇasya iha pāde kartavyasya avasasara saṅgatim darśayati bhāvanā bheda iti
bhāva artha adhikaraṇa rūpa upodghātaḥ stuta śāstra adhikaraṇa antaḥ
tad prasaktam mantra gata ākhyātā vidhāyaka tva nirūpaṇam tad anuprasaktam mantra traividhya cāturvidhya nirasanam ādi pada upāttam tad anuprasaktam yajuḥ parimāṇa nirūpaṇa ādikam
tasmin samāpte avasara lābhāt mukhyaḥ dhyāya artha rūpaḥ bhāvanā bhedaḥ nirūpyate
tatra śabda antarasya pramāṇa antara gamya aparyāya bhūta dhātu bheda rūpa tvena dhātvartha bheda dvārā
bhāvanā bhedaka tvasya spaṣṭa tvāt bhāvārtha adhikaraṇa uktasya dhātvartha bheda anuniṣpādya apūrva bhedasya
dhātvartha bhede pi apūrva hetu bhūta bhāvanā bheda abhāvena ākṣipya samādhāna artha tvāt ca śabda antara pramāṇasya
prathamatas nirūpaṇam
atas eva prakaraṇa antara atirikta śabda antara ādi pramāṇaka bheda nirūpaṇasya pādārtha tvam iti bhāvaḥ
prakaraṇa antara gata śabda antare ca viparivṛttyā eva bhāvanā bhedasya siddha tvāt śabda antarasya

original: tatra vyāpārāsaṃbhavāt ekaprayogavidhiparigṛhīteṣu tadvyāpāraṃ sūcayan udāharaṇapūrvakaṃ
analyzed: tatra vyāpāra asaṃbhavāt eka prayoga vidhi parigṛhīteṣu tad vyāpāram sūcayan udāharaṇa pūrvakam
saṃdeham āha jyotiṣṭoma iti ādi padena stauti śaṃsati ādīnām saṃgrahaḥ
ekasya yatnasya aneka dhātvartha janya tva upapattiḥ
guṇa nyāya abhāvāt iti
yadi api bhāvanā vācaka ti pratyaya abhyāsāt bhedaḥ saṃbhāvyate
tathā api tasya dhātvartha vidhāna artham anuvādaka tva abhyupagamena ananya paratva abhāvāt akiñcitkaratvam iti asya api upalakṣaṇam etat
bādhaka abhāvāt iti
samūha ālambana jñāne ekasmin aneka viṣayatā vat eka yatna tvena aneka avacchedaka tvena janya tva svīkāre bādhaka abhāvāt iti arthaḥ
tad tad phala vākya vihita bhāvanā viṣaya tvam tad tad prakṛti arthasya eva iti yāga dāna ādi prakṛti artha bhedāt bhāvanā bhedaḥ iti siddhānta upakramaḥ
bhāvanā tāvat kṛti rūpā sa viṣayā iti nirvivādam
tad viṣaya tvañca na jñāna ādi viṣaya tva ādi vat siddha padārtha vṛtti
apitu sādhya mātra vṛtti tvāt janya tva apara paryāyam eva

original: ataśca phalavākyavihitāyā bhāvanāyā viṣayāpekṣāyāṃ prakṛtyupātto yajireva viṣayo na dānādiḥ,
analyzed: atas ca phala vākya vihitāyāḥ bhāvanāyāḥ viṣaya apekṣāyām prakṛti upāttaḥ yajiḥ eva viṣayaḥ na dāna ādiḥ
prakṛti an upātta tvāt
upalakṣaṇa tve māna abhāvāt ca
tatra ca pada śruti anvita yāga rūpa viṣaya avarodhe vākya antara upātta dāna homa ādīnām viṣaya tayā anvaya anupapatteḥ yāgasya eva

original: tattve kāryatāvacchedakasya yāgatvāderbhedāt kāraṇabhūtāyāṃ kṛtāvapi vaijātyakalpanasyāvaśyakatvāt
analyzed: tattve kārya tā avacchedakasya yāga tva ādeḥ bhedāt kāraṇa bhūtāyām kṛtau api vaijātya kalpanasya āvaśyaka tvāt
dāna ādi kṛtitaḥ yāga ādi kṛtau bhede tad tad vākyeṣu tad tad dhātvartha anurakta bhinna bhinna bhāvanā abhidhānam āvaśyakam

original: evaṃ satyapi yadi prākaraṇikasakaladhātvarthavṛttivyāpakadharmasāmānyameva kāryatāvacchedakatayā kenacitpadenopāttaṃ syāt,
analyzed: evam sati api yadi prākaraṇika sakala dhātvartha vṛtti vyāpaka dharma sāmānyam eva kārya tā avacchedaka tayā kenacid padena upāttam syāt
tatas bhavet kārya tā avacchedaka aikyena kāraṇībhūta bhāvanā aikyam
na ca iha tat asti
soma ādi vākyaiḥ yāga tva ādinā eva tad tad dhātvartha upasthiteḥ
atas ca tad tad kāryatā avacchedaka vāci tad tad dhātu pada pratipādya dhātvartha bhede sati tad bheda nibandhana aneka apūrva kalpanā api
prāmāṇika tvāt na duṣyati iti abhipretya siddhāntam āha kārya mātra iti
vijātīya yatna tvena yāga ādi kāraṇatā samarthanam
naca tad tad kāryatā avacchedaka avacchinna phala tvena eva kāraṇatā
na tu vijātīya yatna tvena
homa utpatti daśāyām yāga utpatti prasaktiḥ tu vijātīya adṛṣṭa rūpa sāmagrī abhāvāt iti vācyam

original: adṛṣṭagatavaijātyakalpanāpekṣayopasthitayatna eva vaijātyakalpanāyā yuktatvāt ityāśaṅkānirāsaḥ upasthitasyetyanena sūcitaḥ //
analyzed: adṛṣṭa gata vaijātya kalpanā apekṣayā upasthita yatnaḥ eva vaijātya kalpanāyāḥ yukta tvāt iti āśaṅkā nirāsaḥ upasthitasya iti anena sūcitaḥ
atra ca prācīnaiḥ aparyāya dhātu pada bheda rūpāt śabda antarāt bhāvanā bhedaḥ uktaḥ
tādṛśasya śabda antara tve nupapattim darśayan śabda antara lakṣaṇam āha vibhinna dhātvartha tvam eva iti
tena vibhinna dhātvartha tva rūpa śabda antareṇa kārya tā avacchedaka bheda jñāpana dvārā bhāvanā bhedaḥ iti arthaḥ
tat tu guṇa nyāya saṃkīrṇam evā iti vakṣyate
na tu iti

original: ekenaiva juhotinā trayāṇāṃ homānāmupādānāt dhātupadabhedābhāvāt tadabhāvaprasaṅga ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: ekena eva juhotinā trayāṇām homānām upādānāt dhātu pada bheda abhāvāt tad abhāva prasaṅgaḥ iti arthaḥ
homa yāga ādi aneka iti
soma ādi vākye guṇāt api bheda siddheḥ abheda pūrvapakṣa anupayukta tvāt dākṣiṇāni iti asya eva etat udāharaṇa tvam iti nirūpaṇam
ādi padena hiraṇya vākye hiraṇyātreya dāna aneka guṇa vidhāna saṃgrahaḥ
anena ca etādṛśa udāharaṇeṣu vākya bheda āpādaka guṇāt api bhedasya eva prāpteḥ abheda pūrvapakṣa anupayukta tvam sūcitam
yat tu dākṣiṇāni juhoti iti

original: tattu dākṣiṇapadasya nāmadheyatvena homadhātvarthamātrasyaiva vidhānāt bhavatyevodāharaṇamityapi ------- draṣṭavyam //
analyzed: tat tu dākṣiṇa padasya nāmadheya tvena homa dhātvartha mātrasya eva vidhānāt bhavati eva udāharaṇam iti api draṣṭavyam
yaji saṅkocaka tvena jyotiṣṭomasya iṣṭi ādi aparatvam iti cāturthika nyāya svarūpa nirūpaṇam
cāturthika nyāyena iti
caturthe hi antye rājasūya pada vat jyotiṣṭoma padasya aprasiddha artha tvena yaji pada saṃkocaka tva anupapatteḥ
sarveṣām eva iṣṭi paśu yāgānām prākaraṇikānām phala saṃbandham pūrvapakṣayitvā etāni vāva

original: tāni jyotīṃṣi ya etasya stomā” iti vākyaśeṣāvagatajyotīrūpastomavattvayogena somayāgamātra
analyzed: tāni jyotīṃṣi ye etasya stomāḥ iti vākya śeṣa avagata jyotī rūpa stomavat tva yogena soma yāga mātra
eva nāmnaḥ prasiddha tvāt darśa pūrṇamāsa pada vat yaji saṃkocaka tva upapatteḥ tasya eva phala saṃbandhāt
prādhānyam anyeṣām aṅga tvam iti siddhāntitam
tena nyāyena iti arthaḥ
prāsaṅgikīm āśaṅkām nirākaroti na ca iti
jyotiṣṭomena svarga kāmaḥ iti phala vākyasya utpatti paratva nirāsaḥ
karma antara vidhi avaśyaṃbhāvaḥ iti

original: tathāca tatra agnīṣomīyādiyāgeṣu paśvādidravyāvarodhena somavākye karmāntarāvaśyakatve
analyzed: tathā ca tatra agnīṣomīya ādi yāgeṣu paśu ādi dravya avarodhena soma vākye karma antara āvaśyaka tve

original: tasyaiva jyotiṣṭomanāmatvena phalasaṃbandhopapattau phalavākye na tadutpattiparatvamapi
analyzed: tasya eva jyotiṣṭoma nāma tvena phala saṃbandha upapattau phala vākye na tad utpatti paratvam api
gaurava grastam kalpanīyam iti arthaḥ
cāturthikam eva prayojanam anusandhatte prayojanam iti
guṇāt bhedaḥ iti nyāyasya atra dvedhā pravṛttyā śabda antara pramāṇa nirūpaṇa āvaśyaka tā upapādanam

original: atraca phalavākye bhāvanāyāṃ yāgakaraṇatvāvaruddhe dhātvarthāntarāṇāṃ karaṇatvaniveśādyadyapi guṇādbhedo 'pi saṃbhāvyata iti na śabdāntararūpamānāntarapratipādanasya
analyzed: atra ca phala vākye bhāvanāyām yāga karaṇa tva avaruddhe dhātvartha antarāṇām karaṇa tva niveśāt yadi api saṃbhāvyate iti na śabda antara rūpa māna antara pratipādanasya
tathā api tad upanyāsasya pūrvapakṣi nirākaraṇa mātra artha tvam eva draṣṭavyam
guṇaḥ hi pūrva guṇa an anurakta rūpeṇa bhāvanā anuvāda asaṃbhavāt

original: dhātvarthānurakta- rūpeṇa tāṃ bodhayanna bhedaka ityetāvadiha vyutpādyam //
analyzed: dhātvartha anurakta rūpeṇa tām bodhayan na bhedakaḥ iti etāvat iha vyutpādyam
kiñca jyotiṣṭoma vākya vihita bhāvanā anurañjaka tvam sarveṣām dhātvarthānām iti pūrvapakṣe
phala vākya gata yajeḥ upalakṣaṇa tvena eka pada upādānāt karaṇa samuccayasya vaktavya tve pi
karaṇa bhedasya kartṛ vyāpāra bheda vyāpya tvena bhāvanā bhedasya āvaśyaka tvāt yaḥ bhāvanā bhedaḥ prasajyeta
sa na guṇa nyāyāt saṃbhavati

original: teṣāṃ karaṇānāṃ yugapadanvayena kena nairākāṅkṣyamityatra niyāmakābhāvāt /
analyzed: teṣām karaṇānām yugapad anvayena kena nairākāṅkṣyam iti atra niyāmaka abhāvāt

original: atastatra tattatkaraṇabhedādhīnasya bhāvanābhedasya śabdāntarapramāṇakatvāt tannirūpaṇaṃ na niṣprayojanam //
analyzed: atas tatra tad tad karaṇa bheda adhīnasya bhāvanā bhedasya śabda antara pramāṇaka tvāt tad nirūpaṇam na niṣprayojanam
aviparivṛttau eva śabda antarasya bhedaka tvam iti nirūpaṇam
idam ca śabda antaram aviparivṛttau eva bhedakam
na tu viparivṛttau api

original: ata eva ---------caturavattaṃ juhotītyatra satyapi śabdāntare juhotyaṃśabhūtayāgabhāvanāyā viparivṛttatvānna bhedaḥ,
analyzed: atas eva catur avattam juhoti iti atra sati api śabda antare juhoti aṃśa bhūta yāga bhāvanāyāḥ viparivṛtta tvāt na bhedaḥ
apitu prakṣepa bhāvanāyāḥ eva iti draṣṭavyam
iti prathamam śabda antara adhikaraṇam
a pā
darśa pūrṇamāsa prakaraṇa sthe
samidhaḥ yajati

original: ” “tanūnapātaṃ yajati” “iḍo yajati” “barhiryajati” “svāhākāraṃ yajati” ityādau yāgasyāpi pratyabhijñāyamānatvenābhedānna bhāvanābhedaḥ,
analyzed: tanūnapātam yajati iḍaḥ yajati barhiḥ yajati svāhākāram yajati ityādau yāgasya api pratyabhijñāyamāna tvena abhedāt na bhāvanā bhedaḥ
na ca abhyāsāt bhedaḥ
abhyāsasya eka tva sādhaka tvena viruddha tvāt
na ca vidhi punar śravaṇa rūpasya abhyāsasya vidheya yāga ādi bhedaka tvam
dadhnā juhoti iti vat vidheḥ devatā rūpa guṇa saṃkrānta śaktika tvena yāga viṣayatva abhāvāt
na ca yāga utpatti vākya stha guṇa avarodhāt na utpanna vākyena guṇa vidhiḥ
agatyā prāthamika vākya stha samidh padasya tad prakhya nyāyena nāmadheya tva aṅgīkārāt
vastutas tu yadi yājyā mantra varṇāt samidh prāptiḥ
tadā sā tanūnapāda ādīnām api a viśiṣṭā

original: ata upāṃśuyājānuvādena vidvadvākyavihitakarmānuvādena vā pañcasvapi devatāvidhiḥ /
analyzed: atas upāṃśuyāja anuvādena vidvat vākya vihita karma anuvādena vā pañcasu api devatā vidhiḥ
na ca saṃbhavat prāptika tā
yājyā mantra varṇa vat anumantraṇa mantrebhyaḥ pi vikalpena vasanta ādi devatā prāpti saṃbhavena eteṣām niyama vidhi tva upapatteḥ
atas ca ananya para punaḥśravaṇa abhāvāt na karma bhedaḥ iti prāpte ubhaya ākāṅkṣā bala labhya yājyā mantrāṇām eva
devatā kalpaka tvasya puraḥsphūrtika tvena anyatara ākāṅkṣa bala labhya anumantraṇa mantrebhyaḥ
devatā kalpanā anupapatteḥ na samidh ādi padānām devatā niyāmaka tvam
atas ca upapadārthasya saṃbhavat prāptika tvāt pada śruti ādinā vidheḥ dhātvartha bhāvanā viṣaya tva pratīteḥ vihita vidhāna ayogāt vidheya tā avacchedaka tayā
na ca evam tad prakhya nyāyena samidh ādi padānām nāmadheya tvāt saṃjñayā eva
tad prakhya nyāyena guṇa vidhi tva nirākaraṇe nāmadheya kṛtyasya ekena eva ekasmin karmaṇi
siddheḥ anekeṣām nāmadheyānām vaiyarthya prasaṅgena samidh ādi padānām guṇa anuvādaka tvena eva upapatteḥ nāma tva anirṇayāt

original: siddhe tu abhyāsena karmabhede ekaikasya karmaṇa ekaikaṃ nāmadheyaṃ sārthakamiti nāmatvanirṇayaḥ /
analyzed: siddhe tu abhyāsena karma bhede ekaikasya karmaṇaḥ ekaikam nāmadheyam sārthakam iti nāma tva nirṇayaḥ
prayojanam uttara adhikaraṇa prayojanam
prayojana antarāṇi kaustubhe spaṣṭāni
iti dvitīyam abhyāsa adhikaraṇam
yadi api saṃjñāyāḥ śabda rūpa tvena śabda antara sādṛśyāt anantara vicārya tvam prāptam
tathā api saṃjñāyāḥ dhātvartha mātra viṣaya tvena tad mātra bhedaka tvāt śabda antarasya pramāṇa antara gamya spaṣṭa bheda dhātvartha vāci tvena
dhātvartha bhedaka tva abhāvāt tad dvārā bhāvanā bhedaka tvāt saṃjñātaḥ vailakṣaṇyam
abhyāsasya tu punar vidhāna ātmaka tvāt vidheḥ ca dhātvartha anurakta bhāvanā viṣaya tvena ubhaya bhedaka tvāt
bhāvanā bhedaka tva aṃśena sāmyāt ghātu bhede dhātvartha bhedāt bhāvanā bhedaḥ dhātvartha abhede
tad artha abhedāt bhāvanāyāḥ api abhedaḥ iti ca pratyudāharaṇa pūrvapakṣa saukaryāt anantara saṃgatiḥ
prācīnaiḥ asya darśitā
vastutas tu abhyāsasya api saṃjñā saṅkhyā ādi vat dhātvartha bheda mātre eva vyāpāra upapattau artha antara para dhātu uccāraṇa rūpa śabda antara siddha bhāvanā bhede
pi tad kalpane prayojana abhāvāt na bhāvanā bhedaka tva sāmyam
kintu dhātu bhede tad artha bhedāt yuktaḥ bhāvanā bhedaḥ
prakṛte tu dhātoḥ api eka tvena artha bheda abhāve phalībhūta bhāvanā bhede pramāṇa abhāvena pūrvapakṣa utthānena
bhāvanā bheda sidhi artha tayā pratyudāharaṇa saṅgatim spaṣṭa tvāt an abhidhāya viṣaya pradarśana pūrvakam
pūrvapakṣam eva āha darśa pūrṇamāsa iti

original: (tanūnapātaṃ yajatītyādīnāṃ dadhnā juhotītivat samidho yajatīti vākyavihitayāge guṇasamarpakatvena pūrvapakṣaḥ)
analyzed: tanūnapātam yajati ityādīnām dadhnā juhoti iti vat samidhaḥ yajati iti vākya vihita yāge guṇa samarpaka tvena pūrvapakṣaḥ

original: tanūnapātaṃ yajatītyādīnāṃ tanūnapātādidevatāvidhāyakatvena pūrvapakṣakaraṇāt tāsāṃ prakṛtayāge niveśasaṃbhavopapādanārthaṃ prakaraṇastha ityuktam  #

original: yasyaiva prāptistasyaivānuvādatvaṃ svīkṛtyetaratra vidhiḥ saṃkrāmatīti dadhnā juhotītyatra

dadhnā iti

original: nanu viṣṇuṃ yajatītivat dvitīyāntānāṃ tanūnapātādipadānāṃ devatāparatvāṅgīkāreṇa
analyzed: nanu viṣṇum yajati iti vat dvitīyā antānām tanūnapāta ādi padānām devatā paratva aṅgīkāreṇa

original: yāgānuvādena tadvidhisvīkāre 'pi yato yāgaprāptistatra vākye devatāntarasyāpi vidhānāttadavarodhe
analyzed: yāga anuvādena tad vidhi svīkāre yatas yāga prāptiḥ tatra vākye devatā antarasya api vidhānāt tad avarodhe

karma vidhāna uttaram guṇa vidhi pravṛtteḥ anyatra dṛṣṭa tvāt iha api kvacid karma vidhāne āśrayaṇīye
prāthamyasya niyāmaka tvena vinigamana aviraha anāpatteḥ samidh vākya sthasya eva samidh padasya

atas upāṃśuyāja iti

original: “samidhassamidho 'gra ājyasya viyantu tanūnapādagna ājyasya vetvi” tyādiyājyāmantrāṇāmupāṃśuyājādikame
analyzed: samidhaḥ samidhaḥ gre ājyasya viyantu tanūnapāt agne ājyasya vetu ityādi yājyā mantrāṇām upāṃśuyāja ādi kame
pāṭha abhāvena aṅga tve pramāṇa abhāvāt tad kalpya devatā vidhi asaṃbhavāt etat pratyakṣa vidhi prāpta sadit ādi devatā prakāśaka tvena eva
tad tad yāga aṅga tva avasāyāt na saṃbhavatprāptikatā iti uttare vidyamāne vibhavāt uttara antareṇa
pariharati yājyā mantra varṇa vat iti

original: ananyaparavidhipunaḥ śravaṇarūpābhyāsasya dadhnā juhotītyādāvivābhāvānna karmabheda ityupasaṃharati ----------- ataśceti //
analyzed: ananya para vidhi punar śravaṇa rūpa abhyāsasya dadhnā juhoti ityādau iva abhāvāt na karma bhedaḥ iti upasaṃharati atas ca iti
upapadārthasya saṃbhavat prāptika tvāt vihita vidhāna ayogena abhyāsena bheda siddhiḥ iti siddhāntaḥ
saṃbhavat prāptika tvāt iti
saṃbhavat prāptika tvena nāmadheya tva saṃbhave na pada śruti avagata dhātvartha anurakta bhāvanā viṣaya tvam durbala pratyabhijñā balena āśrayitum yuktam

original: kintu sati saṃbhave prathamavidhiprakārāśrayaṇamiti tadanurodhena nānāpūrvabhedakalpanākṛtaṃ gauravamapi prāmāṇikatvānna doṣāvahamityarthaḥ
analyzed: kintu sati saṃbhave prathama vidhi prakāra āśrayaṇam iti tad anurodhena nānā pūrva bheda kalpanā kṛtam gauravam api prāmāṇika tvāt na doṣa āvaham iti arthaḥ
abhyāsasya saṃjñā adhīna siddhika tva sthale saṃjñāyāḥ bhedaka tve pi prakṛte neka nāmadheya vaiyarthyena
tanūnapāta ādi vākyānām anuvādaka tva āpattyā na saṃjñā adhīna siddhika tvam abhyāsasya ityādi nirūpaṇam
tad prakhya nyāyena iti
yatra ākhyāta sāmānādhikaraṇya abhāvena yāga viśeṣa anavagamāt adhikāra artha atha śabdāḥ nvayena anirdhārita kriyā viśeṣa saṃjñā tva niścayena eva
vidhi ākhyāta kalpanam yathā atha eṣa jyotiḥ ityādau
tatra abhyāsasya saṃjñā adhīna siddhika tvena saṃjñayā eva bhedaḥ

original: yatra vodbhidā yajetetyādau saṃjñābhāve prakṛtasyaiva yāgasya phalasaṃbandho vākyādāśritaḥ śakyate punarvidhinā vidhātum,
analyzed: yatra vā udbhidā yajeta ityādau saṃjñā abhāve prakṛtasya eva yāgasya phala saṃbandhaḥ vākyāt āśritaḥ śakyate punar vidhinā vidhātum
tatra ananya paratva abhāvena abhyāsasya bhedaka tva asaṃbhavāt saṃjñāyāḥ eva bhedaka tvam
yatra tu abhyāsa svarūpasya na saṃjñā adhīna siddhika tvam
yathā prakṛte saṃjñāyāḥ tad prakhya nyāya siddha tvena na abhyāsa gamya yāga vidhi adhīna tvam

original: pratyuta saṃjñātvābhāve guṇaparatvenānyaparatva- prasaktyābhyāsasyaiva tadadhīnatvāt saṃjñayaiva śakyate bhedaḥ sādhayitum;
analyzed: pratyuta saṃjñā tva abhāve guṇa paratvena anya paratva prasaktyā abhyāsasya eva tad adhīna tvāt saṃjñayā eva śakyate bhedaḥ sādhayitum
tathā api ekasya karmaṇaḥ eka nāmadheyena avaccheda upapattau tanūnapāta ādi saṃjñānām vaiyarthyāt
tad tad devatā anuvāda tvasya eva āpattau saṃjñā niścayena bhedaka tva anupapatteḥ abhyāsena karma bheda
eva tad upayogi tvena saṃjñā tva niścayāt abhyāsasya eva bhedaka tvam iti bhāvaḥ
bhedaḥ pi ca vyakti bheda vat vidheya bhede vidheya tā avacchedaka bhedasya āvaśyaka tvāt samidh yāga tva ādi vyāpya jātīnām api iti
yāga tva ādi vyāpya samidh yāga tva tanūnapāt yāga tva ādi jātīḥ tad tad vākya stha yajinā lakṣayitvā

original: tadavacchinnayāgavyaktayastatta- dvākyaiḥ vidhīyante ityādi kaustubhe draṣṭavyam //
analyzed: tad avacchinna yāga vyaktayaḥ tad tad vākyaiḥ vidhīyante ityādi kaustubhe draṣṭavyam
uttara adhikaraṇa prayojanam eva etad adhikaraṇa prayojanam iti nirūpaṇam
uttara adhikaraṇa iti
upāṃśuyāje devatā vidhi pakṣe viṣṇuḥ upāṃśu yaṣṭavyaḥ iti evamādīnām anuvāda tvena arthavāda tva asaṃbhavāt
paurṇamāsī vat upāṃśuyājaḥ syāt iti vakṣyamāṇa adhikaraṇe pūrvapakṣi ukta tad tad vidhi tva siddhiḥ
siddhānte tu na tat

original: evaṃ vidvadvākyavihitakarmaṇi devatāvidhipakṣe tatra rūpalābhena vidhitvasyaivāpattau samudāyānuvādāsaṃbhavāt tadadhikaraṇagatapūrvapakṣyuktaprayojanasiddhiḥ,
analyzed: evam vidvat vākya vihita karmaṇi devatā vidhi pakṣe tatra rūpa lābhena vidhi tvasya eva āpattau samudāya anuvāda asaṃbhavāt tad adhikaraṇa gata pūrvapakṣi ukta prayojana siddhiḥ
siddhānte tu tatratya siddhānta prayojana siddhiḥ iti uttara adhikaraṇa prayojanam iti athraḥ
prayojana antarāṇi iti

original: jyotiṣṭome grahaṇānvayitvena śrutānāṃ devatānāṃ prakaraṇena grahaṇadvārā yāgānvayāt
analyzed: jyotiṣṭome grahaṇa anvayi tvena śrutānām devatānām prakaraṇena grahaṇa dvārā yāga anvayāt

original: prakaraṇasya ca yugapat sarvāṅgagrāhitvāt samuccayāvagateḥ pratyekañca grahaṇānvayāt
analyzed: prakaraṇasya ca yugapad sarva aṅga grāhi tvāt samuccaya avagateḥ pratyekam ca grahaṇa anvayāt
saṃhatānām yāga anvaya ayogāt yāga abhyāsena samuccaya avagatau api abhyāse pramāṇa abhāvena
devatā vidhi pūrvapakṣe tāsām dṛṣṭārtha tvena vikalpāt sakṛt eva anuṣṭhānam

original: siddhānte tu pañcānāṃ prayājānāṃ adṛṣṭārthatvādanuṣṭhānamiti prayojanāntaraṃ kaustubhe draṣṭavyamityarthaḥ //
analyzed: siddhānte tu pañcānām prayājānām adṛṣṭa artha tvāt anuṣṭhānam iti prayojana antaram kaustubhe draṣṭavyam iti arthaḥ

original: anyānitu pūrvapakṣaprakārabhedena kathitānyapīha teṣāmanuktatvānnopayuktānīti na mayā pratipādyante //
analyzed: anyāni tu pūrvapakṣa prakāra bhedena kathitāni api iha teṣām anukta tvāt na upayuktāni iti na mayā pratipādyante
iti dvitīyam abhyāsa adhikaraṇam
ro-0 adhikaraṇam
prakaraṇam tu paurṇamāsyām rūpa avacanāt

original: tatratya eva “ya evaṃ vidvānpaurṇamāsīṃ yajate sa yāvadukthyenopāpnoti tāvadupāpnoti ya evaṃ vidvānamāvāsyāṃ yajate sa yāvadatirātreṇe” tyādivākye  #
analyzed: tatratyaḥ eva yaḥ evam vidvān paurṇamāsīm yajate sa yāvat ukthyena upāpnoti tāvat upāpnoti yaḥ evam vidvān amāvāsyām yajate sa yāvat atirātreṇa ityādi vākye
pi abhyāsāt karma bhedaḥ
na ca ayam laṭ
leṭ tve pi vā yad śabdena vidhi pratibandhāt vidhi punar śruti abhāvaḥ

atas eva paurṇamāsī amāvāsyā padam api nāmadheyam
paurṇamāsyām paurṇamāsyā iti vākya dvayena etad vākya vihita karmaṇoḥ eva kāla vidhānāt
na ca rūpa abhāvaḥ
vārtraghnī paurṇamāsyām anūcyete vṛdhanvatī amāvāsyāyām iti vacanena ājyabhāga krama āpnātānām api

original: ṛcāṃ kramaṃ bādhitvā etadvākyavihitakarmāṅgatvena vidhānāt māntravarṇikāgnisomadevatāyāḥ
analyzed: ṛcām kramam bādhitvā etad vākya vihita karma aṅga tvena vidhānāt māntravarṇika agni soma devatāyāḥ

original: “sarvasmai vā etadyajñāya gṛhyate yadddhuvāyāmājya” mitivacanena ca dravyasya prāptatvāt /
analyzed: sarvasmai vai etat yajñāya gṛhyate yat huvāyām ājyam iti vacanena ca dravyasya prāpta tvāt
athavā āgneya ādi vākyaiḥ eva paurṇamāsī amāvāsyā ādi pada upasthāpita etad vākya vihita karma anuvādena dravya devatā vidhānāt rūpa lābha upapattiḥ
na ca aneka vidhānāt vākya bhedaḥ
taddhitena devatā viśiṣṭa dravya vācinā paraspara anvayasya vyutpanna tvena viśiṣṭa vidhi upapatteḥ
prakāra antareṇa rūpa lābhaḥ tu kaustubhe eva draṣṭavyaḥ
sarvathā vidvat vākye karma antara vidhiḥ

original: evaṃ ca “darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ svargakāmo yajete“ti phalavākyena prayājādisādhāraṇyena
analyzed: evam ca darśa pūrṇamāsābhyām svarga kāmaḥ yajeta iti phala vākyena prayāja ādi sādhāraṇyena
sarveṣām āgneya ādīnām etad vākya vihita karmaṇoḥ ca prathama pakṣe phala saṃbandhaḥ dvitīye
tu tad sādhāraṇyena tayoḥ eva
darśa pūrṇamāsa prātipadikasya kāla yogiṣu prasiddha tve pi dvivacanasya a prasiddha tvāt
ājyabhāga ādiṣu tasya prasiddha tve pi prātipadikasya aprasiddheḥ

original: ato rājasūyanyāyena nāmnaḥ saṅkocakatvānupapatteḥ prakaraṇātsarveṣāmeva yāgānāṃ phalasaṃbandhaḥ /
analyzed: atas rājasūya nyāyena nāmnaḥ saṅkocaka tva anupapatteḥ prakaraṇāt sarveṣām eva yāgānām phala saṃbandhaḥ

original: pāśādhikaraṇanyāyena dvivacanasyāprasiddhatve 'pi prātipadikamātraprasiddhyā kālayogināmeva vā anayoreva vā dvitvasyāpi kathañcidupapatteḥ
analyzed: pāśa adhikaraṇa nyāyena dvivacanasya aprasiddha tve pi prātipadika mātra prasiddhyā kāla yoginām eva vā anayoḥ eva vā dvi tvasya api kathañcid upapatteḥ
na tu ṣaṇṇām eva āgneya ādīnām iti prāpte liṅga kramābhyām ājyabhāga aṅga tvena vārtraghnī vṛdhanvatī mantrāṇām

original: ataeva ca kāladvāreṇa karmadvāreṇa vā vyavasthāparameva taditi vakṣyate /
analyzed: ataeva ca kāla dvāreṇa karma dvāreṇa vā vyavasthā param eva tat iti vakṣyate
atas ca na tāvat anena devatā prāptiḥ
na api āgneya ādi vākyena
prāpta karma anuvādena aneka guṇa vidhāne vākya bhedāt
vidhi phalasya hi ajñāta jñāpanasya eka viṣaya tvam eva sarvatra kḷptam
tasya aneka viṣaya tve bādha prasaṅgaḥ
na ca viśiṣṭa vidhānāt a vākya bhedaḥ
viśiṣṭasya avyutpanna tvāt

original: uktaṃ hyetat --------- kārakatāsaṃbandhena yatra taddhitādivṛttirna tatra parasparānvayo 'pi tu yatrāśvābhidhānīmityādau tadatiriktasaṃbandhena  #
analyzed: uktam hi etat kārakatā saṃbandhena yatra taddhita ādi vṛttiḥ na tatra tu yatra aśva abhidhānīm ityādau tad atirikta saṃbandhena
vṛttiḥ tatra eva saḥ iti
atas ca prakṛte devatā tvasya saṃpradāna kāraka tvāt paraspara saṃbandha anupapatteḥ ubhaya viśiṣṭa karma antara vidhānam eva āvaśyakam
atas ca rūpa abhāvaḥ tad avasthaḥ eva
astu vā kathañcid rūpa lābhaḥ
tathā api na vidvat vākye karma vidhiḥ
yad śabdena vidhi śakti pratibandhena vidhi punaḥśravaṇasya eva abhāvāt
na ca tasya vedana kriyā mātra vidhi pratibandhaka tvam
yad śabda ādeḥ tad śabdau adhika pratibandhaka tvasya eva vyutpatti siddha tvāt
kiñca anya para tvāt api nā abhyāsa svarūpa siddhiḥ
tathā hi tatra vidvat vākya stha laṭ anta yajinā prakṛta tvāt āgneya ādayaḥ trayaḥ eva tad tad kāla yoginaḥ tad tad nāmadheya vaśāt anūdyante
tad prayojanam ca tantreṇa yajinā aneka upādānāt samudāya dvaya siddhiḥ

original: tasyā api prayojanaṃ phalavākye ṣaṇṇāmeva phalasaṃbandhasiddhiḥ;
analyzed: tasyāḥ api prayojanam phala vākye ṣaṇṇām eva phala saṃbandha siddhiḥ
prātipadikasya ṣaṭsu kāla yogena prasiddha tvāt
dvivacanasya ca sva śakya āśraya samudāya ghaṭaka samudāyi vṛtti tva saṃbandhena bahutva lakṣaṇa ārthatvāt
lakṣaṇā tātparya grāhakam eva ca śakya saṃbandha ghaṭaka samudāya siddhi dvārā vidvat vākya dvayam

original: anyathā hi vidvadvākyābhāve āgneyadvayasyaivaikavākyopādānāvagatadvitvayoginaḥ kāladvayayuktasya ca phalasaṃbandhāpattiḥ /
analyzed: anyathā hi vidvat vākya abhāve āgneya dvayasya eva eka vākya upādāna avagata dvi tva yoginaḥ kāla dvaya yuktasya ca phala saṃbandha āpattiḥ
yathā ca yat āgneyaḥ ṣṭākapālaḥ iti atra āgneya dvaya siddhiḥ tathā kaustubhe eva prapañcitam

original: ataḥ ṣaṇṇāṃ phalasaṃbandhasiddhirevoktavidhayā vidvadvākyaprayojanamityanyaparatvādapi na “vaiśvadevena yajete” tivadabhyāsasvarūpasiddhiḥ
analyzed: atas ṣaṇṇām phala saṃbandha siddhiḥ evā ukta vidhayā vidvat vākya prayojanam iti anya paratvāt api na vaiśvadevena yajeta i ti vat abhyāsa svarūpa siddhiḥ
na ca evam paurṇamāsyām paurṇamāsyā iti vākya dvaya vaiyarthya āpattiḥ

evam ca utpatti vākye kāla śravaṇam api vidvat vākya adhikāra vākya stha yaji pada saṅkoca artham eva iti

original: samudāyasiddhyarthaṃ samudāyināmanuvādakāvevaitau na karmāntaravidhiḥ ------- iti siddham // 3 //

vidhi punaḥśravaṇa rūpa abhyāsa svarūpa siddhi upayogi tayā tatra iti uktam
tatas ca āgneya ādi vākya gata yaji vidhi a pekṣayā asya punar śravaṇa tā sūcitā

original: evakāreṇa rūpābhāvarūpasiddhāntahetunirāsāya vakṣyamāṇarūpopapādanasyopāṃśu- yājādisādhāraṇyasūcanadvārā sulabhatā sūcitā /
analyzed: eva kāreṇa rūpa abhāva rūpa siddhānta hetu nirāsāya vakṣyamāṇa rūpa upapādanasya upāṃśu yāja ādi sādhāraṇya sūcana dvārā sulabha tā sūcitā

original: sa yāvadityasya prakṛtavicārānupayoge 'pi vidhitvābhāve tādṛśārthavādānupapattisūcanadvārā vidhitvodbalanārthamupanyāsaḥ /
analyzed: sa yāvat ityasya prakṛta vicāra anupayoge pi vidhi tva abhāve tādṛśa artha vāda anupapatti sūcana dvārā vidhi tva udbalana artham upanyāsaḥ
samidhaḥ yajati itivat iti
yathā tatra aprāptārtha tvena leṭ tva niścayaḥ tadvat iha api

original: evaṃ “sa yāva” dityādyarthavādo 'pi vidheyastutyarthatayā sārthako bhavatītyarthaḥ /
analyzed: evam sa yāvat ityādi arthavādaḥ api vidheya stuti artha tayā sārthakaḥ bhavati iti arthaḥ
atas eva iti

original: (paurṇamāsyāṃ paurṇamāsyeti vākyavaiyarthyānupapattyādibhirapi ya evaṃ vidvānityatra yāgavidhirityupapādanam)
analyzed: paurṇamāsyām paurṇamāsyā iti vākya vaiyarthya anupapatti ādibhiḥ api yaḥ evam vidvān iti atra yāga vidhiḥ iti upapādanam
yāga bhāvanā vidhi pratibandhaka tva abhāvena vidheya samarpaka yaji pada sāmānādhikaraṇyāt eva iti arthaḥ
kāla vidhānāt iti
na ca kāla vidhau sati nāmadheya tvam

original: nāmadheyatve ca sati tadanuvādena kālavidhiritītaretarāśrayāpattiriti -------- vācyam;
analyzed: nāmadheya tve ca sati tad anuvādena kāla vidhiḥ iti itaretarāśraya āpattiḥ iti vācyam

original: agnihotranyāyena pūrvaṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyena nāmadheyatve 'vadhārite paścāttadanuvādena vihitakālayogena pravṛttinimittāvadhāraṇopapatteḥ /
analyzed: agnihotra nyāyena pūrvam sāmānādhikaraṇyena nāmadheya tve vadhārite paścāt tad anuvādena vihita kāla yogena pravṛtti nimitta avadhāraṇa upapatteḥ
siddhānte tu āgneya ādīnām utpatti vihita kālaka tvena prayāja ādīnām pradhāna kālaka tvena eva tad tad kāla prāpteḥ etad vākya dvaya vaiyarthya āpattiḥ
teṣām yāgānām bahu tvāt
paurṇamāsīm amāvāsyām iti ekavacana anupapattyā tatra bahutva lakṣaṇa āpattiḥ ca prasajyeyātām
atas anayoḥ eva kāla vidhānāt paurṇamāsī amāvāsyā saṃjñaka karma dvaya vidhānam

original: dvitīyā cāgnihotraṃ juhotītyatrevārthākṣiptasādhyatvānuvādikā satī karaṇatvalakṣaṇārtheti yuktaṃ karmāntaratvamityarthaḥ // //
analyzed: dvitīyā ca agnihotram juhoti iti atra iva artha ākṣipta sādhyatva anuvādikā satī karaṇatva lakṣaṇa arthā iti yuktam karma antara tvam iti arthaḥ
vārtraghnī vṛdhanvatī mantra dvaya vicāraḥ
vārtraghnī iti
ājyabhāgayoḥ hi krame catastraḥ nuvākāḥ paṭhyante
āgneyī saumī āgneyī saumī ca iti

original: tatra “agnirvṛtrāṇi jaṅghanat” “tvaṃ somāsi satpatistvaṃ rājota vṛtrahā” itimantradvayaṃ vṛtrahananaprakāśakapadaghaṭitatvāt vārtraghnītyucyate
analyzed: tatra agniḥ vṛtrāṇi jaṅghanat tvam soma asi sat patiḥ tvam rājā uta vṛtra hā iti mantra dvayam vṛtra hanana prakāśaka pada ghaṭita tvāt vārtraghnī iti ucyate
agniḥ pratnena manmanā
śuṃbhānaḥ tanuvam svām
kaviḥ vipreṇa vāvṛdhe

original: “somagīrbhiṣṭvā vayam vardhayāmo vaco vidaḥ” iti mantradvayaṃ vṛddhiprakāśakapadaghaṭitatvāt vṛdhanvatītyucyate /
analyzed: soma gīrbhiḥ tvā vayam vardhayāmaḥ vacaḥ vidaḥ iti mantra dvayam vṛddhi prakāśaka pada ghaṭita tvāt vṛdhanvatī iti ucyate
eteṣām yāvat kramāt ājyabhāga aṅga tvam kalpyate
tāvat vārtraghnī vṛdhanvatī iti vākyena paurṇamāsī amāvāsyā saṃjñaka etad karma aṅga tvena viniyogāt krama bādhena eva etad karma aṅga tvāt māntravarṇika agnīṣoma
devatayoḥ ekaikatra lābhaḥ sulabhaḥ
na ca abādhena upapattau bādhā ayogāt ājyabhāgayoḥ eva krama prāpta mantrāṇām avyavasthā prāptau
vyavasthā mātra paratvasya tṛtīye vakṣyamāṇa tvāt na atra devatā kalpaka tvam iti vācyam

original: ājyabhāgayoḥ paurṇamāsyamāvāsyākālakatvasya vidhyabhāvena prakṛtau pratipadi tayoḥ
analyzed: ājyabhāgayoḥ paurṇamāsī amāvāsyā kālaka tvasya vidhi abhāvena prakṛtau pratipadi tayoḥ
kriyamāṇa tvāt tithi antara kriyamāṇa vikṛtiṣu tad anāpatteḥ ca kāla kṛta vyavasthā anupapatteḥ etad vākya gata paurṇamāsī amāvāsyā padābhyām
nāmadheya tvena vidvat vākya vihita karmaṇoḥ jhaṭiti upasthiteḥ tad aṅgatvasya eva yuktatvāt
anyathā paurṇamāsī amāvāsyā aṅga bhūta ājyabhāgayoḥ lakṣaṇa āpatteḥ

original: ataścopakramagataprātipadike lakṣaṇāpekṣayā tatra “jayān juhuyādi” tyatreva saptamyā
analyzed: atas ca upakrama gata prātipadike lakṣaṇa apekṣayā tatra jayān juhuyāt i tyatra iva saptamyā
eva prādhānye lakṣaṇām aṅgīkṛtya tad uddeśena eva mantra vidhānāt agnīṣoma devatā prakāśakayoḥ
vārtraghnī ṛcoḥ paurṇamāsī karma aṅga tvāt tādṛśyoḥ eva ca vṛdhanvatyoḥ amāvāsyā karma aṅga tvāt ekaikasmin
karmaṇi mantra dvayasya dṛṣṭārtha tvena vikalpāt devatā dvayasya api samuccayāt vidvat vākya vihita ekaika karmaṇaḥ
gnihotra vat āvṛttiḥ

original: devatālakṣaṇā yājyānuvākyā iti smaraṇāt samuccitayājyādvayamātraṃ kalpyam /
analyzed: devatā lakṣaṇāḥ yājyā anuvākyāḥ iti smaraṇāt samuccita yājyā dvaya mātram kalpyam

original: athavā ------- tayoreva mantrayorekasyānuvākyatvamekasya yājyātvamiti vārtikoktarītyā manotānyāyenobhayalakṣakatvamaṅkīkṛtya yājyāpi sulabhaiva
analyzed: athavā tayoḥ eva mantrayoḥ ekasya anuvākya tvam ekasya yājyā tvam iti vārtika ukta rītyā manotā nyāyena ubhaya lakṣaka tvam aṅkīkṛtya yājyā api sulabhā eva
na ca asmin pakṣe anuvākyā samākhyā bādhaḥ
praiṣa paścādbhāva mātreṇa api anuśabda upapatteḥ tad avirodhāt
ājyabhāgayoḥ tu agnīṣomābhyām ājyabhāgau yajati iti vacanena eva agnīṣomīya devatayoḥ vidhānāt tad anurūpa anuvākya mātra kalpanam
yājyā tu krama prāptā asti eva iti na kaścid doṣaḥ
evañca devatā lābhaḥ anayoḥ na asulabhaḥ iti bhāvaḥ
sarvasmai eva iti vākyasya prāpta ājya dhrauva tā mātra vidhi tvasya nirāsaḥ
alaṅkaraṇa ājya vyavartanena cāritārthyam
tena dravya lābhaḥ ca
sarvasmai eva iti

original: anena ca vacanena yajñāyeti tādarthyacaturthyā sarvayajñoddeśena dhrauvājyadravyasya vidhānādupāṃśuyāja ivehāpi dravyaprāptiḥ /
analyzed: anena ca vacanena yajñāya iti tādarthya caturthyā sarva yajña uddeśena dhrauva ājya dravyasya vidhānāt upāṃśuyāje iva iha api dravya prāptiḥ

original: naca ------- anena yatrājyaprāptistatra dhrauvatāmātravidhānādaprāptājyakayāgeṣu dravyavidhyasaṃbhavaḥ iti ------ vācyam;
analyzed: na ca anena yatra ājya prāptiḥ tatra dhrauva tā mātra vidhānāt aprāpta ājyaka yāgeṣu dravya vidhi asaṃbhavaḥ iti vācyam

original: yajñāṅgabhūtājyānuvāde viśiṣṭoddeśāpatterājyamātrānuvāde alaṅkaraṇārthājye 'pi tadāpatterdhrauvājyasyaiva yajñoddeśena vidhānasyāvaśyakatvāt
analyzed: yajña aṅga bhūta ājya anuvāde viśiṣṭa uddeśa āpatteḥ ājya mātra anuvāde alaṅkaraṇa artha ājye pi tad āpatteḥ dhrauva ājyasya eva yajña uddeśena vidhānasya āvaśyaka tvāt
na ca evam catuḥ dhruvāyām gṛhṇāti iti asaṃyukta utpattika ājyasya prayojana ākāṅkṣayā a nirdiṣṭa dravyaka yāgānām
dravya ākāṅkṣyā ca ubhaya ākāṅkṣayā eva yāga aṅga tva upapatteḥ etad vidhi vaiyarthyam iti vācyam
alaṅkaraṇa ādi artha ājya ādi vyāvṛttyā tad sārthakyāt
atas eva alaṅkaraṇa ādau sthālī ājyasya eva grahaṇam
atas tena vacanena ājya dravya prāptiḥ api iti arthaḥ
guṇaḥ tu śruti saṃyogāt
iti guṇa sūtra ukta prakāreṇa āgneya vākyena viśiṣṭa vidhānena a vākya bhedāt guṇa samarpaṇena pūrvapakṣaḥ

original: evamutsūtraṃ rūpalābhamutpādya guṇastu śrutisaṃyogāditi pūrvapakṣiṇaḥ punaḥpratyavasthānārthaṃ sūtram,
analyzed: evam utsūtram rūpa lābham utpādya guṇaḥ tu śruti saṃyogāt iti pūrvapakṣiṇaḥ punar pratyavasthāna artham sūtram
tad artham anurudhya rūpa prāptim upapādayati athavā iti
na ca uddeśya dvaya prayukte āgneya vākye vākya bhedaḥ
aśruta yāga kalpane viśiṣṭa vidhi gaurava parihāra artham ardham antarvedi iti vat pada dvaye lakṣaṇayā prakṛta pradhāna yāga tvena uddeśya tayā tad aprasakteḥ iti arthaḥ
juhṇāma aupabhṛtam iti asya upapattyā samidh ādi vākyaiḥ devatā samarpaṇam iti prakāra antara upapādanam
prakāra antareṇa
athavā vidvat vākya vihita karma anuvādena samidh ādi vākyeṣu pañcasu devatā vidhiḥ

original: tāsāṃ ca “atihāyeḍo barhiḥ pratisamānīyata” iti jñāpakabalāt samuccayaḥ /
analyzed: tāsām ca atihāya iḍaḥ barhiḥ pratisamānīyate iti jñāpaka balāt samuccayaḥ
na hi atra upāṃśuyāje devatā vidhi pakṣe viṣṇuḥ upāṃśu yaṣṭavyaḥ ityādi anuvāda anupapatti bādhaka vat iha kiñcid bādhakam asti

original: naca ------- atra barhirādipadānāṃ vidvadvākyavihitakarmāṅgadevatāparatve tatra dhrauvasya dravyatvāt juhvāmaupabhṛthamityasyānupapattirastyeveti  #
analyzed: na ca atra barhiḥ ādi padānām vidvat vākya vihita karma aṅga devatā paratve tatra dhrauvasya dravya tvāt juhvām aupabhṛtham iti asya anupapattiḥ asti eva iti
vācyam

original: asminnapi pakṣe “pañca prayājā ijyante yajjuhvāṃ gṛhṇāti prayājebhyastat” ityādijñāpakabalāt
analyzed: asmin api pakṣe pañca prayājāḥ ijyante yat juhvām gṛhṇāti prayājebhyaḥ tat ityādi jñāpaka balāt
pañca prayāja sattvena prayāja ādau aupabhṛthasya vidvat vākya vihita barhiḥ devatya karma abhyāsa kāle
juhvām ānayana bidhi upapattyā tad anupapatteḥ aprasarāt

original: (satyānyakālīnānāṃ bādhenāṅguṇanyāyena paurṇamasyāḥ kālabādhena pañcāhānuṣṭhāne 'pi doṣeṇa saumikadharmātideśena rūpalābha iti prakārāntarānusaraṇena
analyzed: satya anya kālīnānām bādhena aṅguṇa nyāyena paurṇamasyāḥ kāla bādhena pañca aha anuṣṭhāne doṣeṇa saumika dharma atideśena rūpa lābhaḥ iti prakāra antara anusaraṇena
athavā avyakta tvāt saumika dharma atideśāt rūpa lābhaḥ

original: naca tadatideśe pañcāhatvaprāptyā “paurṇamāsyāṃ paurṇamāsyā yajete“ti vākyadvayavihitakālabādhaprasaṅgaḥ;
analyzed: na ca tad atideśe pañcāha tva prāptyā paurṇamāsyām paurṇamāsyā yajeta iti vākya dvaya vihita kāla bādha prasaṅgaḥ
tad anurodhena sutyā anya kālīnānām bādhe sutyā kālīna anatideśe bādhaka abhāvāt

original: vastutastu ---------- ekasyāṃ paurṇamāsyāmamāvāsyāyāṃ vā vihitasyāpi sāṅgasomayāgasyāśakyatvāt
analyzed: vastutas tu ekasyām paurṇamāsyām amāvāsyāyām vā vihitasya api sa aṅga soma yāgasya aśakya tvāt
anuṣṭhāna asaṃbhavena dīkṣaṇīya ādi aṅgeṣu soma yāga kāla bādha vat iha api guṇa bhūta kāla anurodhena
pradhāna lopasya anyāyya tvāt paurṇamāsī ādi vācanika kāla bādhena api pañca aham anuṣṭhāne bādhaka abhāvāt

original: sutyānyakālīnāmaṅgānāmapi naiva lopa iti saumikadharmātideśena rūpalābhaḥ saṃbhavatyeveti
analyzed: sutyā anya kālīnām aṅgānām api nā eva lopaḥ iti saumika dharma atideśena rūpa lābhaḥ saṃbhavati eva iti
prakāra antareṇa rūpa lābhaḥ kaustubhe draṣṭavyaḥ iti arthaḥ
pūrvapakṣam upasaṃharati sarvathā iti
prathama pakṣe dvitīya pakṣe ca pūrvapakṣa prayojana nirūpaṇam
pūrvapakṣe prayojanam āha evam ca iti
prathama pakṣe iti

original: vārtraghnīvṛdhanvatīmantravarṇakalpyā devatā dhrauvaṃ cājyadravyamiti pakṣe āgneyādivākyānāmapi yāgavidhāyakatvāt tatsādhāraṇyena phalasaṃbandhaḥ,
analyzed: vārtraghnī vṛdhanvatī mantra varṇa kalpyāḥ devatāḥ dhrauvam ca ājya dravyam iti pakṣe āgneya ādi vākyānām api yāga vidhāyaka tvāt tad sādhāraṇyena phala saṃbandhaḥ

original: āgneyādivākyānāṃ dravyadevatāvidhāyakatvamiti dvitīye pakṣe teṣāṃ yāgānāmabhāvāt prayājādyaṅgamātrasādhāraṇyenānayorapi phalasaṃbandha ityarthaḥ
analyzed: āgneya ādi vākyānām dravya devatā vidhāyaka tvam iti dvitīye pakṣe teṣām yāgānām abhāvāt prayāja ādi aṅga mātra sādhāraṇyena anayoḥ api phala saṃbandhaḥ iti arthaḥ
tat eva upapādayati darśa pūrṇamāsa iti
prasiddha arthakam hi nāma yaji saṃkocakam bhavati
yathā jyotiṣṭoma iti nāma

original: idantu aprasiddhārthakaṃ yatrākhyātaṃ tatra tadanurodhena vartate ityākhyātasya sarvayāgaparatvāt sarveṣāṃ phalasaṃbandha ityāha -------- ata  #
analyzed: idam tu aprasiddha arthakam yatra ākhyātam tatra tad anurodhena vartate iti ākhyātasya sarva yāga para tvāt sarveṣām phala saṃbandhaḥ iti āha
iti
rājasūya nyāyena caturtha caturtha pāda adhikaraṇa nyāyena iti arthaḥ

original: athavā ------- kālayogiṣvaṣṭhasu prātipadikaprasiddhisattve dvivacanasya pāśādhikaraṇanyāyena bahutvalakṣaṇayāpyupapatteḥ na prayājādisādhāraṇyena
analyzed: athavā kāla yogiṣu aṣṭhasu prātipadika prasiddhi sattve dvivacanasya pāśa adhikaraṇa nyāyena bahu tva lakṣaṇayā api upapatteḥ na prayāja ādi sādhāraṇyena
kintu aṣṭānām eva iti pakṣa antaram āha pāśa iti

original: athavā ------- dvivacane 'pi lakṣaṇāyāṃ prayojanābhāvādanayoreva phalasaṃbandhopapattiriti pakṣāntaramāha ------- anayoreveti //
analyzed: athavā dvivacane lakṣaṇāyām prayojana abhāvāt anayoḥ eva phala saṃbandha upapattiḥ iti pakṣa antaram āha anayoḥ eva iti
paurṇamāsī amāvāsyā padayoḥ darśa pūrṇamāsa padayoḥ ca paryāya tva samarthanena darśa pūrṇamāsa padābhyām vidvat vākya vihita karma anuvāda upapattiḥ

original: yadyapi phalavākye darśapūrṇamāsapadārthavṛttidvitvaparaṃ dvivacanam na paurṇamāsyamāvāsyāsaṃjñakakarmavṛttidvitvaparaṃ bhavitumarhati;
analyzed: yadi api phala vākye darśa pūrṇamāsa padārtha vṛtti dvi tva param dvivacanam na paurṇamāsī amāvāsyā saṃjñaka karma vṛtti dvi tva param bhavitum arhati

original: tathāpi 'darśo vā etayoḥ pūrvaḥ pūrṇamāsa uttaro 'tha yat pūrṇamāsaṃ pūrvamārabhate tadayathāpūrvaṃ kriyate /
analyzed: tathā api darśaḥ vai etayoḥ pūrvaḥ pūrṇamāsaḥ uttaraḥ yat pūrṇamāsam pūrvam ārabhate tat ayathāpūrvam kriyate

original: tasmāt pūrvaṃ paurṇamāsamārabhamāṇaḥ sarasvatyai caruṃ nirvapet sarasvate dvādaśakapālamamāvāsyā
analyzed: tasmāt pūrvam paurṇamāsam ārabhamāṇaḥ sarasvatyai carum nirvapet sarasvate dvādaśa kapālam amāvāsyā
vai sarasvatī pūrṇamāsaḥ sarasvān iti anvāraṃbhaṇīyā vākya śeṣe darśa amāvāsyā śabdayoḥ
paryāya tva avagamāt paurṇamāsya eka deśena pūrṇamāsa śabdena nāma eka deśe nāma grahaṇam iti
nyāyena paryāya tva upapatteḥ eka arthaka tvena tad vṛtti dvi tva para dvivacana upapattiḥ kathañcid śabdena sūcitā

original: (vārtaghnīvṛdhanvatīvākyayoḥ aniyamena prāptamantracatuṣṭayavyavasthāpakatvena vidvadvākyavihitakarmaṇi rūpālābhāt na tadvidhitvamiti siddhāntopakramaḥ)
analyzed: vārtaghnī vṛdhanvatī vākyayoḥ aniyamena prāpta mantra catuṣṭaya vyavasthāpaka tvena vidvat vākya vihita karmaṇi rūpa alābhāt na tad vidhi tvam iti siddhānta upakramaḥ

original: rūpāvacanāditi sautraṃ siddhāntahetuṃ vivṛṇvanneva siddhāntamāha -------- liṅgeti -------- apekṣiteti //
analyzed: rūpa avacanāt iti sautram siddhānta hetum vivṛṇvan eva siddhāntam āha liṅga iti apekṣita iti
abādhena upapattau bādhā yogāt brāhmaṇa vākyayoḥ ca paurṇamāsī amāvāsyā padayoḥ kāla parayoḥ
karma paratve lakṣaṇa āpatteḥ saptamyāḥ api prādhānya lakṣaka tva āpatteḥ apūrva vidhi tva aṅgīkāre
śruta devatā vidhi kalpaka tve śruta yājyā antara kalpaka tve ājyabhāgayoḥ aśruta anuvākyā kalpane
gaurava āpatteḥ ca mantra catuṣṭayasya ājyabhāga aṅga tayā aniyamena prāptasya niyama mātra vidhāne
lāghavāt ca apekṣita vidhi tva saṃbhave na apekṣita vidhi tva āśrayaṇasya ayukta tvāt ājyabhāga aṅga tvam eva
tad catuṣṭayasya iti na vidvat vākya vihita karmaṇoḥ dravya lābhe pi devatā bhāvāt arūpa tvena
vidhi saṃbhavaḥ iti arthaḥ
kāla kṛta vyavasthā ādare pratipadi vikṛtau ca vārtraghnī mantra ananuṣṭhāna āpattyā paurṇamāsī padasya ājyabhāga lakṣaka tva ādi aṅgīkāreṇa karma kṛta vyavasthā eva
ukta pūrvapakṣa nirāse kāla kṛta vyavasthāyāḥ api upayogaḥ ca
yatas niyama vidhau lāghavam atas evā ubhayathā api vyavasthā
mithas ca anartha saṃbandhaḥ iti tṛtīya adhikaraṇa siddhāntam anuvadati atas eva iti

original: yadyapi paurṇamāsyamāvāsyāśabdābhyāṃ śaktyā kālarūpārthābhidhānena saptamyā nimittatvasyādhikaraṇatvasya
analyzed: yadi api paurṇamāsī amāvāsyā śabdābhyām śaktyā kāla rūpa artha abhidhānena saptamyāḥ nimitta tvasya adhikaraṇa tvasya
vā abhidhānena paurṇamāsī amāvāsyā kālayoḥ ājyabhāga aṅga tayā tad aṅga tayā prāptayoḥ vārtraghnī vṛdhanvatyoḥ
tad kālaka tvāt kāla kṛta vyavasthā api saṃbhavati

original: tathāpi ājyabhāgayoḥ pratipadi kriyamāṇatvena tatkālakatvāsaṃbhavāt kadācit sakhaṇḍaparvaṇi
analyzed: tathā api ājyabhāgayoḥ pratipadi kriyamāṇa tvena tad kālaka tva asaṃbhavāt kadācid sa khaṇḍa parvaṇi
tad saṃbhave pi saṃpūrṇa parvaṇi tad kālaka tva asaṃbhavena mantra nivṛtti rūpa śeṣi parisaṅkhyā phalaka tva āpatteḥ
śeṣa niyama rūpa lāghava anurodhena paurṇamāsī amāvāsyā padam tad kālīna pradhāna aṅga bhūta ājyabhāga lakṣakam aṅgīkṛtya
pradhāna prayoga āraṃbha dvārā tad kālīna tva saṃbhavāt karma kṛtā eva sā atra yuktā

original: ata eva ------- prakṛtau paurṇamāsyādikālavidhīnāṃ sandhimabhito yajeteti vacanāntarānurodhāt prayogāraṃbhadvārakatvameva /
analyzed: atas eva prakṛtau paurṇamāsī ādi kāla vidhīnām sandhim abhitas yajeta iti vacana antara anurodhāt prayoga āraṃbha dvāraka tvam eva
saptamī ca prādhānya parā eva
atas ca tādṛśa ājyabhāgayoḥ mantra viśeṣa vidhānāt prakṛtau vyavasthā siddhi vat paurṇamāsī vikārasya āmāvāsyā vikārasya

original: vā yasmin kasmiṃściddine karaṇe 'pi tayorvyavasthāsiddhirityevaṃ karmakṛtavyavasthayāpi
analyzed: vā yasmin kasmiṃścid dine karaṇe tayoḥ vyavasthā siddhiḥ iti evam karma kṛta vyavasthayā api
rūpa lābha nirāsa saṃbhavam prastutam abhipretya anāsthayā tad uktiḥ
yadi api pūrvapakṣe iva prātipadika pratyayayoḥ lakṣaṇa āpattiḥ tulyā

original: tathāpi lakṣaṇāmaṅgīkṛtyāpi niyamavidhisaṃbhave 'pūrvavidhitvāṅgīkāro na yukta iti bhāvaḥ //
analyzed: tathā api lakṣaṇām aṅgīkṛtya api niyama vidhi saṃbhave pūrva vidhi tva aṅgīkāraḥ na yuktaḥ iti bhāvaḥ
bhāvanā prāptau aneka viśiṣṭa eka kāraka vidhāna vat aṣṭākapāla śabdasya tātparya grāhaka tvena āgneya padena eva agni dravya ubhaya vivakṣaṇena
yatra hi aprāpta abhāvanā aneka kāraka viśiṣṭā vidhīyate
śrauta vidheḥ viśiṣṭa bhāvanā vidhāne eva vyāpārāt
viśeṣaṇānām ca viśiṣṭa vidhi anyathā anupapatti kalpita vidheḥ eva vidhāna siddheḥ śrauta vidheḥ tatra
vyāpāra abhāvāt na vidhi phalasya ajñāta jñāpanasya eka viṣaya tva bhaṅgaḥ iti na vākya bhedaḥ
yathā sauryam ityādau

original: evaṃ bhāvanāyāmaprāptāyāṃ tadanvayāt pūrvamapi viśeṣaṇānāṃ parasparavaiśiṣṭyaṃ vyutpannam,
analyzed: evam bhāvanāyām aprāptāyām tad anvayāt pūrvam api viśeṣaṇānām paraspara vaiśiṣṭyam vyutpannam
tatra aneka viśeṣaṇa viśiṣṭasya api ekasya eva viśeṣyasya vidheya tvāt na avṛtti lakṣaṇaḥ vākyabhedaḥ

original: yathā paśunā yajetetyatra paśuprātipadikopāttajāteḥ padaśrutyā samānābhidhānaśrutyā saṅkhyāyāstṛtīyopāttakaraṇatve 'nvayādviśiṣṭaika- kārakavidhāne
analyzed: yathā paśunā yajeta iti atra paśu prātipadika upātta jāteḥ pada śrutyā samāna abhidhāna śrutyā saṅkhyāyāḥ tṛtīya upātta karaṇa tve nvayāt viśiṣṭa eka kāraka vidhāne

original: yattu śāstradīpikāyāṃ kaustubhe ca --------- prāptakarmānuvādena viśiṣṭavidhāne etadvākyamudāhṛtam,
analyzed: yat tu śāstradīpikāyām kaustubhe ca prāpta karma anuvādena viśiṣṭa vidhāne etat vākyam udāhṛtam

original: tadīdṛśaṃ hyetadvākyaṃ śrutānumitaikaniṣpannamagnīṣomīyena paśunā yajeteti nyāyasudhālekhanādasyāgnīṣomīyapaśūtpatti- vākyatvena tatra prāptakarmānuvādāsaṃbhavāt  #
analyzed: tat īdṛśam hi etat vākyam śruta anumita eka niṣpannam agnīṣomīyena paśunā yajeta iti nyāya sudhā lekhanāt asya agnīṣomīya paśu utpatti vākya tvena tatra prāpta karma anuvāda asaṃbhavāt
prauḍhi mātram

original: ata eva “ajayā krīṇātī” tyetadeva prāptakarmānuvāde viśiṣṭavidhipradarśanārthamudāhṛtaṃ
analyzed: atas eva ajayā krīṇāti iti etat eva prāpta karma anuvāde viśiṣṭa vidhi pradarśana artham udāhṛtam

original: dakṣiṇe” tyatra ṛtvigbhyo dakṣiṇāṃ dadātīti prāptadakṣiṇānuvādena tasyeti tacchabdopāttagosaṃbandhaviśiṣṭadvādaśaśatasaṅkhyāvidhāne
analyzed: dakṣiṇe tyatra ṛtvigbhyaḥ dakṣiṇām dadāti iti prāpta dakṣiṇā anuvādena tasya iti tad śabda upātta go saṃbandha viśiṣṭa dvādaśa śata saṅkhyā vidhāne

original: prācāṃ mate ṣaṣṭhyarthasya saṅkhyāyāmanvayasya vyutpannatvācca saḥ /
analyzed: prācām mate ṣaṣṭhī arthasya saṅkhyāyām anvayasya vyutpanna tvāt ca saḥ
anena eva nyāyena ṣaṣṭhī antasya uddeśya viśeṣaṇa tve pi na vākya bhedaḥ
yathā atirātre brāhmaṇasya gṛhṇīyāt ityādau
evam iha api guṇa adhikaraṇa vakṣyamāṇa nyāyena āmikṣā pada vat aṣṭhākapāla padasya tātparya grāhaka tvena
bhinna pada upātta tva abhāvena taddhita anta padena ekena eva agni ādi devatā viśiṣṭa aṣṭākapāla dravya abhidhānena
bhāvanā anvayāt pūrvam eva viśiṣṭa vyutpanna tvāt vidvat vākya vihita yāga bhāvanā prāptau api
vidhāna upapatteḥ pratyuta tad anaṅgīkāre sā asya devatā iti dravya saṃbandha adhikāra vihita devatā taddhita anupapatteḥ vākya bheda abhāvam āśaṅkya
pariharati na ca iti
vinā samāsa ādi sthale viśiṣṭa vyutpatti samarpaṇam
aśva abhidhānīm ityādau iti

original: ādipadena “lohitoṣṇīṣā ṛtvijaḥ pracarantī” tyatra prāptapracārānuvādena ṛtviggatalauhityavidhiḥ saṃgṛhyate /
analyzed: ādi padena lohita uṣṇīṣāḥ ṛtvijaḥ pracaranti iti atra prāpta pracāra anuvādena ṛtvij gata lauhitya vidhiḥ saṃgṛhyate

original: ata eva aṣṭame bhāṣyakāreṇa śatāgniṣṭomamityapi samāsaḥ ubhayaviśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭaṃ gaṇamāha ---------- sa evaikārtho vidhīyate yathā lohitoṣṇīṣa  #
analyzed: atas eva aṣṭame bhāṣyakāreṇa śata agniṣṭomam iti api samāsaḥ ubhaya viśeṣaṇa viśiṣṭam gaṇam āha saḥ eva eka arthaḥ vidhīyate yathā
iti uktam

original: (vyastasthaleṣu pañcadaśānyājyānītyādau tasya dvādaśaśatamityādau ca sarveṣāmapi kriyānvayasya samūlaṃ matāntaranirāsapūrvakaṃ copapādanam)
analyzed: vyasta sthaleṣu pañcadaśāni ājyāni ityādau tasya dvādaśa śatam ityādau ca sarveṣām api kriyā anvayasya sa mūlam mata antara nirāsa pūrvakam ca upapādanam

original: ata eva kārakātiriktasaṃbandhena samāsādivṛttau vākyabhedābhāve 'pi yatra na samāsaḥ,
analyzed: atas eva kāraka atirikta saṃbandhena samāsa ādi vṛttau vākya bheda abhāve pi yatra na samāsaḥ

original: yathā pañcadaśānyājyāni ityatra tatra bhavatyeva sa ityuktaṃ citrādhikaraṇe śāstradīpikāyām,
analyzed: yathā pañcadaśāni ājyāni iti atra tatra bhavati eva saḥ iti uktam citra adhikaraṇe śāstradīpikāyām

original: prakṛtetu devatātvasya saṃpradānakārakatvādanyānvaye kārakatvavyāghātāpatteḥ prathamataḥ kriyānvaya evābhyupeyaḥ paścāttu dravyasaṃbandhaḥ
analyzed: prakṛte tu devatā tvasya saṃpradāna kāraka tvāt anya anvaye kāraka tva vyāghāta āpatteḥ prathamatas kriyā anvayaḥ eva abhyupeyaḥ paścāt tu dravya saṃbandhaḥ
tad abhiprāyikā eva taddhita ādi vṛttiḥ iti vaiśiṣṭyasya avyutpanna tvāt duruddharaḥ vākya bhedaḥ
na ca etad kalpanāyāḥ nirmūla tvam
eka pada upāttasya api aneka kārakasya paraspara anvaya abhāvena eka viśiṣṭa itara vidhi ayogāt nagneya
iti atra eka tvena vidhiḥ saṃbhavati ityādinā tathā anyatara viśiṣṭa anyatara vidhau api
dravya devatayoḥ bhinna kāraka tvāt kārakayoḥ ca anyonya viśeṣaṇa tva abhāvena eka kāraka viśiṣṭa kāraka antara vidhi ayoga ādi
tyādinā ca nyāyasudhāyām vākya bheda prapañca avasare sūcanena samūla tvāt

original: evaṃ sthite bhinnapadopāttānyapiyāni sāmānādhikaraṇyena ṣaṣṭhyā vā kriyānvayāt prāk
analyzed: evam sthite bhinna pada upāttāni api yāni sāmānādhikaraṇyena ṣaṣṭhyā vā kriyā anvayāt prāk

original: mithaḥ saṃbandhaṃ śabdato vastutaśca vidhimanādṛtyaiva labhante --------- yathābhyuditeṣṭau
analyzed: mithas saṃbandham śabdataḥ vastutaḥ ca vidhim an ādṛtya eva labhante yathā abhyudita iṣṭau

original: viṣṇave śipiviṣṭāyeti padadvayenāpi “kimitte viṣṇo paricakṣyaṃ bhūt prayadvavakṣe
analyzed: viṣṇave śipiviṣṭāya iti pada dvayena api kim itte viṣṇo paricakṣyam bhūt

original: śipiviṣṭo asmīti yaḥ paśorbhūmā yā puṣṭiḥ tadviṣṇuḥ śipiviṣṭo 'tiriktaḥ evātiriktaṃ
analyzed: śipiviṣṭaḥ asmi iti yaḥ paśoḥ bhūmā yā puṣṭiḥ tat viṣṇuḥ śipiviṣṭaḥ u tiriktaḥ eva atiriktam
dadhāti iti mantra varṇa arthavādebhyaḥ śipi śabda vācya raśmi āviṣṭa viṣṇu rūpa viśiṣṭa eka artha prasiddhyā
viśiṣṭa anvaya vyutpattyā na vākya bhedaḥ iti pārthasārathinā uktam
tad dūṣaṇam kaustubha uktam ṣaṣṭhe tad adhikaraṇe vyaktīkariṣyate

original: yadapi tasya dvādaśaśatamiti vākye gosaṅkhyobhayavidhāne vākyabhedāpattinirāsāya ṣaṣṭhīsthale 'pi parasparānvayakalpanaṃ prācām,
analyzed: yat api tasya dvādaśa śatam iti vākye go saṅkhyā ubhaya vidhāne vākya bheda āpatti nirāsāya ṣaṣṭhī sthale pi paraspara anvaya kalpanam prācām
tat api go viśiṣṭa saṅkhyā vidhānena kathañcid vākya bheda parihāre samuccita aśva ādeḥ api
vidhānāt tad āpatteḥ anivārya tvāt tatra ubhaya viśiṣṭa dakṣiṇā dāna vidhānasya eva āvaśyaka tve
tena eva tad parihāre tad anurodhena vyutpatti antara kalpanayā ṣaṣṭhī arthasya api anvaya kalpane
prayojana abhāvāt vyartham iti kaustubhe draṣṭavyam
āgneya vākyena rūpa lābha nirāsa upasaṃhāraḥ

original: ataścāgneyādivākyeṣu dravyadevatāviśiṣṭayāgāntaravidhānasyāvaśyakatvāt na rūpamanayoḥ prāpyata ityupasaṃharati --------- ataśceti //
analyzed: atas ca āgneya ādi vākyeṣu dravya devatā viśiṣṭa yāga antara vidhānasya āvaśyaka tvāt na rūpam anayoḥ prāpyate iti upasaṃharati atas ca iti

original: kaustubhoktaprakārāntareṇa rūpalābhaṃ kathañcit manasi nidhāya dūṣaṇāntamāha --------- astu veti //
analyzed: kaustubha ukta prakāra antareṇa rūpa lābham kathañcid manasi nidhāya dūṣaṇa antam āha astu vā iti
jyautiṣṭomika dharma atideśasya soma vidheḥ dīkṣaṇīya ādi aṅga dvāreṇa darśa pūrṇamāsa vidhi upajīvi tvāt
tayoḥ api tad upajīvi tve anyonya āśraya āpatteḥ atideśa prāpta aṅga viśiṣṭa iṣṭi bhāvanāyāḥ prātar kāle
anuṣṭhāna asaṃbhavena pratipadi iṣṭi āpatteḥ asaṃbhavaḥ kathañcid padena sūcitaḥ
yad śabdasya tad śabdau adhika artha prāpti mātra dyotaka tvena prakṛte gati antara saṃbhavena ca na karma vidhiḥ iti upapādanam
tad śabdau adhikā iti

original: yāvadukthyenetyasmāt pūrvaṃ sa iti tacchabdādhyāhārasyāvaśyakatvāt tadarthāvadhiprāptidyotanena vidhitvapratibandhaḥ /
analyzed: yāvat ukthyena ityasmāt pūrvam saḥ iti tad śabda adhyāhārasya āvaśyaka tvāt tad artha avadhi prāpti dyotanena vidhi tva pratibandhaḥ

original: evaṃ satyapi yacchabdasattve tasya prāptidyotanamātrakāritvāt pramāṇāntareṇa viśiṣṭasya
analyzed: evam sati api yat śabda sattve tasya prāpti dyotana mātra kāri tvāt pramāṇa antareṇa viśiṣṭasya
prāpti abhāve gatyā viśeṣaṇa mātra prāpti dyotaka tvam aṅgīkṛtya agatyā viśiṣṭa vidhiḥ api
yaḥ dīkṣitaḥ iti vat svīkriyate
na tu iha tathā asti
vakṣyamāṇa rīti ānarthakya asaṃbhavena āgateḥ abhāvāt iti arthaḥ
vidvat vākyena samudāya anuvādaḥ
evam api ṣaṇṇām eva phala saṃbandhaḥ ityādi nirūpaṇam
aneka upādānāt iti
yathā anekeṣām vṛkṣāṇām eka deśa sthitānām vanam iti eka pada upādānāt eka pratīti viṣaya tvāt samudāya siddhiḥ tadvat iha iti arthaḥ
atra samudāyasya anuvaditārau samudāya vacanau iti yathāśruta bhāṣyāt paurṇamāsī ādi śabdayoḥ
samudāya vacana tva pratīteḥ samudāya dvayasya eva phala saṃbandha bhramam vārayati prātipadikasya iti
samudāyasya kāla yoga abhāvena tad prakhya nyāya aviṣaya tvena eva tad nāma tva asaṃbhavāt samudāyasya
māna antara apramita tvena vidvat vākyayoḥ anuvāda ayogāt yajinā tad anuvāde lakṣaṇa āpatteḥ
prātipadikena ṣaṣ yāga samudāyinām eva abhidhānāt teṣām eva vidhi artham anuvādāt samudāyinām eva
phala saṃbandhaḥ iti arthaḥ
phala vākye samudāyi anuvāde dvivacana anupapattim pariharati dvivacanasya iti
sva padam dvivacana param
tena dvi tva āśraya samudāya ghaṭaka samudāyi vṛtti tva saṃbandhena bahu tva lakṣaṇāyām śakya saṃbandha ghaṭakībhūta samudāya dvaya tātparya grāhakam vidvat vākya dvayam iti arthaḥ
yathā ca iti
sāyam prātar kālayoḥ iva abhyāsena api kāla dvaya saṃbandha upapattyā aṅga tvena vidhānāt uddeśya aneka tva nimitta vākya bheda abhāvāt
upasthiti sattvena eka vākya gata tvena ca prakaraṇa antara ādi nyāyasya api apravṛtteḥ āgneya ekatvam iti

original: yadyapi cāgneyavākye naikasmin karmaṇi kāladvayaniveśāsaṃbhavena samuccitakāladvayalakṣaṇaguṇāt bhedaḥ saṃbhavati;
analyzed: yadi api ca āgneya vākye na ekasmin karmaṇi kāla dvaya niveśa asaṃbhavena samuccita kāla dvaya lakṣaṇa guṇāt bhedaḥ saṃbhavati
tasya agnihotre sāyam prātar kālayoḥ iva abhyāsena api upapatteḥ
na vā kālasya anupādeya tvena uddeśya tvāt tad aneka tva nimittaka vākya bheda āpādaka guṇāt saḥ
kālasya anupādeya tve pi amāvāsyāyām aparāhṇaḥ iti vat aṅga tvena vidheya tva upapatteḥ uddeśya aneka tva nimitta vākya bheda aprasakteḥ
na api anupādeya guṇa yoga rūpa prakaraṇa antarāt
tasya sannidhau apravṛtteḥ
kiñca saṅkhyā vyatirikta bheda pramāṇānām vākya antara vihita karma pratiyogika bhedaka tva niyamāt sva vākya upātta karma pratiyogika bheda bodhaka tava asaṃbhavāt atra
na saḥ
atas pārthasārathi uktam āgnaiya ekatvam eva yuktam

original: (utpattivākyasthasya karmabhedāpādakasya padārthasya saṅkhyāyā iva karmabhedakatvena paurṇamāsyamāvāsyākālayoḥ sāyaṃprātaḥkālavaiṣamyāt,
analyzed: utpatti vākya sthasya karma bheda āpādakasya padārthasya saṅkhyāyāḥ iva karma bhedaka tvena paurṇamāsī amāvāsyā kālayoḥ sāyam prātar kāla vaiṣamyāt

original: āgneya dvitvamevamapi vidvadvākyena samudāyānuvādasārthakyārthaṃ darśapūrṇamāsābhyāmityatra bahutvalakṣaṇetyādinirūpaṇam)
analyzed: āgneya dvi tvam evam api vidvat vākyena samudāya anuvāda sārthakya artham darśa pūrṇamāsābhyām iti atra bahu tva lakṣaṇa ityādi nirūpaṇam

original: tathāpi yasya padārthasya bhedamāvṛttiṃ vā vinā na karmānvayayogyatvam,
analyzed: tathā api yasya padārthasya bhedam āvṛttim vā vinā na karma anvaya yogya tvam
tasya utpatti vākya sthasya karma utpatti bhedaka tvam anutpanna vākya gatasya tu āvṛtti bodhaka tvam iti arthasya
saṅkhyā ādau kḷpta tvāt iha api tasya utpatti vākya gata tvena guṇasya eva karma bhedaka tva upapattiḥ
ataeva sāyam prātar kālayoḥ anutpatti vākya gata tvena guṇasya eva karma bhedaka tva upapattiḥ
atas eva sāyam prātar kālayoḥ anutpatti vākya gata tvāt abhyāsa āpādaka tvam eva
bhedaḥ pi ca atra saṅkhyāvat aneka tva bodhana dvārā eva
na tu kiñcid pratiyogikaḥ
pramāṇa antara vat pratiyoginaḥ pūrvam aprasidhyā tad nirūpita bhedasya bodhayitum aśakya tvāt
evaṃsati pramāṇa balena saṅkhyāvat guṇasya api sva vākya vihita karma pratiyogika bheda bodhaka tve pi na kṣatiḥ
atas āgneya bhedaḥ iti kaustubhe vyaktam iti arthaḥ

original: prapañcitapadopādānāt prakāśakāropapāditaprakārāntarāt bhedanirāso 'pi tatra draṣṭavya iti sūcitam /
analyzed: prapañcita pada upādānāt prakāśakāra upapādita prakāra antarāt bheda nirāsaḥ api tatra draṣṭavyaḥ iti sūcitam

original: naca --------- evaṃ tarhi āgneyabhede tatraiva dvivacanopapattyā tayoreva phalasaṃbandhopapatteḥ kimiti bahutvalakṣaṇāśrayaṇamiti ------- vācyam;
analyzed: na ca evam tarhi āgneya bhede tatra eva dvivacana upapattyā tayoḥ eva phala saṃbandha upapatteḥ kim iti bahutva lakṣaṇa āśrayaṇam iti vācyam
vidvat vākya gata samudāya anuvāda vaiyarthya parihāra artham prayojana jijñāsayā tasyāḥ āvaśyaka tvāt iti bhāvaḥ
vaiśvadeva vākye samudāya anuvāda upayogaḥ
vaiśvadevena yajeta itivat iti
etasya vākyasya viśvadeva devatāka yāga ghaṭita samudāya siddhi dvārā āgneya ādi aṣṭa yāgānām
prācīna pravaṇa deśa ādi saṃbandha sidhi artha tvena anya para tvena na karma antara vidhāyaka tvam tadvat iti arthaḥ
anyathā hi iti
naca pratyeka prayoga kalpane eka phala sādhanatva anupapattiḥ
pratyekam prayuktānām api āgneya ādīnām anīkavatī ādi vat eva apūrva rūpeṇa eka kṣaṇa varti tvena phala sāhitya upapatteḥ
ataeva same darśa pūrṇamāsābhyām iti vacanena daiśika prayoga vidhi vat kṣaṇam daiśika sāhitya avagame
pi ekasmin eva same deśe tisṛṣu paurṇamāsīṣu amāvāsyāsu ca ekaika pradhānasya agni anvādhāna ādi brāhmaṇa tarpaṇa anta aṅga viśiṣṭasya
prayoge pi na kṣatiḥ
na hi ekasyām eva paurṇamāsyām amāvāsyāyām vā pradhāna yāga prayoga trayam yujyate
dvi aha kālīna prātar kālīna tvayoḥ vacana antara prāptayoḥ bādha āpatteḥ

original: ataḥ pratyekaṃ prayogavyāvṛttaye trikasya trikasyaikaprayogatāsidhyarthametadvākyadvayamiti na vaiyarthyam //
analyzed: atas pratyekam prayoga vyāvṛttaye trikasya trikasya eka prayoga tā sidhi artham etat vākya dvayam iti na vaiyarthyam

original: (āgneyādyutpattivākya eva kālaśravaṇe 'pi ya iṣṭyeti vākyevailakṣaṇyānna pṛthakprayoga iti nirūpaṇam)
analyzed: āgneya ādi utpatti vākye eva kāla śravaṇe yaḥ iṣṭyā iti vākya vailakṣaṇyāt na pṛthak prayogaḥ iti nirūpaṇam

original: ata eva utpattivākye kālaśravaṇe 'pi yāvattadanvayānurodhena prayogavidhikalpanam,
analyzed: atas eva utpatti vākye kāla śravaṇe yāvat tad anvaya anurodhena prayoga vidhi kalpanam

original: tataḥ pūrvameva pravṛttaitadvākyadvayena prayogavidhānānna tatrāpi prayogavidhikalpanamiti
analyzed: tatas pūrvam eva pravṛttā etad vākya dvayena prayoga vidhānāt na tatra api prayoga vidhi kalpanam iti
yaḥ iṣṭhyā iti vākya vat prāpta prayoga anuvādena iha kāla mātra vidhānena na vikṛti iṣṭīnām iva iha
pṛthak prayoga śaṅkā avakāśaḥ
yaḥ iṣṭhye tyatra tu yad śabda samabhivyāhāreṇa vikṛti prayoga anuvādena kāla mātra vidhānena
pratyeka prayoga kalpanā abhyanujñānāt tad tad vilakṣaṇa phala sādhanānām kāma naiyatya asaṃbhavena eka prayoga vidhi viṣaya tva anupapatteḥ ca anuvādya gata tvena avivakṣita sāhityānām
bhinna prayoga tā eva

original: prakṛtetu prāptānāmapi pradhānānāṃ prayogaviṣayatvena vidheyatvāt tattatkālaviśiṣṭaprayogaviṣayatvena
analyzed: prakṛte tu prāptānām api pradhānānām prayoga viṣaya tvena vidheya tvāt tad tad kāla viśiṣṭa prayoga viṣaya tvena

original: vidheyayāgagatasāhityasya tadaṅgasāhityasya ca vivakṣitatvānna yuktaḥ prayogabheda ityarthaḥ //
analyzed: vidheya yāga gata sāhityasya tad aṅga sāhityasya ca vivakṣita tvāt na yuktaḥ prayoga bhedaḥ iti arthaḥ
utpatti vākye kāla śravaṇam adhikāra ādi vākya gata yaji saṅkoca artham iti nirūpaṇam

original: kimarthaṃ tarhyutpattivākye kālaśravaṇamityāśaṅkāṃ pariharati ----------- evaṃ ceti //
analyzed: kimartham tarhi utpatti vākye kāla śravaṇam iti āśaṅkām pariharati evam ca iti
samudāya sidhi artham iti

original: anena ca sarvasyāpyanuvādakatve anadhigatārthagantṛtvasvarūpaprāmāṇyānāpattiḥ śakyārthānuvādakatve 'pi anadhigatasamudāyabodhakatvena prāmāṇyopapatteḥ  #
analyzed: anena ca sarvasya api anuvādaka tve anadhigata artha gantṛ tva svarūpa prāmāṇya anāpattiḥ śakyārtha anuvādaka tve pi anadhigata samudāya bodhaka tvena prāmāṇya upapatteḥ
parihṛtāḥ iti
siddham iti

original: evañca “caturdaśa paurṇamāsyāmāhutayo hūyante trayodaśāmāvāsyāyāmi“ti āhavanīyagatavaṣaṭkārāhutiparigaṇanaparaṃ liṅgadarśanamapyupapadyate
analyzed: evam ca caturdaśa paurṇamāsyām āhutayaḥ hūyante trayodaśa amāvāsyāyām iti āhavanīya gata vaṣaṭkāra āhuti parigaṇana param liṅga darśanam api upapadyate

original: anyathā prathame pakṣe paurṇamāsyāṃ pañcadaśatvasyāmāvāsyāyāṃ caturdaśatvasya cāpatteḥ dvitīyapakṣecobhayatra dvādaśatvāpattestadanupapattiḥ,
analyzed: anyathā prathame pakṣe paurṇamāsyām pañcadaśa tvasya amāvāsyāyām caturdaśa tvasya ca āpatteḥ dvitīya pakṣe ca ubhayatra dvādaśa tva āpatteḥ tad anupapattiḥ

original: mamatu pañca prayājāḥ dvāvājyabhāgau sviṣṭakṛt trayo 'nūyājāḥ paurṇamāsyāṃ pradhānatrayamiti
analyzed: mamatu pañca prayājāḥ dvau ājyabhāgau sviṣṭakṛt trayaḥ nūyājāḥ paurṇamāsyām pradhāna trayam iti
caturdaśa tvam amāvāsyāyām pañca sānnāyyayoḥ saṃpratipanna devatya tvena saha anuṣṭhānāt

original: trayodaśatvaṃ copapannaṃ bhavatīti prayojanaṃ pūrvottarapakṣapratipādanenaiva spaṣṭīkṛtam //
analyzed: trayodaśa tvam ca upapannam bhavati iti prayojanam pūrva uttara pakṣa pratipādanena eva spaṣṭīkṛtam
iti tṛtīyam paurṇamāsī adhikaraṇam
a pā paurṇamāsī vat upāṃśuyāja syāt

original: tatraiva “jāmi vā etadyajñasya kriyate yadanvañcau puroḍāśau upāṃśuyājamantarā yajati
analyzed: tatra eva jāmi vai etat yajñasya kriyate yat anvañcau puroḍāśau upāṃśuyājam antarā yajati
viṣṇuḥ upāṃśu yaṣṭavyaḥ jāmi tvāya prajāpatiḥ upāṃśu yaṣṭavyaḥ jāmi tvāya agnīṣomau upāṃśu

original: yaṣṭavyāvajāmitvāye” ti śrute antarāvākye pūrvavadeva na karmāntara vidhiḥ,
analyzed: iti śrute antarā vākye pūrvavat eva na karma antara vidhiḥ
apitu tavya pratyaya anta vākyaiḥ vihitānām devatā upāṃśugva viśiṣṭa yāgānām samudāya siddhi artham anuvādaḥ eva
tad prayojanam ca antarāla kāla vidhiḥ
trayāṇām eteṣām
tau abrūtām agnīṣomau ājyasya eva nau upāṃśu paurṇamāsyām yajan iti kāla saṃbandhāt tātparya graha dvārā phala saṃbandha siddhiḥ vā

original: anyathā hyagnīṣomadevatyasyaiva kālasaṃbandhāt phalasaṃbandhaḥ syāditi prāpte ----------
analyzed: anyathā hi agnīṣoma devatyasya eva kāla saṃbandhāt phala saṃbandhaḥ syāt iti prāpte
upakrama upasaṃhārayoḥ eka viṣaya tvena eka vākya tva pratīteḥ na tavya pratyaya anta vākyaiḥ karma vidhiḥ
antarā vākye eva tu kāla upāṃśu tva viśiṣṭa eka karma vidhiḥ
tad artha vādaḥ ca ayam pūrva uttara bhāvena
anyathā vākya bheda āpatteḥ
ataeva tavya pratyaya antaiḥ devatā mātra vidhiḥ antarāla vākya stha karmaṇi iti api apāstam
na ca tatra devatā lābhaḥ
śākhā bhedena vaiṣṇava prajāpatya agnīṣomīya yājyā anuvākyā yugalānām etad yāga krame samāmnātānām vikalpena tad tad devatā kalpaka tva upapatteḥ
tasya ca tau abrūtām miti anena kāla saṃbandhāt phala saṃbandhaḥ
naca utpatti śiṣṭa kāla saṃbandhānām eva āgneya ādīnām jhaṭiti upasthita tvena phala saṃbandha āpatteḥ utpanna śiṣṭa kāla saṃbandhasya upāṃśuyājasya
anyathā puroḍāśa antarāla saṃbandha anyathā anupapattyā eva paurṇamāsī ādi kāla lābhena upāṃśuyājasya phala saṃbandha āpattau tau abrūtām ityasya api tad phalatva anupapatteḥ iti
vācyam
tau abrūtām iti etad anantaram eva upāṃśuyājam antarā yajati iti paṭhitam iti vārtika darśanāt asya api
kālasya utpatti vākyena eva vidheya tayā bhinna vākya tva abhāvena tulya bala tvāt phala saṃbandha upapatteḥ
atas na ayam samudāya anuvādaḥ iti siddham
prayojanam spaṣṭam
iti caturtham upāṃśuyāja adhikaraṇam

original: itaḥ paramadhikaraṇatrayeṇa samudāyānuvādatvāpavādena abhyāsasya nirūpaṇāt pūrvapakṣe
analyzed: itas param adhikaraṇa trayeṇa samudāya anuvāda tva apavādena abhyāsasya nirūpaṇāt pūrvapakṣe

original: karmabhedāt siddhānte ca karmaikyāt prakṛtasaṅgatiṃ spaṣṭatvādanabhidhāya viṣayapradarśanapūrvakaṃ
analyzed: karma bhedāt siddhānte ca karma aikyāt prakṛta saṅgatim spaṣṭa tvāt an abhidhāya viṣaya pradarśana pūrvakam
pūrvapakṣam āha jāmi vā iti

original: daśame jāmikaraṇācceti sūtre bhāṣyakāreṇa jāmitā sādṛśyamiti vyākhyānakaraṇāt saundaryavācino
analyzed: daśame jāmi karaṇāt ca iti sūtre bhāṣyakāreṇa jāmi tā sādṛśyam iti vyākhyāna karaṇāt

original: 'pi jāmiśabdasya sādṛśye lakṣaṇeti nyāyasudhāyāmukteśca yajñasya jāmisadṛśamālasyamidaṃ
analyzed: pi jāmi śabdasya sādṛśye lakṣaṇā iti nyāyasudhāyām ukteḥ ca yajñasya jāmi sadṛśam ālasyam idam

atas tad parihārāya antarā yāga antaram kartavyam iti arthaḥ
viṣṇu ādi vākyaiḥ yāga vidhau upāṃśu yāja traya āpattyā paurṇamāsyām ṣoḍaśa āhuti āpatteḥ pūrva ukta liṅga darśana ākṣepeṇa

original: pūrvapakṣotthānāt upāṃśuyājacintāyā vaiśeṣikyānantarasaṅgatyā prāthamyopapattiṃ sūcayituṃ tatraivetyuktam //
analyzed: pūrvapakṣa utthānāt upāṃśuyāja cintāyāḥ vaiśeṣikyā anantara saṅgatyā prāthamya upapattim sūcayitum tatra eva iti uktam
antarāvākye pūrvapakṣaḥ
antarā vākye laṭ leṭoḥ sandigdha tvāt svādhyāyaḥ dhyetavyaḥ ityādau tavya pratyayasya asaṃśayam
vidhāyaka tva darśanāt yatra dravya devatā ādi yāga paricāyakam rūpam tatra eva bhūyastvena ubhaya śrutī iti
nyāyena yāga vidhi tva pratīteḥ antarā vākye tad abhāve na yāga vidhiḥ
apitu tavya yukta vākyeṣu eva iti abhipretya pūrvapakṣam upapādayati pūrvavat eva iti
naca jāmi tā upakrameṇa tad apanāyaka karma stuti artha tvena upātta jāmi tva upasaṃhāreṇa eka viṣaya tayā ekavākya tāyāḥ
jāta iṣṭi vākye iva iha pratīteḥ tavya yukta vākyānām yāga traya vidhāyatve vākya bheda āpattyā
tad bhaṅga āpattiḥ iti vācyam

original: ajāmitvasya pratyekamupasaṃhāreṇa tadanurodhādupakramasyāpi pratyekamanuṣaṅgāvagateḥ bhinnavākyatvasyaiva yuktatvāt,
analyzed: ajāmi tvasya pratyekam upasaṃhāreṇa tad anurodhāt upakramasya api pratyekam anuṣaṅga avagateḥ bhinna vākyatvasya eva yukta tvāt

original: anyathā jāteṣṭivat sakṛdevānte tadāpattau pratyekaṃ tadanupapatteḥ /
analyzed: anyathā jāta iṣṭi vat sakṛt eva ante tad āpattau pratyekam tad anupapatteḥ

original: ato yadyapi tavyapratyayena viṣṇvādīnāṃ prādhānyaṃ pratīyate;
analyzed: atas yadi api tavya pratyayena viṣṇu ādīnām prādhānyam pratīyate

original: tathāpi teṣāṃ bhūtabhāvyupayogābhāvena tadanupapatteḥ saktvakaraṇatvādilakṣaṇayā guṇatvopapatteḥ tattaddevatopāṃśutvaviśiṣṭayāgānāṃ vidhānaṃ  #
analyzed: tathā api teṣām bhūta bhāvi upayoga abhāvena tad anupapatteḥ saktva karaṇa tva ādi lakṣaṇayā guṇa tva upapatteḥ tad tad devatā upāṃśu tva viśiṣṭa yāgānām vidhānam
teṣu na anupapannam
antarā vākya stha yaji padantu teṣām eva yāgānām anuvādakam
upāṃśuyāja padam api teṣām eva avyutpannam sāmānādhikaraṇyena nāmadheyam
na tu yaugikam

original: tathātve “cajoḥ kughiṇyatorityanena jakārāntasya dhātorghiṇyatoḥ pratyayayoḥ kutvavidhānenopāṃśuyāga iti rūpāpatteḥ /
analyzed: tathātve ca joḥ ku ghi iṇ yatoḥ iti anena jakāra antasya dhātoḥ ghi iṇ yatoḥ pratyayayoḥ ku tva vidhānena upāṃśu yāgaḥ iti rūpa āpatteḥ

original: ata eva antarāvākye upāṃśutvaguṇatve naiva vidhānam,
analyzed: atas eva antarā vākye upāṃśu tva guṇa tve na eva vidhānam
api tu antarā kāla mātram yaji upātta yāga traya uddeśena vidhīyate
na ca antarā vidhinā jāmi tā upakramasya vyavadhānāt na anuṣaṅgaḥ yuktaḥ
samudāya stuti artham atra api anvayena a vyavadhāna upapatteḥ
vastutas tu taittarīya śākhāyām antarāla vākye api ajāmi tvāya iti pāṭhāt jāmitā upakramaḥ tad mātra viṣayaḥ eva
viṣṇu ādi vākyeṣu ajāmi tvāya iti etāvat mātram eva ajāmi tva saṃpādaka antarāla kāla vidhāna labdha ajāmi tva saṃpādaka tayā anuvādaḥ yāga stuti arthe eva

original: evañca śākhābhedena kramāmnātānāṃ vaiṣṇavaprājāpattyāgnīṣomīyayājyānuvākyāyugalānāṃ liṅgadeva tadyāgāṅgatvopapatterna devatāvidhikalpakatvamiti  #
analyzed: evam ca śākhā bhedena krama āmnātānām vaiṣṇava prājāpattya agnīṣomīya yājyā anuvākyā yugalānām liṅga deva tad yāga aṅga tva upapatteḥ na devatā vidhi kalpaka tvam iti
lāghavam
na ca antarā vākye pi yāga antara vidhiḥ śaṅkyaḥ
bhedaka pramāṇa abhāvāt
tad tad yājyānām tad tad yāga aṅga tvena iha māntravarṇika devatā kalpanā anupapattyā arūpa tvāt ca tad anāpatteḥ

original: ato yuktaṃ viṣṇvādivākye yāgatrayavidhānamupāṃśuvākye yajatīti samudāyānuvāda iti bhāvaḥ //
analyzed: atas yuktam viṣṇu ādi vākye yāga traya vidhānam upāṃśu vākye yajati iti samudāya anuvādaḥ iti bhāvaḥ
samudāya anuvādasya antarāla kāla vidhiḥ
