samudāya anuvāda prayojanam āha tad prayojanam iti
naca puroḍāśa nairantarya āpādita jāmi tā nivartaka tā anuvāda balāt eva antarāle nuṣṭhāna upapatteḥ na etat prayojanam yuktam iti asvarasāt prayojana antaram āha
trayāṇām iti
etad abhāve hi tau abrūtām iti vākye agnīṣoma pada upādānāt tad upāttayoḥ agnīṣomayoḥ upalakṣaṇa tvena
viśeṣaṇa tvena vā anvayāt agnīṣoma devatya vijātīya yāgasya eva paurṇamāsī kāla uddeśena upādānāt vidvat vākya phala vākyayoḥ
tasya eva grahaṇāt phala saṃbandha upapattyā itarayoḥ aṅga tvasya eva āpattiḥ

original: satitve tasmin samudāyānuvāde trayāṇāmupāṃśuyāgasaṃjñakatvāvagaterupāṃśu paurṇamāsyāmityatra nāmaikadeśena kālasaṃbandhāt trayāṇāṃ tatsiddhiḥ
analyzed: sati tve tasmin samudāya anuvāde trayāṇām upāṃśu yāga saṃjñaka tva avagateḥ upāṃśu paurṇamāsyām iti atra nāma eka deśena kāla saṃbandhāt trayāṇām tad siddhiḥ
nahi tat āgnīṣomīya padam upalakṣaṇam viśeṣaṇam vā bhavitum arhati
samudāya anuvāda vaiyarthya āpattyā vaiśvadeva pada vat eva viṣṇu ādi devatā upalakṣaṇa tvāt
atas trayāṇām phala saṃbandha siddhiḥ prayojanam iti arthaḥ
pratyekam ajāmi tva upasaṃhārasya viṣṇu ādi devatāsu pratyekam tad karaṇa śakti pradarśana artha tvena upapattyā eka vākyatayā upāṃśu vākya

original: eva yāgavidhiḥ viṣṇādivākyaṃ tvarthavāda iti siddhāntopakramaḥ)
analyzed: eva yāga vidhiḥ viṣṇādi vākyam tu arthavādaḥ iti siddhānta upakramaḥ
tad janya yāga stuti para tayā ekavākyatve pi upapatteḥ vaiśvānara vākya nyāyena upakrama upasaṃhārasya eka viṣaya tayā
pratīyamāna eka vākya tā tyāgena anuṣaṅgeṇa bhinna vākya tāyāḥ ayukta tvāt tavya pratyaye vidhau
lakṣaṇa āpatteḥ upāṃśuyājam antarā yajati iti atra eva aprāpta artha tvena leṭ tva kalpanayā
yāga vidhānam yuktam

original: natu tavyopāttavākyeṣu vākyabhedāpatterarthavādatvasyaiva nyāyyatvādityabhipretya siddhāntamāha ------- upakrameti //
analyzed: na tu tavya upātta vākyeṣu vākya bheda āpatteḥ arthavāda tvasya eva nyāyya tvāt iti abhipretya siddhāntam āha  upakrama iti
evam ca puroḍāśa nairantarya āpāditāyāḥ jāmi tāyāḥ antarāla kāla saṃbandhinā vidheyena nivṛtti pratītā iti atra antarāla rūpa guṇa upabandhaḥ tatra eva
karma codanā pratīteḥ antarā vākye eva karma codanā iti arthaḥ
māntravarṇika vaikalpika viṣṇu ādi devatā prāptyā viṣṇu ādi vākya arthavāda tvena ākṣepaḥ pūrva śāstra pravṛttyā antarāla kāla vidhānena upāṃśa yāja śabdasya
yaugika tvena ca upāṃśu viśiṣṭasya antarāle vidhānam ityādi nirūpaṇam

original: ata eva tatraiva māntravarṇikadevatākalpanāt nārūpatvamityāha ---------- śākhābhedeneti //
analyzed: atas eva tatra eva māntravarṇika devatā kalpanāt na arūpa tvam iti āha śākhā bhedena iti
aitareyake āgneya aindrāgna yājyā anuvākyā yugalayoḥ madhye idam viṣṇuḥ pratat viṣṇuḥ iti ubhayam āmnātam

original: athavā --------- trirdevaḥ pṛthivītivā pratadviṣṇurityasya sthāne āmnātam /
analyzed: athavā tris devaḥ pṛthivi iti vā pratat viṣṇuḥ iti asya sthāne āmnātam
taittirīye tad madhye prajāpate na tvat
sa vedasaḥ iti yugalam āmnātam

original: tathaivaṃ aitareyake evaṃ tanmadhye “anyaṃ divo agnīṣomau yo aghavāmi“ti yugalamiti śākhābhedenāmnātamityarthaḥ vikalpenāpīti //
analyzed: tathā evam aitareyake evam tad madhye anyam divaḥ agnīṣomau yaḥ aghavām iti yugalam iti śākhā bhedena āmnātam iti arthaḥ vikalpena api iti
dṛṣṭa artha tvāt devatā trayasya vikalpaḥ
evam ca māntravarṇika devatā bhede na arthavāda samarpita devatā vaiśiṣṭya kalpanayā viśiṣṭa vidhi aṅgīkāraḥ yuktaḥ
arthavāda tvena api tad upapatteḥ
naca jāmitā doṣa apanayana arthatvena antarāla kāle nuṣṭhānasya phala balāt eva siddheḥ antarāla kāla vidhi vaiyarthyam
tad ākṣipta antarāla kāla vidhitaḥ pūrva pravṛttyā abhyudaya śiraska tva artham tad vidhi upapattyā antarāla kāle upāṃśu tva viśiṣṭa yāga bhāvanā vidhāna upapatteḥ
yadi api upāṃśuyāja śabdasya na yaugika tvam
ku tva āpatteḥ

original: tathāpi “chandasi dṛṣṭānuvidhiri“ti sūtrāt kathañcit kutvābhāvaṃ kṛtvā pratīyamānāvayavārthatyāgenātiriktaśaktikalpane
analyzed: tathā api chandasi dṛṣṭa anuvidhiḥ iti sūtrāt kathañcid ku tva abhāvam kṛtvā pratīyamāna avayava artha tyāgena atirikta śakti kalpane
pramāṇa abhāvāt prokṣaṇī śabda vat yaugikam iti na doṣaḥ iti arthaḥ
tau abrūtām iti asya dravya daivata yāgānām prāpta tvāt tad vidhāna asaṃbhavena vidhi sarūpasya api yaḥ iṣṭyā iti vat kāla saṃbandha mātra paratvam
tasya phala saṃbandhaḥ phalam ityādi nirūpaṇam tasya ca iti
antarā vākya vihita yāgasya iti arthaḥ

original: idañca vacanaṃ purākalpasarūpārthavādarūpamapi siddhavadanuvādānyathānupapattyā vidhikalpane 'pi na tāvadyāgasya vidhāyakam;
analyzed: idam ca vacanam purākalpa sarūpa arthavāda rūpam api siddha vat anuvāda anyathā anupapattyā vidhi kalpane na tāvat yāgasya vidhāyakam
antarā vākyena eva prāpta tvāt
nā api bhāṣya ukta rītyā agnīṣoma devatā vidhāyakam
ubhayoḥ kalpya tva aviśeṣe yājyā mantravarṇāt eva prāpteḥ
atas eva prāpta tvāt na ājyasya api
prāpta paurṇamāsī kāla vidhāyakam

original: ataśca yāgaikatvapakṣe yāgānuvādena kālavidhānāttadviśeṣaṇasya agnīṣomadevatyatvasyānuvādyagatatvenāvivakṣitatvāt tritayadaivatyasyāpi phalasaṃbandhasiddhiḥ
analyzed: atas ca yāga ekatva pakṣe yāga anuvādena kāla vidhānāt tad viśeṣaṇasya agnīṣoma devatya tvasya anuvādya gata tvena avivakṣita tvāt tritaya daivatyasya api phala saṃbandha siddhiḥ

original: nahyatra kāle karmaṇa upādeyatvena prāptasyāpi prayogaviṣayatvena vidhānāt tadviśeṣaṇavivakṣāprasaktirasti;
analyzed: na hi atra kāle karmaṇaḥ upādeya tvena prāptasya api prayoga viṣaya tvena vidhānāt tad viśeṣaṇa vivakṣā prasaktiḥ asti

original: utpattivākya evāntarālakālaśravaṇenotpattivat prayogasyāpi prāptatvena tadviṣayatvena vidhānānupapatteḥ /
analyzed: utpatti vākye eva antarāla kāla śravaṇena utpatti vat prayogasya api prāptatvena tad viṣaya tvena vidhāna anupapatteḥ
atas yaḥ iṣṭhyā iti vat kāla saṃbandha mātra karaṇāt darśa pūrṇamāsa nāmaka tva sidhyā tad siddhiḥ iti arthaḥ
tau abrūtām iti asya arthavādasya api vidhi ekavākyatayā tad viśiṣṭa vidhinā paurṇamāsī kāla upāṃśu tva antarāla viśiṣṭa yāga bhāvanā bodhaka tvāt
svatantra vidhi tva abhāvasya vidhi rasāyane api upapādita tvāt utpatti śiṣṭa paurṇamāsī kālaka tvena upāśuyāja phala saṃbandha siddhiḥ

original: ata eva śiro vā etadyajñasyetyāgneyādiprāyapāṭhopyupapadyate ityādi nirūpaṇam) naceti //
analyzed: atas eva śiraḥ vai etat yajñasya iti āgneya ādi prāya pāṭhaḥ upi upapadyate ityādi nirūpaṇam na ca iti
naca paurṇamāsī kāla vidhi vaiyarthya āpattyā eva vilambita kālasya api upāṃśuyājasya phala saṃbandha upapattiḥ

original: antarālakālasya paurṇamāsyāmivāmāvāsyāyāmapi sattvena tatrāpi tadanuṣṭhānavyāvṛttyarthatvena tatsārthakyāt /
analyzed: antarāla kālasya paurṇamāsyām iva amāvāsyāyām api sattvena tatra api tad anuṣṭhāna vyāvṛtti artha tvena tad sārthakyāt
atas katham phala saṃbandha prayojana tvam iti āśaṅkā arthaḥ
te vārtika darśanāt iti

original: apica jāmi vā etadityetadapi “ājyasyaiva nāvupāṃśu paurṇamāsyāṃ yajanni“ti prakṛtyāmnānāt
analyzed: apica jāmi vai etat iti etat api ājyasya eva nau upāṃśu paurṇamāsyām yajan iti prakṛti āmnānāt

original: paurṇamāsyāmeva vidadhātīti gamyata iti daśamāntyādhikaraṇavārtikadarśanāt asyaca
analyzed: paurṇamāsyām eva vidadhāti iti gamyate iti daśama antya adhikaraṇa vārtika darśanāt asya ca
svatantra vidhi unnāyaka tva kalpane prayojana abhāvāt upāṃśuyājam antarā iti vidhi ekavākyatayā
paurṇamāsī kāla upāṃśu tva antarāla kāla viśiṣṭa yāga bhāvanā vidhi pratīteḥ utpatti śiṣṭa kālaka tvena āgneya ādi vat eva
phala saṃbandha upapattiḥ amāvāsyāyām tad nivṛttiḥ ca sidhyati iti arthaḥ
utpatti vākyena eva vidheya tvāt iti uktyā ca yā paurṇamāsī vākyasya svatantra vidhi tva abhāve
sati paurṇamāsī vākye pūrva vidhi tvam aṅgīkṛtya apūrva vidhi lakṣaṇa avyāptiḥ upapāditā vidhi rasāyane
sā nirastā iti sūcitam

original: svayamapi vidhirasāyane tathaiva phalasaṃbandhopapattaye darśitatvena pūrvāparavirodhācca /
analyzed: svayam api vidhi rasāyane tathā eva phala saṃbandha upapattaye darśita tvena pūrva apara virodhāt ca

original: asmiṃśca pakṣe agnīṣomīyāṃśepi niyamavidhitvasaṃbhave 'pi “viṣṇurupāṃśu yaṣṭavyaḥ” ityādijñāpakabalādeva tannirāsenānuvādatvaṃ,
analyzed: asmin ca pakṣe agnīṣomīya aṃśe api niyama vidhi tva saṃbhave viṣṇuḥ upāṃśu yaṣṭavyaḥ ityādi jñāpaka balāt eva tad nirāsena anuvāda tvam
tathā upāṃśu padena eva upāṃśu tva vidhi upapatteḥ na upāṃśu padasya guṇa vidhi tvam

original: apitu avyutpannaṃ tatprakhyanyāyena vā nāmadheyamityapi dhyeyam /
analyzed: apitu avyutpannam tad prakhya nyāyena vā nāmadheyam iti api dhyeyam

original: evañca “śiro vā etadyajñasya kriyate yadāgneyo hṛdayamupāṃśuyājaḥ pādāvagnīṣomīya”
analyzed: evam ca śiraḥ vai etat yajñasya kriyate yat āgneyaḥ hṛdayam upāṃśuyājaḥ pādau agnīṣomīya
iti arthavāde upāṃśuyāja tva avacchedena pradhāna prāya pāṭhaḥ u pi upapannaḥ bhavati iti abhipretya
samudāya anuvāda tva nirāsam upasaṃharati atas na ayam iti
pūrva uttara pakṣa prayojanam
spaṣṭam iti
pūrvapakṣe trayāṇām prādhānyāt anuṣṭhānam
siddhānte tu ekasya eva devatā vikalpena iti spaṣṭam iti arthaḥ
iti caturtham upāṃśuyāja adhikaraṇam

original: ) (a.2 pā.2 adhi.5) tatraiva “āghāramāghārayatī“ti śrute “agnihotraṃ juhotī” tyatra
analyzed: tatra eva āghāram āghārayati iti śrute agnihotram juhoti iti atra
ca pūrvavat vākya bhedasya ṛjum āghārayati santatam āghārayati
dadhnā juhoti payasā juhoti ityādi vākya vihita karmaṇām yathāyogam samudāya anuvādaka tva upapattiḥ
dadhi ādi vākyānām nirvyāpāre guṇa mātre vidhi anvaya asaṃbhavena avaśyam guṇa viśiṣṭa karma vidhāyaka tvāt
atas ca rūpa abhāvāt bhedaka pramāṇa abhāvāt ca agnihotra vākye āghāra vākye vā na karma antaram
apitu teṣām eva samudāya siddhi artham anuvādaḥ
tad prayojanam ca sarveṣām eva agnihotra saṃjñaka tvena phala saṃbandha siddhiḥ
itarathā agni devatya homasya eva tad āpattiḥ
āghāra vākye samudāya anuvāda prayojanam tu kaustubhe draṣṭavyam
na ca dadhi ādi homeṣu devatā ādi abhāvaḥ
samudāya anuvāda balena eka prayoga vidhi parigraha avagateḥ sakṛt anuṣṭhānena agni ādi homa aṅga bhūta devatāyāḥ
prasaṅgena dadhi ādi homa upakāraka tva upapatteḥ iti prāpte sarvatra guṇa mātra vidhānena
tṛtīya vidhi prakāra upapattau pañcama vidhi prakāra aṅgīkaraṇasya anyāyya tvāt na dadhi ādi vākyeṣu
viśiṣṭa karma vidhānam
na ca guṇe vidhi anvaya anupapattiḥ

original: homakarmakaguṇakaraṇakabhāvanāyāmeva vidhyanvaye 'pi prāptāprāptavivekena vidhiphalasyājñātajñāpanarūpasya bhāvanāyāḥ svarūpeṇa prāptatayā
analyzed: homa karmaka guṇa karaṇaka bhāvanāyām eva vidhi anvaye pi prāpta aprāpta vivekena vidhi phalasya ajñāta jñāpana rūpasya bhāvanāyāḥ svarūpeṇa prāpta tayā

original: ataeva sarvatra prātītike viśiṣṭabhāvanāvidhāne 'pi phalamādāyaiva ṣaḍvidhiprakārāsteṣāṃ cottarottarasya daurbalyaṃ pūrvamuktam /
analyzed: ataeva sarvatra prātītike viśiṣṭa bhāvanā vidhāne pi phalam ādāya eva ṣaṭ vidhi prakārāḥ teṣām ca uttarottarasya daurbalyam pūrvam uktam
atas ca prāpti abhāvāt eva samudāya anuvāda tva asaṃbhavāt ādya vidhi vidhayā karma vidhī eva āghāra agnihotra vākye
na ca rūpa jñāna abhāvāt karma vidhi anupapattiḥ
tasya anuṣṭhānam prati kāraṇa tve pi śābdabodham prati akāraṇa tvāt

original: ataśca vijātīyahomatvāvacchinnasya vidhāne 'vagate vākyantareṇa rūpalābhe 'pi na kācitkṣatiḥ /
analyzed: atas ca vijātīya homa tva avacchinnasya vidhāne vagate vākya antareṇa rūpa lābhe na kācid kṣatiḥ
prayojanam dadhi ādi dravya samuccaya vikalpābhyām spaṣṭam
iti pañcamam āghāra agnihotra adhikaraṇam
pūrva adhikaraṇe tavya pratyayasya vidhāyaka a tva abhāvāt vākya bheda āpatteḥ stuteḥ ca pratīteḥ yuktam arthavāda tvam
iha tu dadhi ādi vākyānām dadhi ādi guṇa aprāpteḥ anuvāda tvena arthavāda tayā ekavākya tva anupapatteḥ bhinna vākya tayā
siddhānte pi vidhi tvasya aṅgīkārāt śuddha guṇa vidheḥ ca vakṣyamāṇa rītyā asaṃbhavena viśiṣṭa karma vidhi avaśyaṃbhāvena
yuktaḥ samudāya anuvādaḥ iti pūrvapakṣa utthānāt pratyudāharaṇa rūpām anantara saṅgatim karma bheda abheda phalaka tvāt ca

original: prakṛtasaṅgatiṃ ca sūcayan udāharaṇapūrvakaṃ pūrvapakṣamāha --------- tatraiveti //
analyzed: prakṛta saṅgatim ca sūcayan udāharaṇa pūrvakam pūrvapakṣam āha tatra eva iti
āghāra vākyasya samudāya anuvāda tve

original: api tadanantarapaṭhitordhvādivākyavihitayāgānāmeva samudāyānuvādena tataḥ pūrvamagnisaṃmārgavidhinā vyavadhānena pāṭhaḥ,
analyzed: api tad anantara paṭhita ūrdhva ādi vākya vihita yāgānām eva samudāya anuvādena tatas pūrvam agni saṃmārga vidhinā vyavadhānena pāṭhaḥ
tatra eva āghāra vākya vihita āghārasya api iti sūcayitum prakaraṇa anupraveśa dyotakam tatra eva iti uktam
pūrvavat iti anena pūrva ukta saṅgatiḥ sūcitā
bhāvanāyāḥ vyāpāra viṣaya tvena dadhi ādi vākye pi vyāpāra vidhi avaśyaṃbhāve dadhi ādīnām utpatti anvayi guṇa tvena
vihita vidhāna ayogāt karma bheda avaśyaṃbhāve gnihotra vākye samudāya anuvāda tvam eva ityādi nirūpaṇam
nirvyāpāraḥ iti
vidheḥ cetana pravartanā rūpa tvāt tasyāḥ ca pravṛtti anukūla vyāpāra tvena dhātvartha avacchinna bhāvanā viṣaya tvasya eka pada upātta tva pratyāsattyā
kḷptasya tyāga ayogāt vyāpāra anātmaka guṇe vidhi asaṃbhavāt viśiṣṭa vidhi āvaśyaka tve vihitasya
punar vidhi asaṃbhavena abhyāsāt bhedaḥ
na ca vihitasya api phala nimitta ādi saṃbandha vat dadhi ādi saṃbandhena punar vidhāna upapatteḥ anya para tvam

original: svata utpannasyāpi phalādisaṃbandhe viniyogasya vidhyupapattāvapi dravyādisaṃbandhe utpattyanvayiguṇatvenotpatterāvaśyakatvena prāptāyāḥ punarvidhānānupapatterbhedasyāvaśyakatvāt
analyzed: svatas utpannasya api phala ādi saṃbandhe viniyogasya vidhi upapattau api dravya ādi saṃbandhe utpatti anvayi guṇa tvena utpatteḥ āvaśyaka tvena prāptāyāḥ punar vidhāna anupapatteḥ bhedasya āvaśyaka tvāt

original: ato dadhyādivākyeṣu “yadagnaye ca prajāpataye ca” “agnirjyotirjyotiragniḥ svāhā” ityādivākyeṣu ca svarūpavatsu sarvatra guṇādabhyāsādvā karmabhedaḥ
analyzed: atas dadhi ādi vākyeṣu yat agnaye ca prajāpataye ca agniḥ jyotiḥ jyotiḥ agniḥ svāhā ityādi vākyeṣu ca sva rūpavatsu sarvatra guṇāt abhyāsāt vā karma bhedaḥ
na hi agnihotra ādi vākyeṣu anupātta rūpeṣu karma vidhiḥ
vākya antareṇa api rūpa alābhāt ca

original: naca -------- evaṃ dadhyādihomeṣu svavākyato 'gnyādihomeṣu cākṣepeṇa dravyasya prāptāvapi
analyzed: na ca evam dadhi ādi homeṣu sva vākyataḥ gni ādi homeṣu ca ākṣepeṇa dravyasya prāptau api
sva vākye devatā bhāvāt vākya antara upātta devatā mātra vidheḥ tava aniṣṭa tvāt ākṣepeṇa devatāyāḥ
aprāpteḥ katham rūpavat tvam
iti vācyam eka phala sādhanānām eṣām eka prayoga vidhi parigraheṇa sānnāyya vat sakṛt anuṣṭhāna upapatteḥ hema antareṣu api apekṣitānām
dravya devatā ādīnām prasaṅgena upakāraka tva upapattyā tad saṃbhavāt
aniruktaḥ vai prajāpatiḥ a nirdiṣṭa dravyake ājyam iti sāmānya vacanābhyām yathā apekṣita dravya devatā upapatteḥ ca
nahi rūpavat tā jñānam vidheya tā jñānam prati kāraṇam

original: ayogyatāniścayābhāvamātreṇaiva yogyatāyāḥ jñānābhāve 'pi śrutaśabdāt śābdabodhasyānubhavikatvāt tajjñānasya kāraṇatvānupapatteḥ /
analyzed: ayogya tā niścaya abhāva mātreṇa eva yogyatāyāḥ jñāna abhāve pi śruta śabdāt śābda bodhasya ānubhavika tvāt tad jñānasya kāraṇa tva anupapatteḥ
atas rūpavat tā niścaya abhāva mātreṇa vidheya tva upapatteḥ ekatara rūpa anvaya mātreṇa api ca itara karma vyatirikta tva siddheḥ anuṣṭhāna kāle tad apekṣāyām pūrva ukta rītyā
tad upapattiḥ
agnihotra vākye tu yadi api agni prajāpatibhyām tat saṃbhavati
tathā api samudāya anuvāda tvena api upapattau adṛṣṭa bheda āpādaka karmāntara aṅgī kārasya ayukta tvam iti bhāvaḥ
agnihotra vākye samudāya anuvāda prayojanam
evam ca dadhi ādi vākya vihita homānām havana rūpa eka jātīya eka deśa paṭhita tva lakṣaṇa eka dharma yoga ākhyena

original: pracayena dhātvarthasamudāyasyeva bhāvanāsamudāyasyāpi lābhāt yadāgnihotravākye juhuyāditi samudāyānuvādaḥ,
analyzed: pracayena dhātvartha samudāyasya iva bhāvanā samudāyasya api lābhāt yadā agnihotra vākye juhuyāt iti samudāya anuvādaḥ
tadā agnihotra padasya vaiśvadeva pada vat samudāya anuvāda vaiyarthya bhiyā agni devatya an agni devatya homa mātra paratva upapatteḥ
phala nimitta saṃbandha upapatti rūpam samudāya anuvāda prayojanam āha tad prayojanam iti
evam ūrdhva ādi vākyeṣu api ūrdhva tva ādi guṇaiḥ eva dravya devatā rūpaiḥ upāṃśu tvena upāṃśuyājasya iva
karma pariccheda saṃbhavāt tad tad guṇa viśiṣṭa yāgānām caturgṛhīta ājya dravyakāṇām āghārayati iti ayam
samudāya anuvādaḥ tad prayojanam yat tāvat vārtike indraḥ ūrddhvāḥ adhvaraḥ iti aghāram āghārayati iti
mantra vidhau āghāra eka tva siddhiḥ iti uktam
tad ūrdhvam āghārayati iti atra eva mantra vidhau api mantra viśiṣṭa āghārāṇām mantra varṇa kalpita indra devatāka āghāreṇa
saha prayoga vidhi avagata yaugapadya siddhi dvāra indra devatāka tva siddhi pūrvaka yāga rūpa tā siddhiḥ indra devatāka āghāreṇa
yaugapadya siddhi mātram vā prayojanam kaustubhe draṣṭavyam iti arthaḥ
agnihotra vākya sārthakya artham pañcama vidhi prakāra aneka adṛṣṭa lkapana ādi gaurava parihāra artham

original: ca dadhnā juhotītyādīnāṃ prāptāprāptavivekena guṇamātraviṣayatvenāgnihotravākya eva
analyzed: ca dadhnā juhoti ityādīnām prāpta aprāpta vivekena guṇa mātra viṣaya tvena agnihotra vākye eva
homa vidhiḥ iti siddhānta upapādanam
agnihotra ādi vākye eva karma vidhiḥ
anyathā vaiyarthya āpatteḥ
na ca samudāya anuvādaka tvena arthavat tā iti vācyam
dadhi ādi vākyeṣu anekeṣu viśiṣṭa vidhi āśrayaṇe pañcama vidhi prakāra āpatteḥ aneka adṛṣṭa kalpanāyāḥ ca
karma vidhi ayogena samudāya anuvāda asaṃbhavāt iti abhipretya siddhāntam āha sarvatra iti

original: yadyapi guṇasya sākṣāt paraṃparayā vā vidhyanvayaḥ;
analyzed: yadi api guṇasya sākṣāt paraṃparayā vā vidhi anvayaḥ
tathā api guṇasya kāraka tayā bhāvanāyām prakāra tvena anvayāt prathamatas tādṛśa guṇa viśiṣṭa dhātvartha avacchinna bhāvanā vidhāyakasya api

original: vidheḥ prāptāprāptavivekena phalatoguṇaviṣayatvāt prāptāyā api dhātvarthāvacchinnabhāvanāyāḥ
analyzed: vidheḥ prāpta aprāpta vivekena phalataḥ guṇa viṣaya tvāt prāptāyāḥ api dhātvartha avacchinna bhāvanāyāḥ
guṇa viśiṣṭa tvena punar vidhāne viśeṣya aṃśe jñāta jñāpana phala abhāve viśeṣaṇa aṃśe
tad karaṇena vidhi sārthakya upapatteḥ saṃbhavati eva tṛtīya vidhi prakāreṇa guṇa aṃśe pi
vidhiḥ iti abhipretya āha homa karmaka iti

original: utpattivākye karmaṇaḥ karaṇatvenānvaye 'pi guṇavidhau tasya prāptatvādanūdyamānāyāṃ bhāvanāyāmapekṣitatvānmatvarthalakṣaṇāyāśca karmatvenaivānvayamabhipretya  #
analyzed: utpatti vākye karmaṇaḥ karaṇa tvena anvaye guṇa vidhau tasya prāptatvāt anūdyamānāyām bhāvanāyām apekṣita tvāt matvartha lakṣaṇāyāḥ ca karma tvena eva anvayam abhipretya
homa karmakā iti uktam
ṣaṣ vidhi prakāra āśrayaṇasya sarvatra viśiṣṭa vidhau api na virodhaḥ vārtika avirodhaḥ ca

original: nanu sarvatraiva viśiṣṭabhāvanāvidhānena vidherekarūpatve sati ṣaḍvidhatvamudbhidadhikaraṇe kathaṃ pratipāditamityata āha -------- ata eveti
analyzed: nanu sarvatra eva viśiṣṭa bhāvanā vidhānena vidheḥ eka rūpa tve sati ṣaḍvidha tvam udbhid adhikaraṇe katham pratipāditam iti atas āha atas eva iti
teṣām ca iti
aneka viśeṣaṇa vidhi kalpanā kṛta gaurava tad abhāva kṛta lāghavābhyām prābalyam pūrva pūrvasya uttara uttarasya ca daurbalyam uktam
ye tu prātipadika artha dhātvarthayoḥ paraspara anvayena bhāvanā nairapekṣyeṇa eva aṣṭau vidhi prakārān upapādayanti
teṣām nirāsaḥ ca vāritaka kṛtā kṛtaḥ
na tu asmat upapādita rītyā ukta ṣaḍvidha prakārasya iti arthaḥ
vidvat vākyena vihite pi karmaṇi āgneya vākyena viśiṣṭa vidhi śaṅkā tad nirāsau prāsaṅgikau

original: yadyapi cānayā rītyā vidvadvākyavihitāyā bhāvanāyāḥ prāptāyā apyāgneyādivākye dravyadevatāviśiṣṭatvena punarvidhānaṃ saṃbhavati;
analyzed: yadi api ca anayā rītyā vidvat vākya vihitāyāḥ bhāvanāyāḥ prāptāyāḥ api āgneya ādi vākye dravya devatā viśiṣṭa tvena punar vidhānam saṃbhavati
tathā api bhāvanāyām aneka guṇa vaiśiṣṭya saṃbhave pi śruta vidheḥ aneka guṇa viṣaya tva svīkāre āvṛtti prasaṅgāt vākya bhedāt na tad svīkāraḥ
yadi api śruta vidheḥ śabda bodhya arthasya viśiṣṭa rūpeṇa aikyāt na avṛttiḥ
tathā api tatra tātparya viṣayībhūta artha bhedena gaurava lakṣaṇaḥ vākya bhedaḥ sti eva

original: ata evoktaṃ vārtike ---------- vidhitve bhāvanāsthe 'pi tādarthyaṃ pravibhajyate /
analyzed: atas eva uktam vārtike vidhi tve bhāvanā sthe tādarthyam pravibhajyate
viśeṣaṇa phale ca asmin vākya bhedaḥ bhaviṣyati iti
prakṛte tu eka dadhi ādi guṇa viṣayatvāt na tad prasaṅgaḥ iti āśayaḥ
dadhi ādi vākyeṣu kevala guṇa vidhi tve pi yat agnaye ca iti vākyayoḥ aneka guṇa vidhāne vākya bhedāt
agneya vākye iva caturṇām karmaṇām vidhāna asya āvaśyaka tvena agnihotra vākya tad anuvāda tva śaṅkā parihārau
nanu dadhi ādi vākyeṣu tṛtīya vidhi prakāra āśrayaṇena karma vidhīnām abhāvāt
samudāya anuvāda tva asaṃbhave pi yat agnaye ca iti vākyayoḥ prāpta karma anuvādena aneka guṇa vidhi asaṃbhave
karma antara vidhānasya āvaśyaka tve utpatti vākya śiṣṭa devatā samuccaya anurodhena āgneya vat ekasmin vākye
karma dvaya vidhi avagateḥ caturṇām karmaṇām agnihotram juhoti iti samudāya anuvādaḥ bhaviṣyati
iti ced na
tatra api mantra varṇataḥ eva agni ādi prāpteḥ tad samuccita prajāpati mātra vidhānena vākya bheda aprasakteḥ tad prakhyā adhikaraṇe
ukta tvena karma antara vidhi aprasaktyā tṛtīya vidhi prakāra upapatteḥ iti abhipretya samudāya anuvāda tva nirāsam upasaṃharan agnihotra ādi vākya
eva karma vidhim upapādayati atas ca iti
agnihotra āghāra vākyayoḥ pūrva uttara pakṣa prayojana nirūpaṇam
dadhi ādi dravya samuccaya iti

original: agnihotravākye samudāyānuvādapūrvapakṣe dadhyādidaśadravyāṇi sānnāyyavatsahopādāya saṃpratipannadevatākatvāt sakṛddhoma iti dadhyādisamuccayaḥ
analyzed: agnihotra vākye samudāya anuvāda pūrvapakṣe dadhi ādi daśa dravyāṇi sānnāyya vat saha upādāya saṃpratipanna devatāka tvāt sakṛt homaḥ iti dadhi ādi samuccayaḥ
siddhānte ekasmin eva agnihotra karmaṇi teṣām vikalpaḥ iti arthaḥ
etat ca āghāra vākye pūrva uttara pakṣa prayojanasya api upalakṣaṇam

original: tacca pūrvapakṣe ūrddhvatvādīnāṃ madhye yasyaiva daivādantarāyastadordhvatvaikābhivyaṅgyajātyavacchinnasyāniṣpatteḥ punastatkarmaṇi āvṛttiḥ
analyzed: tat ca pūrvapakṣe ūrddhva tva ādīnām madhye yasya eva daivāt antarāyaḥ tadā ūrdhva tva eka abhivyaṅgya jāti avacchinnasya aniṣpatteḥ punar tad karmaṇi āvṛttiḥ
siddhānte tu karma bheda abhāvāt guṇa anurodhena pradhāna āvṛtteḥ anyāyya tvāt na avṛttiḥ
kintu guṇa lopa nimitta prāyaścitta mātram iti jñeya ayam
iti pañcamam āghāra agnihotra adhikaraṇam
a pā dravya saṃyogāt
agnīṣomīyam paśum ālabheta iti śrutam
tathā somena yajeta ti ca
tatra ādya vidhi prakārasya asaṃbhavāt na pūrvavat karma vidhi tvam
apitu samudāya anuvāda tvam eva

original: karmaprāptistu paśau “hṛdayasyāgre 'vadyati atha jihvāyā” ityādibhiḥ utpattiśiṣṭapaśusādhye yāge hṛdayādīnāṃ sādhanatvānupapatterna taduddeśenāvadānākhyasaṃskāravidhiḥ
analyzed: karma prāptiḥ tu paśau hṛdayasya agre vadyati atha jihvāyāḥ ityādibhiḥ utpatti śiṣṭa paśu sādhye yāge hṛdaya ādīnām sādhanatva anupapatteḥ na tad uddeśena avadāna ākhya saṃskāra vidhiḥ
atas vihitānām hṛdaya ādi avadānānām paśu prabhava dravya vṛtti avadāna tva sādṛśyāt sānnāyya avadāna prakṛtika tva avagateḥ
sānnāyya vat eva hṛdaya ādīnām yāga sādhanatvasya pūtīka vat anumānāt yāvat hṛdaya ādi yāgāḥ

original: eva vidhīyante tāṃśca lakṣaṇayā ālabhatinā anūdyāgnīṣomau devatā vidhīyate /
analyzed: eva vidhīyante tān ca lakṣaṇayā ālabhatinā anūdya agnīṣomau devatā vidhīyate
paśu padam ca hṛdaya ādīnām chāga prakṛtika tvasya mantra varṇa prāpta tvāt lakṣaṇayā hṛdaya ādi param
athavā hṛdaya ādi vākya vihita avadāna ākṣipta sparśān eva ālabhatinā śakyā eva anūdya

original: paśupadalakṣitahṛdayādīnāṃ pratyekaṃ devatāsaṃbandhe kṛte tāvanto yāgā devatāsaṃbandhakalpitāstenaiva
analyzed: paśu pada lakṣita hṛdaya ādīnām pratyekam devatā saṃbandhe kṛte tāvantaḥ yāgāḥ devatā saṃbandha kalpitāḥ tena eva
vidhinā vidhīyante
sarvathā paśu padam samudāya anuvādaḥ
tathā some pi aindra vāyavam gṛhṇāti maitrāvaruṇam gṛhṇāti ityādi vākyaiḥ dravya devatā saṃbandha anumita yāga vidhānam
grahaṇe devatā anvaya anupapatteḥ

original: dravyaṃ “cāṇvyā dhārayā gṛhṇātī“ti prakṛtaṃ dhārāsaparya dravaṃ taddhitopāttam /
analyzed: dravyam ca aṇvyā dhārayā gṛhṇāti iti prakṛtam dhārā saparya dravam taddhita upāttam
soma vākye tu tad prakṛti tvena somalatā  vidhiḥ vrīhi vidhi vat

original: “somamabhiṣuṇotī” tyādisaṃskāravidhyanyathānupapattyaiva vā “adhvaryuṃ vṛṇīta” itivatsomaprāpteḥ somapadaṃ nāmadheyam /
analyzed: somam abhiṣuṇoti ityādi saṃskāra vidhi anyathā anupapattyā eva vai adhvaryum vṛṇīte iti vat soma prāpteḥ soma padam nāmadheyam
sarvathā yajiḥ samudāya anuvādaḥ
tad prayojanam ca asmin pakṣe soma dravyaka yāga mātra anuvādāt astuta śastrāṇām api phala saṃbandhaḥ
jyotiṣṭoma padam ca vaiśvadeva vat gauṇam

original: samudāyānuvādābhāve hi tadvaśāt sastutaśastrāṇāmeva yāgānāṃ phalasaṃbandhāpattiḥ teṣāmeva jyotīrūpastomasaṃbandhātpattiḥ /
analyzed: samudāya anuvāda abhāve hi tad vaśāt sa stuta śastrāṇām eva yāgānām phala saṃbandha āpattiḥ teṣām eva jyotīrūpa stoma saṃbandha ātpattiḥ
siddhānte tu yāgasya ekatvāt phala vākya stha yajinā abhyāsa lakṣaṇa āpatteḥ vijātīya yāga tva avacchinnasya eva phala saṃbandhaḥ
jyotiṣṭoma pade bahuvrīhi arthaḥ tu sva saṃbandhi abhyāsa ghaṭita samudāya āśraya tva rūpaḥ

original: ataḥ samudāyānuvādāveva tāviti prāpte ---------- paśupade hṛdayādilakṣaṇāyāṃ pramāṇābhāvāttatraiva viśiṣṭayāgavidhiḥ /
analyzed: atas samudāya anuvādau eva tau iti prāpte paśu pade hṛdaya ādi lakṣaṇāyām pramāṇa abhāvāt tatra eva viśiṣṭa yāga vidhiḥ
hṛdaya ādi vākyaiḥ ca hṛdaya ādi uddeśena saṃskāra mātram
paśoḥ ca na sākṣāt haviṣṭvena vidhānam
kintu viśasana ādi vidhi rūpa tātparya grāhaka anurodhena hṛdaya ādi prakṛti tvena eva
karaṇa tvasya sākṣāt iva paramparayā api tātparya grāhake sati upapatteḥ

original: ataevātideśaprāptāvadānasaṃbandho 'pi hṛdayādīnāṃ haviṣṭvasiddhyarthastaditarāṅgānāṃ haviṣṭvaparisaṃkhyārthaścetyādi kaustubhe draṣṭavyam /
analyzed: ataeva atideśa prāpta avadāna saṃbandhaḥ hṛdaya ādīnām haviḥ tva siddhi arthaḥ tad itara aṅgānām haviḥ tva parisaṃkhyā arthaḥ ca ityādi kaustubhe draṣṭavyam
some pi na aindra vāyava ādi vākyaiḥ yāga vidhiḥ gauravāt
kintu devatā viśiṣṭa grahaṇasya eva taddhita upātta dravya uddeśena vidhiḥ

original: saṃbhavati ca devatātvasya nirūpakatāsaṃbandhena grahaṇavaiśiṣṭyāyoge 'pi grahaṇakālīnoccāraṇakarmībhūtavṛttitvasaṃbandhena grahaṇe vaiśiṣṭyam
analyzed: saṃbhavati ca devatā tvasya nirūpakatā saṃbandhena grahaṇa vaiśiṣṭya ayoge pi grahaṇa kālīna uccāraṇa karmībhūta vṛtti tva saṃbandhena grahaṇe vaiśiṣṭyam

original: ataśca devatāyāḥ grahaṇāṅgabhūtāyā api yāgāpekṣāyāṃ somavākyavihitayāgasyaiva devatāpekṣasyopapādakatvamātrakalpanāllāghavam,
analyzed: atas ca devatāyāḥ grahaṇa aṅga bhūtāyāḥ api yāga apekṣāyām soma vākya vihita yāgasya eva devatā apekṣasya upapādaka tva mātra kalpanāt lāghavam

original: somapadantu saṃskāravidhyanyathānupapattyā saṃbhavatprāptikatve 'pi saktuvyāvṛttiphalakasomaniyamārthaṃ na virudhyate /
analyzed: soma padantu saṃskāra vidhi anyathā anupapattyā saṃbhavat prāptika tve pi saktu vyāvṛtti phalaka soma niyama artham na virudhyate

original: yathā caivaṃ sati grahaṇānāṃ samuccayo yāgasya ca pratigrahaṇamāvṛttistathā sarvaṃ kaustubha eva nirūpitam /
analyzed: yathā ca evam sati grahaṇānām samuccayaḥ yāgasya ca pratigrahaṇam āvṛttiḥ tathā sarvam kaustubhe eva nirūpitam
prayojanam paśu vikāre hṛdaya ādi yāga anyatama prakṛtika tvāt na ekādaśa avadāna gaṇa prāptiḥ pūrvapakṣe
siddhānte tu sā iti draṣṭavyam
some ca avyakta tva siddhiḥ eva
iti ṣaṣṭham paśu soma adhikaraṇam
dadhi ādi vākyaiḥ agnihotra vākya vihita karma anuvādena guṇa mātra vidhānasya kartum śakya tvena
prakṛta karma abhāvāt samudāya anuvāda tva asaṃbhave pi iha paśu soma vākya vihita yāgīya dravya uddeśena
hṛdaya ādi viṣayaka avadāna ādi vidhibhiḥ avadāna ādi saṃskāra vidhi anupapatteḥ karma vidhi avaśyaṃbhāvāt
prakṛta karma sattve bhavatu samudāya anuvāda tvam iti evam pūrvapakṣa utthānena pratyudāharaṇa saṃgatim
sūcayan udāharaṇam āha agnīṣomīyam iti
pūrva adhikaraṇe āghāra vākyasya iva atra soma vākyasya prāthamya śaṅkā parihārābhyām paśu vākya prāthamye nimitta upapādanam
pūrva sūtre āghāra agnihotrayoḥ aṅga aṅgi bhāva abhāvena abhyarhitam pūrvam nipatati iti asya aviṣaya tvāt
alpa a c tara tvena āghāra śabdasya pūrvanipāte pi iha paśu śabdasya dhi anta tve pi lakṣaṇa hetvoḥ

original: kriyāyāḥ” ityatra dhyantasya paranipātena dhyantatvasya niyāmakatvāsaṃbhavena somasya
analyzed: kriyāyāḥ iti atra dhi antasya para nipātena dhi anta tvasya niyāmaka tva asaṃbhavena somasya

original: prādhānyādabhyarhitatvena sūtre pūrvanipātaprāptāvapi nyāyenopapādake śāstre paśau
analyzed: prādhānyāt abhyarhita tvena sūtre pūrva nipāta prāptau api nyāyena upapādake śāstre paśau
pūrvapakṣasya kliṣṭa tvena nyāya vyutpādana ādara viṣaya tvena abhyarhita tvam abhipretya paśu śabdasya

original: prathamagrahaṇāt tadabhiprāyeṇa svayamapi somavākyāt prāk paśuvākyamudāhṛtam //
analyzed: prathama grahaṇāt tad abhiprāyeṇa svayam api soma vākyāt prāk paśu vākyam udāhṛtam
agnīṣomīya vākye prathama vidhi prakāra asaṃbhavāt hṛdaya ādīnām utpatti śiṣṭa guṇa avarodha nyāyena paśu yāge katham api upayogaḥ
agnihotra vākye śuddha dhātvartha vidhāna rūpa ādya prakārasya saṃbhave pi iha dravya devatā upādānena
viśiṣṭa vidheḥ siddhānte pi āśrayaṇāt tad lābhena karma vidhi tva anupapatteḥ samudāya anuvāda tvam eva iti
pūrvapakṣam āha tatra iti
yadi api agnīṣomīya vākye dravya devatā saṃbandhāt āgneya vākye iva lakṣaṇayā yāga vidhānam upapadyate

original: tathāpi tatrotpattiśiṣṭasya paśoravadānena nāśāpatteḥ śrutayāgasādhanatābādhānna hṛdayādivākyaistadīyadravyoddeśenāvadāna- saṃskāravidhisaṃbhavaḥ
analyzed: tathā api tatra utpatti śiṣṭasya paśoḥ avadānena nāśa āpatteḥ śruta yāga sādhanatā bādhāt na hṛdaya ādi vākyaiḥ tadīya dravya uddeśena avadāna saṃskāra vidhi saṃbhavaḥ
dvitīyā nirdiṣṭānām hṛdaya ādīnām eva saṃskārya tva pratīteḥ ca
paśu avaruddha tvena saktūnām iva upayoga kalpanā anupapatteḥ ca
upayoga kalpane vā atideśāt eva tad prāpteḥ punar vidhi vaiyarthyāt ca

original: ato hṛdayādyuddeśena vihitānāmavadānānāṃ saṃskāratvādyāgasādhanatvānumānena tatra karmapratītirityabhipretya pūrvapakṣamupapādayati -----------  #
analyzed: atas hṛdaya ādi uddeśena vihitānām avadānānām saṃskāra tvāt yāga sādhanatva anumānena tatra karma pratītiḥ iti abhipretya pūrvapakṣam upapādayati  /
atra hi iti pūtīka vat anumānāt iti
pūtīka vākye soma abhiṣavasya iva atra sānnāyya avadāna pratyabhijñānāt yāga kalpanā upapattiḥ

original: yathā pūtīkānabhiṣuṇuyāditi pūtīkasaṃskārābhiṣavavidheḥ yāgasādhanatvaṃ vinānupapadyamānatvena pūtīkānāṃ yāgasādhanatvānumānaṃ,
analyzed: yathā pūtīkān abhiṣuṇuyāt iti pūtīka saṃskāra abhiṣava vidheḥ yāga sādhanatvam vinā anupapadyamāna tvena pūtīkānām yāga sādhanatva anumānam
tadvat iha api iti arthaḥ

original: yadyapi pūtīkeṣu somābhiṣavasyaiva pratyabhijñāyamānasya pūtīkasaṃbandhitvena vidhānāttasya
analyzed: yadi api pūtīkeṣu soma abhiṣavasya eva pratyabhijñāyamānasya pūtīka saṃbandhi tvena vidhānāt tasya
ca yāgīya dravya saṃskāraka tva darśanāt pūtīkānām yāgīya tva anumāne pi iha sānnāyya avadānasya eva
yāgīya dravya saṃskāraka tvena kḷpta syātna apratyabhijñāyamāna tvena hṛdaya ādi uddeśena vidhāna ayogāt na
teṣām yāgīya tva anumānam sukaram
tathā api atra prakaraṇa antara nyāyena avadāna antarasya eva vidhānāt tasya ca prāṇi dravyaka avadāna tva sāmānyāt
sānnāyya avadāna prakṛti tva avagateḥ atideśena yāgīya dravya vṛtti tvasya api prāpteḥ pratyavadānam avadeya dravyāṇām
yāga sādhanatva kalpanayā yāga bhedaḥ vagantavyaḥ iti evam upapādayitum paśu prabhava ityādi uktam
asmin ca pakṣe samudāya anuvāda rūpeṇa agnīṣoma vākya gata yajinā sarveṣām anuvādāt yāga uddeśena devatā vidhiḥ iti bhāvaḥ

original: nanu -------- evamagnīṣomadevatāyāḥ paśuprakṛtitvasyaca vidhāne vākyabhedasya devatātaddhitasya paśupadasāmānādhikaraṇyānupapatteśca prasaktirityata  #
analyzed: nanu evam agnīṣoma devatāyāḥ paśu prakṛti tvasya ca vidhāne vākya bhedasya devatā taddhitasya paśu pada sāmānādhikaraṇya anupapatteḥ ca prasaktiḥ iti atas
āha paśu padam ca iti

original: chāgasya haviṣa iti mantravarṇasya hṛdayādiyāgāṅgatvāt tata eva paśuprakṛtitvaprāpterlakṣaṇayā hṛdayādipadasyānuvādāddevatāmātravidhānena tadaprasaktiḥ
analyzed: chāgasya haviṣaḥ iti mantra varṇasya hṛdaya ādi yāga aṅga tvāt tatas eva paśu prakṛti tva prāpteḥ lakṣaṇayā hṛdaya ādi padasya anuvādāt devatā mātra vidhānena tad aprasaktiḥ
evam ca paśu vākye viśiṣṭa vidhi abhāvāt lāghavam api iti arthaḥ
agnīṣomīya vākyasya paśu pada lakṣita hṛdaya ādīnām devatā saṃbandha bodhana dvārā kalpita tāvat yāga paratvam iti pakṣa antara upapādanena pūrvapakṣa upasaṃhāraḥ

original: yāgīyadravyavṛttitvasya sānnāyyāvadānānaṅgatvādatideśena prāptyabhāvena yāgānumānāsaṃbhavamabhipretya pakṣāntaramāha -------- athaveti //
analyzed: yāgīya dravya vṛtti tvasya sānnāyya avadāna anaṅga tvāt atideśena prāpti abhāvena yāga anumāna asaṃbhavam abhipretya pakṣa antaram āha athavā iti
hṛdaya ādi uddeśena avadānāni eva vidhīyante

original: teṣāṃ copayogāpekṣāyāṃ paśuvākyena paśupadalakṣitahṛdayoddeśena devatāvidhāne sati
analyzed: teṣām ca upayoga apekṣāyām paśu vākyena paśu pada lakṣita hṛdaya uddeśena devatā vidhāne sati

original: dravyadevatāsaṃbhavāt tatraivāgnīṣomīyavākye āghārayatītivat yāgakalpanayopayogakalpanena yāgā vidhīyante /
analyzed: dravya devatā asaṃbhavāt tatra eva agnīṣomīya vākye āghārayati iti vat yāga kalpanayā upayoga kalpanena yāgāḥ vidhīyante
ālabhati śakya arthaḥ tu anuvādaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: evañca hṛdayasyāgre 'vadyatīti kramadarśanamekādaśa vai paśoravadānānīti samuccayadarśanañcopapadyate /
analyzed: evam ca hṛdayasya agre vadyati iti krama darśanam ekādaśa vai paśoḥ avadānāni iti samuccaya darśanam ca upapadyate

original: anyathā ekasmin yāge hṛdayādīnāṃ vikalpāpattestadanupapattirityabhipretya paśupadasya samudāyānuvādatvamupasaṃharati ---------- sarvatheti
analyzed: anyathā ekasmin yāge hṛdaya ādīnām vikalpa āpatteḥ tad anupapattiḥ iti abhipretya paśu padasya samudāya anuvāda tvam upasaṃharati sarvathā iti

original: asmiṃśca pakṣe agnīṣomavākya eva āghārayatītyatreva yāgavidhānādālabhatipadasya samudāyānuvādatvābhāvāt paśupadaṃ samudāyānuvāda ityuktam /
analyzed: asmin ca pakṣe agnīṣoma vākye eva āghārayati iti atra iva yāga vidhānāt ālabhati padasya samudāya anuvāda tva abhāvāt paśu padam samudāya anuvādaḥ iti uktam

original: tatprayojanaṃ pratyekaṃ hṛdayādīnāmuddeśena sāhityāvivakṣayā devatāsaṃbandhasiddhidvārā paścāt pratyekaṃ yāgakalpanayā ālabhatinā lakṣaṇayā  #
analyzed: tad prayojanam pratyekam hṛdaya ādīnām uddeśena sāhitya avivakṣayā devatā saṃbandha siddhi dvārā paścāt pratyekam yāga kalpanayā ālabhatinā lakṣaṇayā
teṣām yāgānām vidhāna siddhiḥ iti āśayaḥ

original: (aindravāyavādivākyeṣu yāgavidhikalpanayā prāptasarvayāgānuvādena somena yajatetivākye dhārāprakṛtitvena vrīhivatsomavidhānamiti pūrvapakṣopapādanam)
analyzed: aindra vāyava ādi vākyeṣu yāga vidhi kalpanayā prāpta sarva yāga anuvādena somena yajata iti vākye dhārā prakṛti tvena vrīhi vat soma vidhānam iti pūrvapakṣa upapādanam
aindra vāyavam ityādiṣu aindra vāyavam iti devatā taddhite indra vāyu ādīnām devatā tva pratīteḥ tasya
tyajyamāna dravya uddeśya tva rūpasya yāgam vinā grahaṇe nvaya asaṃbhavāt grahaṇena aindra vāyavam

original: kuryāditi arthānupapatteḥ dravyadevatāsaṃbandhāt gṛhṇātinā lakṣaṇayā yāgā eva vidhīyanta
analyzed: kuryāt iti artha anupapatteḥ dravya devatā saṃbandhāt gṛhṇātinā lakṣaṇayā yāgāḥ eva vidhīyanta
iti āha tathā iti

original: nanu. taddhitena dravyasāmānyāvagatāvapi viśeṣānavagame kathaṃ tatsaṃbandhabalāt yāgalakṣaṇetyata āha---------- dravyañceti //
analyzed: nanu taddhitena dravya sāmānya avagatau api viśeṣa anavagame katham tad saṃbandha balāt yāga lakṣaṇā iti atas āha dravyam ca iti

original: ataḥ “somena yajete” tyatra yāgavidhau taddhitasya dravadravyavācitvāt taduddeśena
analyzed: atas somena yajeta iti atra yāga vidhau taddhitasya drava dravya vāci tvāt tad uddeśena
vidhīyamānasya gahaṇa ākhya saṃskārasya latā uddeśena vidhāna anupapatteḥ drava dravyasya
ca bhūta bhāvi upayoga asaṃbhavena viniyoga bhaṅgasya āvaśyaka tvāt teṣu eva viśiṣṭa yāga vidhānāt
tad tad nirdiśyamāna devatā rūpa guṇāt bhinnāḥ eva yāgāḥ iti arthaḥ

original: kiṃ tarhi somena yajetetyanena vidhīyata ityapekṣāyāmāha ----------- somavākyetviti //
analyzed: kim tarhi somena yajeta iti anena vidhīyate iti apekṣāyām āha soma vākyā itu iti

original: ata eva dhārayā gṛhṇātītyatrārthaprāptagrahaṇānuvādena dhārāmātravidhāne 'pi dhārāyā
analyzed: atas eva dhārayā gṛhṇāti iti atra artha prāpta grahaṇa anuvādena dhārā mātra vidhāne dhārāyāḥ
drava dravya mātra viṣaya tvāt tad adhikāra siddheḥ aindra vāyavam iti taddhitena dhārā samartha prakṛta drava dravya abhidhānena

original: tadavaruddheṣu yāgeṣu somasya dravyatvena vidhipakṣasya prācīnairuktasyāpyasaṃbhavāt
analyzed: tad avaruddheṣu yāgeṣu somasya dravya tvena vidhi pakṣasya prācīnaiḥ uktasya api asaṃbhavāt

original: somena yajetetyanena samudāyānuvādakayajinā sarvayāgānuddiśya prakṛtitvena somavidhirnatu
analyzed: somena yajeta iti anena samudāya anuvādaka yajinā sarva yāgān uddiśya prakṛti tvena soma vidhiḥ na tu
tatra viśiṣṭa vidhiḥ iti arthaḥ
nanu soma rasa prāptau tatra prakṛti vidhānam yujyate
na hi atra dhārā samartha dravya tvena soma rasaḥ prāpyate
tasya udaka ādi viṣaya tvena api saṃbhavāt
soma rasa tvena prāptau ca punar prakṛti vidhāna ānarthakyāt ca iti āśaṅkā nirāsāya vrīhi vidhi vat iti uktam
tatas ca atra tad dṛṣṭāntena vikāra anuvādena prakṛti vidhi abhāvena vikṛti prāpti anapekṣaṇāt

original: yāgoddeśena vrīhivadatra somasyāpi vidhāne sati puroḍāśāvaruddhe vrīhīṇāṃ niveśāyogena
analyzed: yāga uddeśena vrīhi vat atra somasya api vidhāne sati puroḍāśa avaruddhe vrīhīṇām niveśa ayogena
paraṃparayā prakṛti tvena karaṇa tva āśrayaṇa vat iha api tad upapattiḥ iti arthaḥ
somena yajeta iti atra soma pada nāmatvena pūrvapakṣa prakāra antaram

original: athavā ----------- dhārāśabdasya sasaṃbandhikatvāt gṛhṇāteśca sakarmakatvāt pratisaṃbandhyapekṣayā
analyzed: athavā dhārā śabdasya sa saṃbandhika tvāt gṛhṇāteḥ ca sakarmaka tvāt pratisaṃbandhi apekṣayā

original: prakṛtaḥ pāvanādisaṃskārasaṃskṛtaḥ pūtabhṛdāhavanīyapātrasthaḥ somarasa eva tattvena saṃbadhyate /
analyzed: prakṛtaḥ pāvana ādi saṃskāra saṃskṛtaḥ pūtabhṛt āhavanīya pātra sthaḥ soma rasaḥ eva tattvena saṃbadhyate

original: tataśca somasaṃskāravidhyanyathānupapattyā “adhvaryuṃ vṛṇīta” itivat viniyogena somaprakṛtitvasyāpi
analyzed: tatas ca soma saṃskāra vidhi anyathā anupapattyā adhvaryum vṛṇīte iti vat viniyogena soma prakṛti tvasya api

original: prāpteranuvāda evātra somaśabdo nāmadheyamiti pakṣāntaramāha ----------- somamiti //
analyzed: prāpteḥ anuvādaḥ eva atra soma śabdaḥ nāmadheyam iti pakṣa antaram āha somam iti
soma vākye viśiṣṭa karma antara vidhi vidhāne gaurava āpatteḥ tad tādi ājyā puronuvākyānām ca
liṅga prakaraṇa kramaiḥ aindra vāyava ādi yāgeṣu eva niveśa upapattau prakaraṇa mātreṇa aśruta vaikalpika devatā kalpita tva anupapattyā

original: rūpālābhāccāyuktatvāt aindravāyavādivākyavihitānāṃ yāgānāmeva tatprakhyanyāyena nāmadheyaṃ somapadam /
analyzed: rūpa alābhāt ca ayukta tvāt aindra vāyava ādi vākya vihitānām yāgānām eva tad prakhya nyāyena nāmadheyam soma padam

original: tatra satyapi jyotiṣṭomanāmāntare sa eva yajñaḥ pañcavidha ityatra paśuḥ soma iti nāmāntareṇāpi vyavahāradarśanāt na vaiyarthyamapītyarthaḥ
analyzed: tatra sati api jyotiṣṭoma nāma antare saḥ eva yajñaḥ pañcavidhaḥ iti atra paśuḥ somaḥ iti nāma antareṇa api vyavahāra darśanāt na vaiyarthyam api iti arthaḥ

original: evaṃ somapadasya dvayyāṃ gatau pūrvasmin pakṣe somapadasya vidheye 'pi samarpakatvena
analyzed: evam soma padasya dvayyām gatau pūrvasmin pakṣe soma padasya vidheye samarpaka tvena
yajeḥ samudāya anuvāda tva abhāvāt uttarasmin pakṣe samudāya anuvāda tvena pakṣa dvayam api
nirbādham iti sarvathā padena sūcayan āha sarvathā iti
soma pada nāma tva pakṣe saṃkalpa ullekhasya spaṣṭa tvāt prayojana antara nirūpaṇam

original: yajipadasya pakṣadvaye 'pi anuvādatve anekayāgaparatvāt tadabhāve ekayāgaparatvāt
analyzed: yaji padasya pakṣa dvaye pi anuvāda tve aneka yāga paratvāt tad abhāve eka yāga paratvāt

original: prayojanaṃ spaṣṭatvādupekṣya somapadasya nāmatve saṃkalpollekhādiprayojane vidyamāne
analyzed: prayojanam spaṣṭa tvāt upekṣya soma padasya nāma tve saṃkalpa ullekha ādi prayojane vidyamāne
vibhavāt prayojana antaram api āha prayojanam ca iti vaiśvadeva vat iti
prācīna pravaṇa ādi vākya gata vaiśvadeva pada vat iti arthaḥ
tad vaśāt iti
trivṛt ādīni jyotīṃṣi stomāḥ yasya iti vyutpatti siddha jyotī rūpa stomavat arthaka jyotiṣṭoma nāma vaśāt iti arthaḥ
sa stuta śastrāṇām iti

original: teca prātassavane aindrāgnavaiśvadevau mādhyandinasavane māhendrastṛtīyo marutvatīyaśca tṛtīyasavane āgrayaṇādityasāvitravaiśvadevā ekaścamasābhyāsa  #
analyzed: te ca prātassavane aindrāgna vaiśvadevau mādhyandina savane māhendraḥ tṛtīyaḥ marutvatīyaḥ ca tṛtīyasavane āgrayaṇa āditya sāvitra vaiśvadevāḥ ekaḥ camasa abhyāsa
iti evam draṣṭavyāḥ

original: kathaṃ tarhi jyotiṣṭomanāmasatva astutaśastrābhyāsānāṃ tatsiddhirityata āha ----------- siddhāntetviti //
analyzed: katham tarhi jyotiṣṭoma nāma satva astuta śastra abhyāsānām tad siddhiḥ iti atas āha siddhānte tu iti
evam ca yāgānām adṛṣṭa artha tvena samuccayāt vibhinna devatākānām krama apekṣaṇāt ā śvinoḥ

original: daśamo gṛhyate taṃ tṛtīyaṃ juhoti daśaitānadhvaryuḥ prātaḥ savane grahān gṛhṇātī”
analyzed: daśamaḥ gṛhyate tam tṛtīyam juhoti daśa etān adhvaryuḥ prātar savane grahān gṛhṇātī
ti krama samuccaya darśanam upapadyate
anyathā yāga eka tvāt aṅga bhūta grahaṇa anurodhena āvṛtti anupapatteḥ anekeṣām api grahaṇānām
yāgīya dravya saṃskāra artha tvena aikārthyāt vikalpena devatānām api vikalpa āpatteḥ tad anupapattiḥ iti abhipretya
pūrvapakṣam upasaṃharati atas iti

original: (aindravāyavaṃ gṛhṇātītyādīnāṃ yāgaparatve 'pi āśvino daśamo gṛhyate iti grahaṇakramādyupapattivarṇanam)
analyzed: aindra vāyavam gṛhṇāti ityādīnām yāga para tve pi āśvinaḥ daśamaḥ gṛhyate iti grahaṇa krama ādi upapatti varṇanam

original: yadyapi yāgakramasamuccayopapattāvapi pūrvapakṣe gṛhṇātinā lakṣaṇayā yāgānāmeva vidhānena grahaṇavidhyabhāvena teṣāṃ bhedābhāvāt grahaṇakramasamuccayadarśanānupapattistadavasthā;
analyzed: yadi api yāga krama samuccaya upapattau api pūrvapakṣe gṛhṇātinā lakṣaṇayā yāgānām eva vidhānena grahaṇa vidhi abhāvena teṣām bheda abhāvāt grahaṇa krama samuccaya darśana anupapattiḥ tad avasthā
tathā api daśa muṣṭi parimita soma rasasya tathā abhiṣava pāvana pūtabhṛt āhavanīya ādi pātra ādhāra tva ādi saṃskāra saṃskṛtasya

original: tattadyāgāṅgatvena viniyuktasyālpaṃ juhotīti vacanena caturavattoddeśena homavidhivat
analyzed: tad tad yāga aṅga tvena viniyuktasya alpam juhoti iti vacanena catur avatta uddeśena homa vidhi vat

original: alpamuddiśya homākhyasaṃskāravidhānāt homānuvādena ca grahairjuhoti camasairjuhotītyādivacanairjuhvādivat
analyzed: alpam uddiśya homa ākhya saṃskāra vidhānāt homa anuvādena ca grahaiḥ juhoti camasaiḥ juhoti ityādi vacanaiḥ juhū ādi vat

original: karaṇatayā pātrakaraṇakahomasaṃskāryatvānupapatterāvaśyakaṃ pratiyāgaṃ grahaṇabheda iti na doṣaḥ //
analyzed: karaṇatayā pātra karaṇaka homa saṃskārya tva anupapatteḥ āvaśyakam prati yāgam grahaṇa bhedaḥ iti na doṣaḥ

original: atraca graheṣu daśatvasaṅkhyaivaṃprakāreṇa jñeyā tāṇḍyabrāhmaṇe aṣṭamakhaṇḍe bahiṣpavamānastotrāvāntaraprakaraṇe
analyzed: atra ca graheṣu daśa tva saṅkhyā evaṃprakāreṇa jñeyā tāṇḍya brāhmaṇe aṣṭama khaṇḍe bahiṣpavamāna stotra avāntara prakaraṇe

original: navādhvaryuḥ prātassavane grahān gṛhṇāti tāneva tatpāvayantītyāmnāyate /
analyzed: nava adhvaryuḥ prātassavane grahān gṛhṇāti tān eva tat pāvayanti iti āmnāyate
tad bhāṣye śrī vidyāraṇya gurubhiḥ upāṃśuḥ antaryāmaḥ ca vāyavyaḥ ca aindra vāyavaḥ

original: tataśca maitrāvaruṇaḥ śukro manthī tapaḥ paraḥ /
analyzed: tatas ca maitrāvaruṇaḥ śukraḥ manthī tapaḥ paraḥ

original: tata āgrayaṇo nāma dhruvo navama iṣyata iti pūrvācāryakṛtasaṃgrahaślokena navatvamupapāditam /
analyzed: tatas āgrayaṇaḥ nāma dhruvaḥ navamaḥ iṣyate iti pūrva ācārya kṛta saṃgraha ślokena nava tvam upapāditam

original: tadapekṣayaiva pravṛttayā āśvino daśamo gṛhyata iti śrutyā āśvinasya daśamatvamuktamityāśvināntā daśagrahāsteṣāṃ ca daśamatvaṃ prātassavanānuṣṭhīyamānatvarūpakopādhinā  #
analyzed: tad apekṣayā eva pravṛttayā āśvinaḥ daśamaḥ gṛhyate iti śrutyā āśvinasya daśama tvam uktam iti āśvina antāḥ daśa grahāḥ teṣām ca daśama tvam prātassavana anuṣṭhīyamāna tva rūpaka upādhinā
jñeyam

original: etena -------- yatprakāśakārairaindravāyavamaitrāvaruṇaśukramanthyatigrāhyatrayatapokthyāśvināntā daśagrahā iti vyākhyāya eṣāṃ dhārāgrahatvarūpaikadharmayogāt
analyzed: etena yat prakāśakāraiḥ aindra vāyava maitrāvaruṇa śukra manthi atigrāhya traya tapa ukthya āśvina antāḥ daśa grahāḥ iti vyākhyāya eṣām dhārā graha tva rūpa eka dharma yogāt
tat aśvinām tādṛśa graha krama pradarśanasya veda bhāṣyakāra uktyā viruddha tvāt bahiṣpavamāna stotra anantaram anuṣṭhīyamāne
āśvina grahe dhārātaḥ grahaṇasya kvāpi an āmnānena ādhāra graha tvāt ayuktam iti upekṣyam
etena vāyavyam apahāya ukthya graheṇa āśvina antānām daśa graha tvam somanāthena uktam api apāstam
atas eva yājñikānām upāṃśvantaryāma vāyava aindra vāyava maitrāvaruṇa śukra manthya atigrāhya tapa ukthya marutvatīya dhruvāṇām eva dhārā graha tva prasiddhiḥ
param mīmāṃsakānām iti viśeṣaḥ iti alam vistareṇa

original: (agnīṣomīyavākye paśupadasya hṛdayādiparatve lakṣaṇāpatteḥ paśoḥ prakṛtitvena vidhāne vākyabhedāpatteśca viśiṣṭavidhānam,
analyzed: agnīṣomīya vākye paśu padasya hṛdaya ādi paratve lakṣaṇa āpatteḥ paśoḥ prakṛti tvena vidhāne vākya bheda āpatteḥ ca viśiṣṭa vidhānam
hṛdaya vākye yāga anupasthityā hṛdaya ādi uddeśena saṃskāra mātra vidhānam
paśoḥ prakṛti tvena vidhānam iti sarva upapattyā siddhāntaḥ

original: pūrvapakṣyupapāditaprakāradvaye 'pi sādhāraṇaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ darśayan siddhāntamāha---------- paśupada iti //
analyzed: pūrvapakṣi upapādita prakāra dvaye sādhāraṇam dūṣaṇam darśayan siddhāntam āha paśu pade iti
hṛdaya ādi māṃse paśu śabda prayogasya paśu tva abhivyakteḥ vā abhāvāt paśu pade tad lakṣaṇa āpatteḥ

original: paśuprakṛtitvena vidhāne ca devatāyā api vidhānāt vākyabhedāpatteragnīṣomīyavākya
analyzed: paśu prakṛti tvena vidhāne ca devatāyāḥ api vidhānāt vākya bheda āpatteḥ agnīṣomīya vākya
eva viśiṣṭa karma vidhānam yuktam

original: avadyativākyeṣu tu yajiśabdāśravaṇena devatāyā apyaśravaṇenaca yāgopasthāpanāsaṃbhavāt avadānamātrasya vatsālaṃbhavadyāgānumāpakatvānupapatteḥ  #
analyzed: avadyati vākyeṣu tu yaji śabda aśravaṇena devatāyāḥ api aśravaṇena ca yāga upasthāpana asaṃbhavāt avadāna mātrasya vatsa alaṃbhavat yāga anumāpaka tva anupapatteḥ
na karma vidhānam iti arthaḥ
kim tarhi hṛdaya ādi vākyaiḥ vidhīyante
iti apekṣāyām āha hṛdaya ādi vākyaiḥ iti
utpatti śiṣṭa paśu sādhanatāyāḥ viśasana avadāna ādi saṃskāra vidhi virodham pariharati paśoḥ ca iti
paśu devatā saṃbandhaḥ pi prakṛti tvena iti nirūpaṇam
karaṇa tvasya iti
utpatti vākye paśum iti dvitīyā lakṣitasya iti arthaḥ

original: ata eva --------- agnīṣomadevatāsaṃbandho 'pi paśoḥ hṛdayādiprakṛtitvenaiveti nāgnīṣomīyaṃ paśumiti taddhitasya sāmānādhikaraṇyasya cānupapattiḥ
analyzed: atas eva paśoḥ hṛdaya ādi prakṛti tvena eva iti na agnīṣomīyam paśum iti taddhitasya sāmānādhikaraṇyasya ca anupapattiḥ

original: ataśca yathaiva vrīhipadenaivārthāt taṇḍulādīnāmapi sādhanatvāvagatestaduddeśena peṣaṇādividhiḥ,
analyzed: atas ca yathā eva vrīhi padena eva arthāt taṇḍula ādīnām api sādhanatva avagateḥ tad uddeśena peṣaṇa ādi vidhiḥ
tadvat iha api paśu padena eva hṛdaya ādīnām sādhanatva avagatau yuktaḥ tad uddeśena avadāna ādi saṃskāra vidhiḥ iti bhāvaḥ
atideśa prāptasya api avadānasya punar vidhānam pratyeka avadāna siddhi artham iti upapādanam
yadi api hṛdaya ādīnām pradeya tva rūpa yāga sādhana tva lakṣaṇa haviḥ tvena tad saṃskāra arthasya madhya pūrva ardha āpādanaka avadānasya atideśena eva prāpteḥ etad vidhi vaiyarthyam
tathā api atideśa prāptasya eva hṛdaya ādi saṃskāra artha tvena punar vidhānam na anupapannam
tad prayojanam ca teṣām pratyekam haviḥ tva siddhiḥ
anyathā paśoḥ viśasana vidhānāt avayava dvārā sādhanatva avagatau api avayavānām pratyekam
sādhanatva anavagateḥ avayavinaḥ vyāsajya sarva avayava niṣṭhatvena tad sādhanatva anupapattyā
avayavānām api samuditānām eva sādhana tva prāpteḥ samudita saṃskāra artha tvena kḷptasya eva atideśataḥ

original: sannidhāvapi tasya pratyekaṃ hṛdayādisaṃskārārthatvena vidhānāt pūtīkānāmiva hṛdayādīnāmapi
analyzed: sannidhau api tasya pratyekam hṛdaya ādi saṃskāra artha tvena vidhānāt pūtīkānām iva hṛdaya ādīnām api
pratyekam haviḥ tvā avagamāt pratyekam madhya pūrva ardha avadāna siddhiḥ
evam ca ekādaśa avadāna saṃskṛta dravya mātra vṛtti haviḥ tva tātparya sahakṛtena paśu śabdena api
tāvat mātra prakṛti tvena paśu vidhānam iti tad itara avayavānām avadāna parisaṅkhyā phalaka yāga sādhana tva rūpa haviḥ tva parisaṅkhyā ādi phalam

original: labhyata iti kaustubhoktayuktyā prakṛtāvadānavidhivaiyarthyaṃ pariharati ------------ ata eveti //
analyzed: labhyate iti kaustubha ukta yuktyā prakṛta avadāna vidhi vaiyarthyam pariharati atas eva iti
ekādaśa avadānāni iti anena etara avayava parisaṅkhyā siddhiḥ iti nyāyasudhā nirāsaḥ

original: ityādītyādipadena yadatra nyāyasudhākṛtā “ekādaśa vai paśoravadānāni tāni dvirdviravadyatī“ti
analyzed: ityādi iti ādi padena yat atra nyāyasudhā kṛtāḥ ekādaśa vai paśoḥ avadānāni tāni dvis dvis avadyati iti
vākye ekādaśa vai iti asya pṛthak vākya tvam aṅgīkṛtya tasya eva itara avayava parisaṅkhyā paratvam uktam
tad pañca avadāna saṃpādaka tritva bādhena tad dvitva vidhāyakasya tāni ityasya viśeṣa samarpaka tvena eva ekādaśa

original: vai ityasya tadekavākyatopapattau parisaṅkhyāphalakatvāṅgīkāreṇa bhinnavākyatve pramāṇābhāvāt
analyzed: vai ityasya tad eka vākya tā upapattau parisaṅkhyā phalaka tva aṅgīkāreṇa bhinna vākya tve pramāṇa abhāvāt
tasya eva parisaṅkhyā phalaka tva aṅgīkāre hṛdaya ādi vākyānām vaiyarthyasya duṣparihara tvāt
ayuktam iti kaustubha ukta viśeṣa antarasya saṃgrahaḥ sūcitaḥ

original: (hṛdayādīnāṃ kramasamuccayadarśanopapatterdaśame vakṣyamāṇatvāt paśuvākye tasya śeṣo nāstīti somavākyasiddhāntopakramaḥ)
analyzed: hṛdaya ādīnām krama samuccaya darśana upapatteḥ daśame vakṣyamāṇa tvāt paśu vākye tasya śeṣaḥ na asti iti soma vākya siddhānta upakramaḥ

original: ato 'vadānavidhivaiyarthyābhāvāt paśuvākya eva yāgavidhāne 'pi hṛdayādīnāṃ cāvayavisādhanatvānyathānupapattyā
analyzed: atas vadāna vidhi vaiyarthya abhāvāt paśu vākye eva yāga vidhāne pi hṛdaya ādīnām ca avayavi sādhanatva anyathā anupapattyā
samuccitānām eva sādhana tva avagateḥ krama samuccaya darśanasya api upapattim daśame vakṣyamāṇa tvāt upekṣya

original: paśuvākye siddhānte na kiñcidavaśiṣyate ityanusaṃdhāya somavākye siddhāntamāha ---------- some 'pīti //
analyzed: paśu vākye siddhānte na kiñcid avaśiṣyate iti anusaṃdhāya soma vākye siddhāntam āha some pi iti
soma yāga viṣaye pi iti arthaḥ
gaurava padam lakṣaṇa āpatteḥ api upalakṣaṇam
artha prāpta grahaṇa anuvādena aindra vāyava ādi devātā mātra vidhānam
devatā viśiṣṭa grahaṇa vidhānam iti vārtika kṛt uktam prauḍhi vāda mātram iti prakāśakāra mata nirūpaṇam

original: ayamarthaḥ --------- upāṃśu gṛhṇātyantaryāmaṃ gṛhṇātītyatropāṃśvantaryāmādipadānāṃ nāmadheyatvena vidheyāntarābhāvena vaiyarthyānupapattyā
analyzed: ayam arthaḥ upāṃśu gṛhṇāti antaryāmam gṛhṇāti iti atra upāṃśvantaryāma ādi padānām nāmadheya tvena vidheya antara abhāvena vaiyarthya anupapattyā
aindra vāyava ādi vākye pi prāpta grahaṇa anuvādena devatā saṃbandhasya iva grahaṇe devatā viśiṣṭa rasa rūpa saṃskārya saṃbandhasya api
vidhāne vākya bheda āpatteḥ grahaṇa mātrasya uddeśya tve prākaraṇika yat kiñcid dravya grahaṇe
pi tad āpatteḥ somarasīya tvena viśeṣaṇe viśiṣṭa uddeśa āpattyā tad vidheḥ āvaśyaka tvam eva

original: ato 'nyataḥ saṃbhavatprāptikatve 'pi tataḥ pūrvapravṛttyaṅgīkāreṇa viśiṣṭagrahaṇavidhānaṃ taddhitopāttadravyasaṃskārārthametairvākyaiḥ kriyate
analyzed: atas nyatas saṃbhavat prāptika tve tatas pūrva pravṛtti aṅgīkāreṇa viśiṣṭa grahaṇa vidhānam taddhita upātta dravya saṃskāra artham etaiḥ vākyaiḥ kriyate

original: aindravāyavamityādau prakṛtyarthabhedāt pratyayārthadravyabhedaḥ tāvacchabdāntaranyāyādeva siddha iti tattadvākye tattaddravyoddeśena viśiṣṭatadvidhānaṃ  #
analyzed: aindra vāyavam ityādau prakṛti artha bhedāt pratyaya artha dravya bhedaḥ tāvat śabda antara nyāyāt eva siddhaḥ iti tad tad vākye tad tad dravya uddeśena viśiṣṭa tad vidhānam
na ayuktam
tad prayojanam ca devatā aṃśe pratyaya artha dravya bhedasya grahaṇa aṅga tvasya ca sidhyā etasya avyakta tva siddhiḥ

original: etadvidhyabhāvehi yājyāpurogādimantrāmnānādyāgāṅgabhūtānāmeva devatānāṃ nirvāpa iva grahaṇe tattanmantravarṇādupakārakatāmātraṃ syāt,
analyzed: etad vidhi abhāve hi yājyā puroga ādi mantra āmnānāt yāga aṅga bhūtānām eva devatānām nirvāpe iva grahaṇe tad tad mantra varṇāt upakāraka tā mātram syāt

original: satitvasmin pratyakṣavidhau grahaṇāṅgatvapratīteḥ yāga evopakārakatāmātrāvasāyādyājyādimantrāṇāmapi tadakalpakatayā yāgasyāvyaktatvasidhyodbhidādīnāṃ  #
analyzed: pratyakṣa vidhau grahaṇa aṅga tva pratīteḥ yāge eva upakāraka tā mātra avasāyāt yājyā ādi mantrāṇām api tad akalpaka tayā yāgasya avyakta tva sidhyā udbhida ādīnām
tad vikṛti tvam labhyate
grahaṇa aṃśe tu dravya saṃskāraka tayā dṛṣṭa vidhayā arthataḥ prāptasya api svatantra adṛṣṭārtha tva lābhaḥ

original: grahaṇavidhīnāṃ prayojanāpekṣāyāṃ prayojanāntarāsaṃbhave prayājādivat ārādupakārakatvakalpane 'pi na doṣaḥ /
analyzed: grahaṇa vidhīnām prayojana apekṣāyām prayojana antara asaṃbhave prayāja ādi vat ārāt upakāraka tva kalpane na doṣaḥ

original: ata eva tattaddevatāvaruddhagrahaṇānāṃ guṇāt bhede sati vidheḥ punaḥ śrutibalādadṛṣṭasyaiva
analyzed: atas eva tad tad devatā avaruddha grahaṇānām guṇāt bhede sati vidheḥ punar śruti balāt adṛṣṭasya eva
prayojaka tā svīkāreṇa prayojakībhūta adṛṣṭa anurodhena tad tad devatyānām grahaṇānām prayāja anuyāja vat
samuccaya avagateḥ tad anurodhena grāhya dravyāṇām api samuccayāt vibhinna devatāka dravya bheda balena
yāga āvṛtti siddheḥ krama samuccaya darśanasya api upapattiḥ

original: naca ---------- avayavaśo grahaṇena grāhyabhedāt grahaṇābhyāsopapattirbhedena gṛhītasyaikīkaraṇe
analyzed: na ca avayavaśas grahaṇena grāhya bhedāt grahaṇa abhyāsa upapattiḥ bhedena gṛhītasya ekīkaraṇe
na yāga abhyāsa siddhiḥ iti tad viṣaya krama samuccaya darśana anupapattiḥ iti vācyam ebhedena

original: gṛhītasyaikīkaraṇāyogāt bhedāvasthitasyaiva yāganiṣpādakatvāvagateryāgābhyāsaṃca vinā bhedena gṛhītasya tatsādhanatvāsaṃbhavena yāgābhyāsasyāvaśyakatvena  #
analyzed: gṛhītasya ekīkaraṇa ayogāt bheda avasthitasya eva yāga niṣpādaka tva avagateḥ yāga abhyāsam ca vinā bhedena gṛhītasya tad sādhana tva asaṃbhavena yāga abhyāsasya āvaśyaka tvena
tad upapatteḥ
devatā viśiṣṭa grahaṇasya soma rasa saṃskāra artha tvena vidhāne eka prasara tā bhaṅga nirāsaḥ viśiṣṭa vidhi upapādanam ca
yat tu asmin pakṣe aindra vāyava pade eka prasara tā bhaṅga āpādanam
teṣām tad uddeśya dravyasya vidheya devatā nirūpita tva abhāvāt sṛṣṭīḥ upadadhāti tyatra
mantra viśiṣṭa upadhāna vidheḥ iṣṭakā saṃskāra artha tvena svayam eva aṅgīkṛta tvāt tena nyāyena iha api
tasya adoṣa tvāt ayuktam iti vyaktam kaustubhe
etena viśiṣṭa vidhau gaurava āpatteḥ grahaṇa mātram eva vidhīyate
aindra vāyava ādi padantu mantra varṇa prāpta devatā anuvādam iti api parāstam
aindra vāyava ādi pada vaiyarthya āpattyā grahaṇa aṅgatva prāpti phalakasya viśiṣṭa vidheḥ api aṅgīkārāt
atas yuktam devatā viśiṣṭa grahaṇasya eva vidhānam iti
vistaraḥ ca kaustubhe draṣṭavyaḥ
grahaṇe devatā anvaya anupapatti parihāraḥ aindra vāyava vākye yāga kalpanā nirāsaḥ ca
grahaṇe devatā anvaya anupapattim pariharati saṃbhavati ca iti
karmībhūtā iti
tat ca devatā vācakam padam tad vṛtti tva saṃbandhena iti arthaḥ
devatā apekṣasya iti
soma yāgasya devatā apekṣāyāḥ grahaṇa aṅga bhūta devatābhiḥ prasaṅgena eva upakāra lābhena śānteḥ tasya eva upapādaka tvam iti arthaḥ

original: etena -------- yāgāpekṣāyāṃ āgneyavākya iva yatrāpekṣā tatraiva yāgakalpanaṃ nyāyyam,
analyzed: etena yāga apekṣāyām āgneya vākye iva yatra apekṣā tatra eva yāga kalpanam nyāyyam

original: natu vākyāntara iti grahaṇavākyeṣveva yāgavidhānaṃ yuktamiti -------- nirastam;
analyzed: na tu vākya antare iti grahaṇa vākyeṣu eva yāga vidhānam yuktam iti nirastam

original: āgneyavākye puruṣavyāpārāśravaṇenāparyavasānāt tatra yāgakalpanopapattāvapi iha grahaṇarūpapuruṣavyāpāraśravaṇena
analyzed: āgneya vākye puruṣa vyāpāra aśravaṇena aparyavasānāt tatra yāga kalpanā upapattau api iha grahaṇa rūpa puruṣa vyāpāra śravaṇena
paryavasāne sati abhihita dravya devatā saṃbandha nirvāhaka mātra apekṣāyām soma vākye eva
śrutyā vihita yāgasya tad nirvāhaka tva upapatteḥ aśruta yāga vidhāna kalpanasya anyāyya tvāt
saṃskāra vidhi anyathā iti

original: (pradeyatvena prakṛtitvena vā somasya prāptatvāt somena yajetetyatra somapadaṃ nāmadheyamityāśaṅkānuvādaḥ)
analyzed: pradeya tvena prakṛti tvena vā somasya prāpta tvāt somena yajeta iti atra soma padam nāmadheyam iti āśaṅkā anuvādaḥ
ayam arthaḥ na hi atra somasya pradeya tvena vidhiḥ yuktaḥ
saṃskāra vidhi vaiyarthya āpatteḥ
na api prakṛti tvena
tasya saṃskāra vidhi anyathā anupapattyā api siddheḥ

original: grahaṇavākye tāvat taddhitopāttadravyasya grahaṇasaṃskṛtasya viniyogāpekṣāyāṃ devatāsaṃbandhānyathānupapattyavagatatattadyāgābhyāseṣu pradeyatvena  #
analyzed: grahaṇa vākye tāvat taddhita upātta dravyasya grahaṇa saṃskṛtasya viniyoga apekṣāyām devatā saṃbandha anyathā anupapatti avagata tad tad yāga abhyāseṣu pradeya tvena
viniyoga kalpanam na anupapannam
sarvanāma arthakasya taddhitasya dravya viśeṣa tātparya grāhaka apekṣāyām sannidhāna dvārā vākya pramita drava dravya viṣaya tva siddhiḥ
tatra hi tad tad vākya prāpta grahaṇa viśeṣa anuvādena dhārā mātra vidhānam

original: alpaparimāṇeṣu pātreṣu sthūlayā dhārayā grahaṇe kṛte pātrādbahirapi pātāpatteraṇutvasya prāptatvānnāṇutvasyāpi vidhānam /
analyzed: alpa parimāṇeṣu pātreṣu sthūlayā dhārayā grahaṇe kṛte pātrāt bahis api pāta āpatteḥ aṇu tvasya prāpta tvāt na aṇu tvasya api vidhānam
dhārāyāḥ ca pratisaṃbandhi apekṣāyām gṛhṇāteḥ ca karma ākāṅkṣāyām uttarārdha ādi vat svatantra jala ādi pratisaṃbandhya ākṣepaka tva anupapatteḥ
prakṛta somam pāvayati ityādi vākya pramita soma prakṛtika drava dravya viṣayaka tva si ddhiḥ
pāvana vākye soma padasya latā paratva asaṃbhavena lakṣaṇayā latā saṃbandhi rasa paratvāt
evam ca saṃskāra vidhi anyathā anupapattyā soma prakṛti tvasya api prāptiḥ na anupapannā

original: etena --------- satyapi sannidhāne dhārāyā dravadravyamātrasādhāraṇatvāt somarasaviṣayatvaniyame
analyzed: etena sati api sannidhāne dhārāyāḥ drava dravya mātra sādhāraṇa tvāt soma rasa viṣaya tva niyame

original: pramāṇābhāve sati somasyāprāptiriti śāstradīpikoktaṃ ---------- apāstam; ------------ iti //
analyzed: pramāṇa abhāve sati somasya aprāptiḥ iti śāstradīpikā uktam apāstam iti
saṃskāra vidhi anyathā anupapattyā saktūnām api prāptyā tad vyāvṛtti phala niyama vidhi tva upapādanam
saktu vyāvṛtti iti

original: saṃskāravidhyanyathānupapattyā somavat saktūnāmapi viniyogakalpanayā vikalpena prāptyāpatteḥ pakṣaprāptasaktuvyāvṛttiphalakaniyamārthaṃ somavidhānam
analyzed: saṃskāra vidhi anyathā anupapattyā soma vat saktūnām api viniyoga kalpanayā vikalpena prāpti āpatteḥ pakṣa prāpta saktu vyāvṛtti phalaka niyama artham soma vidhānam

original: tataścotpattiśiṣṭasomāvarodhāt saṃskāravidhyanyathānupapattyā saktūnāṃ tatra viniyogakalpanāsaṃbhavānna vikalpaprasaktirityarthaḥ /
analyzed: tatas ca utpatti śiṣṭa soma avarodhāt saṃskāra vidhi anyathā anupapattyā saktūnām tatra viniyoga kalpanā asaṃbhavāt na vikalpa prasaktiḥ iti arthaḥ
yathā ca evam sati iti
siddhānte yāga ekatve sati iti arthaḥ
kaustubhaḥ eva iti
vyākhyāta pūrvam etat
soma vākya siddhānta prayojanam some ca iti
aindra vāyava vākyaiḥ ca yāga vidhau aindra vāyavena yajeta iti vacana vyakti āpatteḥ jyotiṣṭomasya api
svārtha vihita dravya devatāka tva lakṣaṇa vyakta codana tvāt ekāha ahīna satreṣu avyakta codanā tvena
jyotiṣṭoma sādṛśya abhāvāt na tadīya vidhi anta pravṛttiḥ
soma vākyena tu yāga vidhau dravya śravaṇe sva artha vihita devatā rāhityena jyotiṣṭomasya api
avyakta codana tvena tad sādṛśyāt ekāha ādiṣu jyotiṣṭoma vidhi anta pravṛttiḥ iti avyaktaḥ tu
somasya iti aṣṭama adhikaraṇe vakṣyamāṇam prayojanam iti arthaḥ

original: yattu vārtike ---------- karmabhede sati ekakarmaṇi vikalpo 'vibhāgo hi codanaikatvādityaṣṭamādhikaraṇanyāyenaikasya
analyzed: yat tu vārtike karma bhede sati eka karmaṇi vikalpaḥ vibhāgaḥ hi codanā ekatvāt iti aṣṭama adhikaraṇa nyāyena ekasya

original: aindravāyavādivākyavihitasya yāgasya vikṛtau vikalpena vidhyantātideśāt vikalpenaikasya
analyzed: aindra vāyava ādi vākya vihitasya yāgasya vikṛtau vikalpena vidhi anta atideśāt vikalpena ekasya

original: dharmāḥ kāryāḥ sakṛcca yāgāḥ kāryāḥ karmaikye yathāprakṛtīti prayojanāntaramuktam /
analyzed: dharmāḥ kāryāḥ sakṛt ca yāgāḥ kāryāḥ karma aikye yathāprakṛti iti prayojana antaram uktam
tat ca vākye śrūyamāṇa devatāka tva rūpa viśeṣa sādṛśyena upāṃśuyāja atideśasya ekāha ādiṣu
prāptyā aindra vāyava ādi yāgānām anyatama atideśasya eva prāptau pramāṇa abhāvāt vikalpena dharma prāpti anāpatteḥ
na yuktam iti eva kāreṇa sūcitam

original: ata eva kaustubhe ---------- upāṃśuyājīyavidhyanta eva pūrvapakṣe prayojanatvenoktaḥ //
analyzed: atas eva kaustubhe upāṃśuyājīya vidhi antaḥ eva pūrvapakṣe prayojana tvena uktaḥ
iti ṣaṣṭham paśu soma adhikaraṇam
pṛthaktva niveśāt

original: “āmanamasyāmanamasya devā iti tistra āhutīrjuhoti” “ājyabhāgau yajatī” tyādau ekatvātiriktasaṅkhyāyāḥ
analyzed: āmanam asya āmanam asya devāḥ iti tistraḥ āhutīḥ juhoti ājyabhāgau yajati tyādau ekatva atirikta saṅkhyāyāḥ
sva āśraya pratiyogika sva āśraya vṛtti bheda vyāpta tvena na tāvat sākṣāt bhāvanā bheda bodhaka tvam
tasyāḥ ukta saṅkhyā āśraya tva apratīteḥ
nā api dhātvartha bheda bodhaka tvam
tasya pūrva pramita eka tva saṅkhyā avaruddha tvena ekādaśa prayājān yajati virāj saṃpannam agnihotram
juhoti ityādi vat saṅkhyā antara saṃbandha anupapatteḥ etad saṅkhyāyāḥ abhyāsa viṣaya tva pratīteḥ akarmāntara tvam iti
prāpte na atra saṅkhyā antara avarodhaḥ

original: sā hi na tāvattiṅupāttā tasyāḥ kartṛvṛttitvāt /
analyzed: sā hi na tāvat tiṅ upāttā tasyāḥ kartṛ vṛtti tvāt

original: nacānavacchinnasyānvayānupapatteḥ prathamātikrame ca kāraṇābhāvāddhātvarthe ekatvasaṅkhyānumānamiti --------- vācyam;
analyzed: na ca anavacchinnasya anvaya anupapatteḥ prathama atikrame ca kāraṇa abhāvāt dhātvarthe eka tva saṅkhyā anumānam iti vācyam
śruta saṅkhyā sattve kāraṇa abhāvasya asiddha tvena anumāna aprasarāt
ataeva prayāja ekādaśa tva sthale yatra prakṛtau anumāna prasaraḥ tatra abhyāsa viṣaya tvam
na ca evam virāṭsaṃpatti vākya ādau api utpatti vākye ekatva anumāna anāpattiḥ
tādṛśa sthale sva upajīvya utpatti vākya janya śābdabodha nirvāha artham pūrva pravṛttasya anumānasya auttarakālikena saṅkhyā śravaṇena bādhā yogāt tasya abhyāsa viṣaya tva pratīteḥ

original: prakṛte tu śābdabodhāt pūrvamevetarapadārthavatsaṅkhyāyā api pratīteryuktaḥ śābdabodhottarakālīnānumānapratibandha iti kaustubhe vistaraḥ /
analyzed: prakṛte tu śābdabodhāt pūrvam eva itara padārtha vat saṅkhyāyāḥ api pratīteḥ yuktaḥ śābdabodha uttara kālīna anumāna pratibandhaḥ iti kaustubhe vistaraḥ
atas ca siddham utpatti vākya gata karma samāna adhikaraṇa vidheya saṅkhyāyāḥ karma bhedaka tvam
bhāvanā bhedaḥ tu śabda antarāt eva
prayojanam vedi prokṣaṇa mantravat pūrvapakṣe sakṛt mantraḥ
siddhānte tu tad āvṛttiḥ iti

original: bhāṣyakāreṇa tu “saptadaśa prājāpatyānpaśūnālabhete” ti vākye yāgabhedābhedacintā kṛtā /
analyzed: bhāṣyakāreṇa tu saptadaśa prājāpatyān paśūn ālabheta iti vākye yāga bheda abheda cintā kṛtā
tatra yadi api devatā tva viśiṣṭa dravya viśeṣa vācī taddhitaḥ
yadi api ca prājāpatya pade eva ekaśeṣaḥ

original: tathāpi taduttaravibhaktyupāttāyāḥ saṅkhyāyāḥ prakṛtyarthe viśeṣya evānvayaḥ natu viśiṣṭe /
analyzed: tathā api tad uttara vibhakti upāttāyāḥ saṅkhyāyāḥ prakṛti arthe viśeṣye eva anvayaḥ na tu viśiṣṭe

original: dvau traya ityādau tathaiva vyutpatteriti tāvadavivādam /
analyzed: dvau trayaḥ ityādau tathā eva vyutpatteḥ iti tāvat avivādam
saḥ pi ca na dravye devatā tva anvaya uttaram

original: tathā sati devatātvapratisaṃbandhini dravye sāhityānavagamena pratyekavṛttipaśutvāvacchinna eva tatsaṃbandhapratīteranekatvāvagamātsaṃbandhabhedenānekayāgādikalpanāgauravāpatteḥ
analyzed: tathā sati devatā tva pratisaṃbandhini dravye sāhitya anavagamena pratyeka vṛtti paśu tva avacchinne eva tad saṃbandha pratīteḥ aneka tva avagamāt saṃbandha bhedena aneka yāga ādi kalpanā gaurava āpatteḥ
atas lāghavāt devatā tva anvayāt pūrvam eva saṅkhyā anvayaḥ
tadā hi bahu tva avacchinne eva eka devatā saṃbandhāt eka yāga ādi kalpanāt lāghavam
naca prakṛti prāpta eka paśu niṣpanna ekādaśa avadāna gaṇa ekatva anurodhena saṅkhyāyāḥ devatā tva anvaya uttaram anvayaḥ

original: paśugataikatvasya śrutasaptadaśatvena bādhāt avadānagaṇaikatvasya ca prakṛtāvārthikatvenehānatideśāt /
analyzed: paśu gata ekatvasya śruta saptadaśa tvena bādhāt avadāna gaṇa ekatvasya ca prakṛtau ārthika tvena iha anatideśāt
atas devatā saṃbandha bhede pramāṇa abhāvāt na yāga bhedaḥ

original: astu vā samānābhidhānaśrutyā bahutvānvayātprāgdevatātvānvayena saṃbandhabhedastathāpi lāghavādyagaikatvam /
analyzed: astu vā samāna abhidhāna śrutyā bahutva anvayāt prāk devatā tva anvayena saṃbandha bhedaḥ tathā api lāghavāt yaga ekatvam
yathā eva hi siddhānte neke yāgāḥ sakṛt anuṣṭhānena upapādyante

original: tathā manmate 'pyekena yāgenāneke devatāsaṃbandhā iti prāpte ------------ samānābhidhānaśrutyā devatātvasyāntaraṅgatvātsaṅkhyānvayātpūrvānvayitvam;
analyzed: tathā mad mate pi ekena yāgena aneke devatā saṃbandhāḥ iti prāpte samāna abhidhāna śrutyā devatā tvasya antaraṅga tvāt saṅkhyā anvayāt pūrva anvayi tvam
pratyeka vṛtti tayā sūkta haviṣoḥ ityādi smṛti anusāreṇa haviḥ tva avacchedaka paśu tva avacchedena eva
devatā saṃbandha aucityāt ca
atas ca bahu tva anavacchinnasya eva pratisaṃbandhi tvāt pratisaṃbandhi tā avacchedakasya pratyeka vṛtti tvena pratisaṃbandhi bheda pratīteḥ tad bhedena saṃbandha bheda siddhiḥ
na ca saṃbandha bhede pi yāga eka tvam

original: saṃbandhānāṃ yāgaikatvānekatvābhyāmubhayathāpyupapattau lāghavāpekṣayā paśvekatāprāpticodakasya śāstratayā balavattvena niyāmakatvāt /
analyzed: saṃbandhānām yāga ekatva anekatvābhyām ubhayathā api upapattau lāghava apekṣayā paśu ekatā prāpti codakasya śāstra tayā balavat tvena niyāmaka tvāt
atas tad anurodhena eva sarvatra yāga bhedaḥ bhāvanā bhedaḥ ca iti siddham

original: prayojanaṃ yāgaikatve ekapaśuvismaraṇe 'pi tasya jātatvānna punaryāgakaraṇaṃ,
analyzed: prayojanam yāga eka tve eka paśu vismaraṇe tasya jāta tvāt na punar yāga karaṇam
siddhānte tu tat iti
iti saptamam saṃkhyā kṛta karma bheda adhikaraṇam
adhyāya saṅgatyāḥ abhyāsa adhikaraṇena pratyudāharaṇa saṅgatyāḥ anantara adhikaraṇena upajīvya upajīvaka bhāva saṅgatyāḥ ca nirūpaṇam
saṅkhyayā karma bheda cintanāt adhyāya saṅgatiḥ

original: tathā abhyāsādhikaraṇe 'bhyāsāt sādhitasya karmabhedasyāpavādārthaṃ pravṛtte paurṇamāsyadhikaraṇanyāye
analyzed: tathā abhyāsa adhikaraṇe bhyāsāt sādhitasya karma bhedasya apavāda artham pravṛtte paurṇamāsī adhikaraṇa nyāye
paurṇamāsī vat upāṃśuyājaḥ syāt ityādyaiḥ tribhiḥ adhikaraṇaiḥ apodite sati abhyāsa nimitta bheda apavāda bhūtāyāḥ
samudāya anuvāda cintāyāḥ paurṇamāsī adhikaraṇa kṛtāyāḥ buddhi sthīkaraṇāt tad dvārā samudāya anuvāda apavāda abhyāsa cintāyāḥ
buddhi stha tvāt abhyāse sakṛt śravaṇa ādi uktā bhedaka tā

original: prakṛtetu sakṛcchravaṇasya na karmabhedakatvamiti pūrvapakṣotthānādabhyāsādhikaraṇaprakaraṇena saha pratyudāharaṇasaṅgatiḥ,
analyzed: prakṛte tu sakṛt śravaṇasya na karma bhedaka tvam iti pūrvapakṣa utthānāt abhyāsa adhikaraṇa prakaraṇena saha pratyudāharaṇa saṅgatiḥ
tathā soma yāga aikye pi abhyāsena krama samuccaya upapatti vat tri tva ādi saṅkhyāyāḥ api abhyāsena upapatteḥ na
bhedaka tā iti anantara ukta abhyāsa upajīvanena pūrvapakṣīkaraṇāt anantara saṅgatim ca spaṣṭa tvāt upekṣya
saṅkhyayā karma bheda udāharaṇa pūrvakam pūrvapakṣam eva āha āmanam asi iti
āmanam asi ityasya vivaraṇam

original: ādipadārthasya dvādaśa dvādaśāni juhotītyasya vivaraṇaṃ ca)
analyzed: ādi padārthasya dvādaśa dvādaśāni juhoti iti asya vivaraṇam ca

original: ādipadenāgnau vasordhārāṃ vidhāya śrutasya “dvādaśadvādaśāni juhotī” tyādeḥ saṃgrahaḥ /

original: atraca “vājaśca me prasavaśca me” ityādyairdvādaśamantraiḥ pratyekamāhutirekaṃ dvādaśaṃ tādṛśānidvādaśa juhotītyarthaḥ /
analyzed: atra ca vājaḥ ca me prasavaḥ ca me ityādyaiḥ dvādaśa mantraiḥ pratyekam āhutiḥ ekam dvādaśam tādṛśāni dvādaśa juhoti iti arthaḥ
viśeṣataḥ ca idam dvādaśe vicārayiṣyate

original: tataśca yathā catuścatvāriṃśadadhikaśatamāhutayaḥ saṃpadyante tathā karotīti bhāvaḥ //
analyzed: tatas ca yathā catuścatvāriṃśat adhika śatam āhutayaḥ saṃpadyante tathā karoti iti bhāvaḥ

original: tistra iti padopāttāyāḥ saṅkhyāyāḥ satyapi mukhyaviśeṣyabhūtabhāvanānvaye dhātvartharūpāhutipadasāmānādhikaraṇyadarśanāt
analyzed: tistraḥ iti pada upāttāyāḥ saṅkhyāyāḥ sati api mukhya viśeṣya bhūta bhāvanā anvaye dhātvartha rūpa āhuti pada sāmānādhikaraṇya darśanāt
sva āśraya karaṇakatva saṃbandhena tad āśrayaṇāt tad anāśraya bhāvanā bheda bodhaka tva asaṃbhavam abhipretya āha
tasyāḥ iti
pūrva pramita ekatva iti

original: prayājeṣu pañcatvasaṅkhyāvarodhādagnihotre caikatvasaṅkhyāvarodhe sati śrūyamāṇaikādaśatvadaśasaṅkhyayoḥ prayogābhyāsaparatvam,

original: (saṅkhyāyāḥ tistra āhutīriti dhātvarthasāmānādhikaraṇyāt tadvṛttitvapratīterekatvasaṅkhyānavarodhāt karmabheda iti siddhāntaḥ)

tistraḥ āhutīḥ iti sāmānādhikaraṇyāt dhātvartha vṛtti tva pratīteḥ karma bhedaka tvam eva yuktam

original: prayājānāntu pratyekaikatvena pracayaviśiṣṭapañcatvenavotpattau nirjñātasaṅkhyatvāt śrutaikādaśatvasaṅkhyāyā anyathānupapannatvena gatyabhāvānnānumitasaṅkhyābādhakatvam,
analyzed: prayājānām tu pratyeka eka tvena pracaya viśiṣṭa pañcatvena vā utpattau nirjñāta saṅkhya tvāt śruta ekādaśa tva saṅkhyāyāḥ anyathā anupapanna tvena gati abhāvāt na anumita saṅkhyā bādhaka tvam

original: prakṛtetu yāvaddhātvarthe saṅkhyānumātumārabhyate tāvat pratyakṣaśrutayā saṅkhyayā nirākāṅkṣīkaraṇānnānumānaprasaraḥ //

original: nahyatra tritvaśravaṇe sati so 'stīti dhātvarthāvacchedakatvaṃ śrutasaṅkhyāyā eva yuktamiti anumānapratibandha evetyabhipretya siddhāntamāha  #

na atra iti

original: anumitāyā api saṅkhyāyā utpannaśiṣṭasaṅkhyayā na bādhaḥ,

ityādi kaustubha vistara nirūpaṇam
kaustubhe vistaraḥ iti

original: yatrotpattivākye saṅkhyāśravaṇaṃ tatrānumānapravṛtteḥ pūrvameva śrutasaṅkhyāyā bhāvanānvayāt
analyzed: yatra utpatti vākye saṅkhyā śravaṇam tatra anumāna pravṛtteḥ pūrvam eva śruta saṅkhyāyāḥ bhāvanā anvayāt
tad nirvāhāya dhātvartha saṃbandha avaśyaṃbhāvena tayā eva nirākāṅkṣa tva upapatteḥ na paścāt
saṅkhyā antara anumāna prasaraḥ
yatra tu utpatti vākye sā na śrutā
utpanna vākyasya tad anuvādena saṅkhyā vidhāyaka tvāt tad uttara pravṛttika tvena tad upajīvyaka tvam

original: tatrotpattivākye svavākyārthāvadhāraṇakāle paricchedakībhūtasaṅkhyānumāne naiva kaścana doṣaḥ /
analyzed: tatra utpatti vākye sva vākya artha avadhāraṇa kāle paricchedakībhūta saṅkhyā anumāne na eva kaścana doṣaḥ

original: ata eva upajīvyatvāt uttarakālapravṛttenottareṇa śrutenāpi na pūrvapramitasya durbalasyāpi bādhaḥ /
analyzed: atas eva upajīvya tvāt uttara kāla pravṛttena uttareṇa śrutena api na pūrva pramitasya durbalasya api bādhaḥ
nahi utpanna śiṣṭāyāḥ agatika tvam asti
abhyāsa dvāraka tayā api upapatteḥ
prakṛte tu aśruta saṅkhyā anumānāt pūrvam eva śrutāyāḥ saṅkhyāyāḥ bhāvanā anvaya dvārā vidhi anvaya pratīteḥ auttarakālika tva abhāvena anumāna pratibandhāt  /
yuktā bhedaka tā iti vaiṣamyam

original: ata eva utpattivākyagatasaṅkhyāyā api yatra na vidhyanvayo viśiṣṭavidhigauravāpatteḥ
analyzed: atas eva utpatti vākya gata saṅkhyāyāḥ api yatra na vidhi anvayaḥ viśiṣṭa vidhi gaurava āpatteḥ
