sat prātipadika lakṣita tad devatya yāgaḥ eva anveti iti śakya arthasya vidhi anvaya abhāvāt na

original: dhātvarthabhedakatā yathā “samidho yajatī” tyādāviti kaustubhe vistara ityarthaḥ //
analyzed: dhātvartha bhedaka tā yathā samidhaḥ yajati tyādau iti kaustubhe vistaraḥ iti arthaḥ
vidheya saṅkhyāyāḥ karma sāmānādhikaraṇye karma bhedaka tvam tad abhāve tat na iti nirūpaṇam
karma samāna adhikaraṇā iti

original: ata eva karmasāmānādhikaraṇyābhāvādeva “na trirvediṃ prokṣatī“tyādau karmabhedakatvam /
analyzed: atas eva karma sāmānādhikaraṇya abhāvāt eva na tris vedim prokṣati ityādau karma bhedaka tvam
tris ityasya kriyā abhyāsa vṛtti gaṇanā arthaka suc pratyaya anta tvena abhyāsa vṛtti saṅkhyā pratipādaka tvāt iti arthaḥ
bhāvanā bhedaḥ tu śabda antarāt iti atra pūjya pāda ukta śabda antaram eva vivakṣitam
na tu mūla uktam
aindra vāyava ādi vākye tu kaustubha uktam anyat ityādi nirūpaṇam

original: saṅkhyāyā dhātvarthabhedakatve 'pi kathaṃ bhāvanābheda ityata āha --------- bhāvanābhedastviti //
analyzed: saṅkhyāyāḥ dhātvartha bhedaka tve pi katham bhāvanā bhedaḥ iti atas āha bhāvanā bhedaḥ tu iti
yadi api samāna pada upātta dhātvartha avarodhe pada antara upātta dhātvarthasya avacchedaka tva ayogaḥ iti evam guṇa nyāya saṃkīrṇa śabda antara nyāyāt na bhāvanā bhedaḥ saṃbhavati
na api aparyāya dhātu niṣpannam ākhyāta rūpam mūla uktam śabda antara svarūpam paryāya dhātoḥ eva ākhyāta niṣpatteḥ

original: tathāpi kāryatāvacchedakatattaddhomatvabhedāt kāraṇatāvacchedakayatnatve 'pi vaijātyamityevaṃvidhāt svoktaśabdāntarādyukta eva tadbheda ityevakāreṇa  #
analyzed: tathā api kārya tā avacchedaka tad tad homa tva bhedāt kāraṇa tā avacchedaka yatna tve pi vaijātyam iti evaṃvidhāt sva ukta śabda antara ādi uktaḥ eva tad bhedaḥ iti evakāreṇa
sūcitam
bhāvanānām bhede ca eka pada upādānena yugapad pratīteḥ bhinna pratīti viṣaya aneka mukhya viśeṣya rāhitya rūpa eka vākya tva lakṣaṇasya saṃbhavāt na vākya bhedaḥ
etena eka prātipadika upātta aneka agnīṣoma viśiṣṭa devatā ekatā vat eka dhātu upātta aneka homa viśiṣṭa bhāvanāyāḥ api aikyam eva astu

original: yatra nirapekṣotpannānāṃ karaṇatā phalavākye śrutā tatra karaṇatānāmabhede pramāṇābhāve
analyzed: yatra nirapekṣa utpannānām karaṇa tā phala vākye śrutā tatra karaṇa tānām abhede pramāṇa abhāve
pi yatra utpadyamānāni eva karmāṇi bhinnāni tatra karaṇa tā bhedasya bhāvanā bhedam antareṇa asaṃbhava rūpa śabda antara nyāyasya apravṛtteḥ iti api
apāstam
asmad ukta śabda antara nyāyasya avikala tvāt iti bhāvaḥ
yadi api pūjya pāda ukta śabda antara nyāyasya api avyāpaka tvam

original: aindravāyavamityādau prakṛtyarthabhedena pratyayārthadravyabhede tatra tatra vārtikādau kaustubheca śabdāntaranyāyenopapādite 'saṃbhavāt /
analyzed: aindra vāyavam ityādau prakṛti artha bhedena pratyaya artha dravya bhede tatra tatra vārtika ādau kaustubhe ca śabda antara nyāyena upapādite saṃbhavāt

original: ata eva ekaprakṛtyarthāvaruddhe pratyayārthe prakṛtyantarasya niveśāyogarūpaguṇanyāyasaṃkīrṇaśabdāntarasyaivabhedakatvaṃ tatsādhāraṇaṃ vaktuṃ
analyzed: atas eva eka prakṛti artha avaruddhe pratyaya arthe prakṛti antarasya niveśa ayoga rūpa guṇa nyāya saṃkīrṇa śabda antarasya eva bhedaka tvam tat sādhāraṇam vaktum

original: tathāpi uktarītyā saṃkhyāsthale tasya bhāvanābhedakatvāsaṃbhavāt bhāvanābhedaprayojanaṃ śabdāntaraṃ pūjyapādoktameva /
analyzed: tathā api ukta rītyā saṃkhyā sthale tasya bhāvanā bhedaka tva asaṃbhavāt bhāvanā bheda prayojanam śabda antaram pūjya pāda uktam eva
devatā tva ādi bheda prayojanam tu astu nāma tādṛśam anyat
yadi tu aikarūpye āgrahaḥ tadā vibhinna prakṛti artha tvam eva śabda antaram
tat ca kvacid kārya tā avacchedaka bheda jñāpanena kvacid ca sva avarodha kṛta bheda jñāpanena pratyaya artha bheda jñāpakam ityādi ūhyam iti
guṇāt saṅkhyāyāḥ vailakṣaṇya nirūpaṇa pūrvakam saṅkhyāyāḥ svatantra mānatva nirūpaṇam
na ca na saṅkhyā svatantram mānam
ekasmin karmaṇi aniśa māna tva sāmyena guṇe eva antarbhāvāt iti vācyam
a niviśamāna tva sāmye pi utpatti gata saṅkhyāyāḥ pramāṇa antara siddha utpattikasya eva karmaṇaḥ bhedakatva mātra bodhakatvāt
tistraḥ āhutīḥ iti atra hi śabda antara ādinā eva utpatti paratva avadhāraṇam
na tu saṅkhyāyāḥ tatra vyāpāraḥ
api tu aneka tva bodha mātre

original: guṇasya satyapyāgneyādāvutpattivākyagatasya bhedakatve utpannavākyagatasyāpyaniviśamānatvena svaviśiṣṭakarmotpattidvārā bhedabodhakatvamiti  #
analyzed: guṇasya sati api āgneya ādau utpatti vākya gatasya bhedaka tve utpanna vākya gatasya api aniviśamāna tvena sva viśiṣṭa karma utpatti dvārā bheda bodhaka tvam iti
vaiṣamyam
atas yuktam saṅkhyāyāḥ māna antara tvam iti
pūrva uttara pakṣa prayojanam
prakāśa kāra uktasya api prayojanasya sva avirodhaḥ
tadīya vikalpa nirāsaḥ ca
vedi prokṣaṇa mantra vat iti
tris vedim prokṣati iti vihitasya prokṣaṇasya ekasya eva tris abhyāsa vidhāne karmaṇa

original: ekatvāt karmādeḥ sakṛt paṭhitamantrāntakālakatvāvirodhāt sakṛdeva “vedirasi barhiṣe
analyzed: ekatvāt karma ādeḥ sakṛt paṭhita mantra anta kālaka tva avirodhāt sakṛt eva vediḥ asi barhiṣe

original: tvā svāhā” iti mantraḥ prayoktavya ityekādaśāntyapāde vakṣyate /
analyzed: tvā svāhā iti mantraḥ prayoktavyaḥ iti ekādaśa antya pāde vakṣyate

original: tadvadihāpi karmaṇa ekatvāt tasya trirabhyāse 'pyāmanamasyāmanasyeti mantrasya sakṛtprayogaḥ pūrvapakṣe,
analyzed: tadvat iha api karmaṇaḥ eka tvāt tasya tris abhyāse mantrasya sakṛt prayogaḥ pūrvapakṣe
siddhānte tu yathāsaṅkhyam mantra trayasya karma traya aṅga tvāt prati karma ekaika mantra pāṭhena āvṛttiḥ iti arthaḥ

original: yadyapi prakāśakāraiḥ ----------- idaṃ prayojanaṃ yatraivañjātīyake ekasyaiva mantrasya viniyogastatraiva jñeyam /
analyzed: yadi api prakāśa kāraiḥ idam prayojanam yatra evañjātīyake ekasya eva mantrasya viniyogaḥ tatra eva jñeyam

original: yatratvāmanahomeṣu “āmanamasyāmanasya devā iti tistra āhutīrjuhotī“ti vākye āmanamasyāmanasyeti pratīkena “āmanamasyāmanasya devā ye sajātāssamanasaḥ
analyzed: yatra tu āmana homeṣu āmanam asya āmanasya devāḥ iti tistraḥ āhutīḥ juhoti iti vākye āmanam asya āmanasya iti pratīkena āmanam asya āmanasya devāḥ ye sajātāḥ samanasaḥ
āmanamasya āmanasya devāḥ ye kumārāḥ samanasaḥ

original: āmanamasyāmanasya yāḥstriyaḥ samanasa” iti mantratrayasya viniyogastatra guṇānāṃ
analyzed: āmanam asya āmanasya yāḥ striyaḥ samanasaḥ iti mantra trayasya viniyogaḥ tatra guṇānām

original: ca parārthatvāditi nyāyena pūrvapakṣe abhyāsāṅgatve pramāṇābhāvāt ekakarmāṅgatvena
analyzed: ca parārtha tvāt iti nyāyena pūrvapakṣe abhyāsa aṅga tve pramāṇa abhāvāt eka karma aṅga tvena
mantra trayasya vikalpaḥ

original: siddhāntetu triṣu karmasu trayo mantrā aṅgamiti prayojanamuktam;
analyzed: siddhānte tu triṣu karmasu trayaḥ mantrāḥ aṅgam iti prayojanam uktam

original: tathāpi vikalpenāpi prāptasyaikasyaiva mantrasya sakṛdeva prayoga ityuktaprayojanasya siddhiravikalaiva /
analyzed: tathā api vikalpena api prāptasya ekasya eva mantrasya sakṛt eva prayogaḥ iti ukta prayojanasya siddhiḥ avikalā eva
yat tu teṣām vikalpa abhidhānam
tat tu karmaṇaḥ eka tve pīti karaṇa upātta mantra trayasya samuccaya pratīteḥ yuktam iti upekṣitam pūjya pādaiḥ
iti karaṇa viniyoge siddhānte yathāsaṅkhyam mantra trayasya ekaika karma aṅga tva nirūpaṇam

original: kathaṃ tarhi siddhānte na samastasyaikaikakarmasādhanatvamiti cet,
analyzed: katham tarhi siddhānte na samastasya ekaika karma sādhanatvam iti ced
ucyate

original: karmatrayapakṣe hi mantratrayasyāpi pratyekaṃ mantratvaprasiddheḥ samasaṅkhyanyāyasahakṛtāt
analyzed: karma traya pakṣe hi mantra trayasya api pratyekam mantra tva prasiddheḥ sama saṅkhya nyāya sahakṛtāt
mantra antena karma ādiḥ sannipātyaḥ iti vacanāt ekaikasya ekaika karma aṅga tve pi iti karaṇa avagata samuccayasya
karma traya samuccaya abhiprāyeṇa api upapattau na kaścana doṣaḥ

original: ata evaitādṛśaviṣaya evāvṛttisidhyarthatvena “mantrāntena karmādi” rityetadvacanasārthakyamekādaśe pūjyapādairvakṣyate /
analyzed: atas eva etādṛśa viṣaye eva āvṛtti sidhi artha tvena mantra antena karma ādi riti etad vacana sārthakyam ekādaśe pūjya pādaiḥ vakṣyate

original: yadyapi saṃhitāyām “āmanamasyāmanasya devā ye sajātāḥ kumārāssamanaso ye mahāntaḥ”
analyzed: yadi api saṃhitāyām āmanamasya āmanasya devāḥ ye sajātāḥ kumārāḥ samanasaḥ ye mahāntaḥ

original: ityādireko mantrastathā “āmanamasyāmanasya devā yāḥ striyaḥ samanasaḥ” ityādiraparaśceti
analyzed: ityādiḥ ekaḥ mantraḥ tathā āmanam asya āmanasya devāḥ yāḥ striyaḥ samanasaḥ ityādiḥ aparaḥ ca iti
dvau eva mantrau āmnātau

original: tathāpi sajātāḥ kumārā iti padabhedamavalambya sajātā ityasyānantaraṃ samanasa ityagrimānuṣaṅgeṇa kumārā ityasmāt pūrvaṃ āmanamasyāmanasyeti  #
analyzed: tathā api sajātāḥ kumārāḥ iti pada bhedam avalambya sajātāḥ ityasya anantaram samanasaḥ iti agrima anuṣaṅgeṇa kumārāḥ iti asmāt pūrvam āmanam asya āmanasya iti
pūrva anuṣaṅgeṇa ca mantra trayam jñeyam
prayojana antaram ca kaustubhe draṣṭavyam
vṛtti kārīya udāharaṇa parityāgena bhāṣyakāreṇa udaharaṇa antare bheda abheda cintāyāḥ nimitta nirūpaṇam

original: etaccodāharaṇaṃ vṛttikāreṇa darśitamapyatra saṅkhyāyāḥ karmasāmānādhikaraṇyena kriyāgatabhedakatvasya
analyzed: etat ca udāharaṇam vṛtti kāreṇa darśitam api atra saṅkhyāyāḥ karma sāmānādhikaraṇyena kriyā gata bhedaka tvasya

original: sphuṭatvena pūrvapakṣānutthānādayuktamiti tuśabdena sūcayan tadabhiprāyeṇa bhāṣyakāreṇodāharaṇāntare
analyzed: sphuṭa tvena pūrvapakṣa anutthānāt ayuktam iti tuśabdena sūcayan tad abhiprāyeṇa bhāṣyakāreṇa udāharaṇa antare
bheda abhedau cintitau
tām cintām darśayati bhāṣyakāreṇa tu iti
prājāpatyān iti atra prakṛti pratyaya tad artha ādi vivekaḥ

original: prājāpatyāniti pade prakṛtyā prajāpatiḥ taddhitena devatāviśiṣṭaṃ dravyaṃ paśvākhyaṃ dvitīyayā ca lakṣaṇayā karaṇatvaṃ bahuvacanena bahutvamucyata  #
analyzed: prājāpatyān iti pade prakṛtyā prajāpatiḥ taddhitena devatā viśiṣṭam dravyam paśu ākhyam dvitīyayā ca lakṣaṇayā karaṇa tvam bahuvacanena bahu tvam ucyata
iti vastu sthitiḥ
paśu padam ca dravya viśeṣa tātparya grāhakam

original: tatra padadvaye 'pi bahutvasya sāmānādhikaraṇyasaṃbandhena karaṇatvenānvitasyāpi pārṣṭhiko dravyeṇaivānvayaḥ /
analyzed: tatra pada dvaye pi bahu tvasya sāmānādhikaraṇya saṃbandhena karaṇa tvena anvitasya api pārṣṭhikaḥ dravyeṇa eva anvayaḥ

original: evaṃ sthite bahuvacanopāttabahutvānvayāyaikaśeṣasyāvaśyakatve sati kinnu ayaṃ taddhitāntānāmekaśeṣaḥ kṛto bhavet,
analyzed: evam sthite bahuvacana upātta bahu tva anvayāya ekaśeṣasya āvaśyaka tve sati kin nu ayam taddhita antānām ekaśeṣaḥ kṛtaḥ bhavet
kiṃvā kṛta eka śeṣāṇām paścāt taddhita saṅgatiḥ
pratyaya artha bahu tvam hi pratyakṣam upalabhyate

original: tatkṛtaṃ caikaśeṣatvamiti na prakṛtau bhavedi“ti vārtike taddhitapratyayottaraśrūyamāṇabahutvānvayānurodhena
analyzed: tat kṛtam ca ekaśeṣa tvam iti na prakṛtau bhavet iti vārtike taddhita pratyaya uttara śrūyamāṇa bahu tva anvaya anurodhena
pratyaye bhāsamānam api ekaśeṣam nyāyasudhā kṛtā kevala pratyaya prayoga asaṃbhavāt taddhitasya api

original: devatāviśiṣṭadravyavācitvāt tanmātraikaśeṣe 'pi viśiṣṭe taddhitārtha eva bahutvānvayāpattyā
analyzed: devatā viśiṣṭa dravya vāci tvāt tanmātra ekaśeṣe viśiṣṭe taddhita arthe eva bahu tva anvaya āpattyā
dravya devatā anvaya bhedāt yāga bheda āpatteḥ pūrvapakṣa anutthāna āpatteḥ upekṣya taddhitasya
sarvanāma artha vṛtti tvāt sarvanāmnaḥ ca sannihita paśu parāmarśi tvāt bahuvacana anta paśu pada anurodhena

original: asyacāsyacāsyacetyete teṣāmityevaṃ sarvanāmna eva ekaśeṣakalpanayā bahutvasaṅkhyāvacchinnasarvanāmārtha
analyzed: asya ca asya ca asya ca iti ete teṣām iti evam sarvanāmnaḥ eva ekaśeṣa kalpanayā bahu tva saṅkhyā avacchinna sarvanāma artha

original: eva prajāpatirdevatā eṣāmiti taddhitotpādāt taduttarabahuvacanasyānuvādatvāt bahūnāṃ
analyzed: eva prajāpatiḥ devatā eṣām iti taddhita utpādāt tad uttara bahuvacanasya anuvāda tvāt bahūnām
paśūnām eka devatā saṃbandhena karma eka tvam iti pūrvapakṣaḥ sādhitaḥ
tama śruta sarvanāma ekaśeṣa kalpane pramāṇa abhāvāt taddhitasya viśiṣṭa vāci tve pi bahutvasya

original: vakṣyamāṇarītyā viśeṣya evānvayopapatteḥ pūrvapakṣotthānasaṃbhavāt ayuktatvena sūcayan
analyzed: vakṣyamāṇa rītyā viśeṣye eva anvaya upapatteḥ pūrvapakṣa utthāna saṃbhavāt ayukta tvena sūcayan
taddhita ekaśeṣam eva pārtha sārathi darśitam aṅgīkṛtya pūrvapakṣam āha tatra yadi api iti
taddhita mātrasya ekaśeṣa nirūpaṇam
kevala pratyaya prayoga asaṃbhavena pratyaya eka śeṣa asaṃbhavam parihartum yadi api ca ityādi uktam

original: 'gargasyāpatyānītyarthe gargādibhyo yañi' tyanena yañpratyayatrayaprāpteḥ tatra yathā
analyzed: gargasya apatyāni iti arthe garga ādibhyaḥ yañi ti anena yañ pratyaya traya prāpteḥ tatra yathā

original: garga u ya ya ya iti samudāyasya taddhitāntatvena prātipadikatvāttataḥ prathamāvibhaktau
analyzed: gargaḥ u ya ya yaḥ iti samudāyasya taddhita anta tvena prātipadika tvāt tatas prathamā vibhaktau

original: parabhūtāyāmekaśeṣo mahābhāṣye uktastathehāpi bahuvacanānurodhena prajāpati u ya
analyzed: para bhūtāyām eka śeṣaḥ mahābhāṣye uktaḥ tathā iha api bahuvacana anurodhena prajāpatiḥ ya
yaḥ yaḥ iti evam ekaśeṣaḥ tena prajāpatiḥ devatā eṣām iti arthe paścāt taddhitaḥ

original: natu prājāpatyaśca prājāpatyaśceti saptadaśakṛtva uccārya kṛtataddhitaikaśeṣa ityarthaḥ //
analyzed: na tu prājāpatyaḥ ca prājāpatyaḥ ca iti saptadaśa kṛtvas uccārya kṛta taddhita ekaśeṣaḥ iti arthaḥ
pratyayānām prakṛti artha anvita sva artha bodhaka tva nyāya virodhena devatā anvayāt pūrvam dravya saṅkhyā anvaya pratipādanam

original: evañcaikaśeṣitayapratyayārthe dravye bahutvānvayo devatānvayottaraṃ tataḥ pūrvamevavetyubhayathāpi
analyzed: evam ca eka śeṣi taya pratyaya arthe dravye bahu tva anvayaḥ devatā anvaya uttaram tatas pūrvam eva vā iti ubhayathā api

original: saṃbhave niyāmakaṃ vaktuṃ prathamataḥ śuddhaviśeṣye tadanvayaṃ sādhayati ---------- tathāpīti /
analyzed: saṃbhave niyāmakam vaktum prathamatas śuddha viśeṣye tad anvayam sādhayati tathā api iti
tathā eva vyutpatteḥ iti

original: yadyapi pratyayānāṃ prakṛtyarthānvitasvārthābhidhāyitvena prajāpativṛttidevatātvaviśiṣṭe dravya eva prakṛtyarthe bahutvānvayāpatternyāyasudhākārāpāditayāgabhedāpattirdurvārā;
analyzed: yadi api pratyayānām prakṛti artha anvita sva artha abhidhāyi tvena prajāpati vṛtti devatā tva viśiṣṭe dravye eva prakṛti arthe bahutva anvaya āpatteḥ nyāya sudhākāra āpādita yāga bheda āpattiḥ durvārā
tathā api saṅkhyā rūpa pratyaya arthasya prakṛti artha viśeṣya anvayi tvam eva

original: anyathā dvau traya ityādau dvitvādiviśiṣṭe saṅkhyānvaye caturṇāṃ navānāṃ vā pratītyāpatteḥ /
analyzed: anyathā dvau trayaḥ ityādau dvi tva ādi viśiṣṭe saṅkhyā anvaye caturṇām navānām vā pratīti āpatteḥ

original: atastatra viśeṣyamātre 'nvayavadihāpi viśiṣṭasya taddhitāntārthatve 'pi viśeṣyamātra eva saṅkhyānvaya ityavivādamityarthaḥ /
analyzed: atas tatra viśeṣya mātre nvaya vat iha api viśiṣṭasya taddhita anta artha tve pi viśeṣya mātre eva saṅkhyā anvayaḥ iti avivādam iti arthaḥ
tad saṃbandha pratīteḥ iti
dravye saṅkhyā anvaya pakṣe śruta saptadaśa tvena prākṛta paśu ekatva bādha nirūpaṇam
nanu lāghava sattve pi sandehe vākyaśeṣa sthānīya atideśāt eva astu nirṇayaḥ
sa hi prakṛtitaḥ eka paśu niṣpanna ekādaśa avadāna gaṇam ekam prāpayati
prakṛtau paśum ālabhata iti hṛdaya ādi prakṛti bhūta paśu gata ekatvasya api vivakṣā iti ekasya eva avadāna gaṇasya aṅga tvāt
yāga ekatve tasya savanīya atideśena ekasya eva prāpteḥ saptadaśa paśu prakṛti tva anupapattiḥ

original: yastu śāstradīpikāyāṃ ----------- pūrvapakṣe ekādaśinīvikāratvenaikādaśāvadānagaṇaikatāprāptāvapi codakavirodhaḥ siddhānte āpāditaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ tu śāstradīpikāyām pūrvapakṣe ekādaśinī vikāra tvena ekādaśa avadāna gaṇa ekatā prāptau api codaka virodhaḥ siddhānte āpāditaḥ

original: sa “tatpravṛttirgaṇeṣu syādi” tyāṣṭamikanyāyasya bhinnayāgatāyāṃ gaṇatvena ekādaśinīvikāratvopapādakatve
analyzed: sa tad pravṛttiḥ gaṇeṣu bhinna yāga tāyām gaṇa tvena ekādaśinī vikāra tva upapādaka tve
pi eka yāga pakṣe tad apravṛttyā sutyā kāla tva sāmānyena ekādaśinī vat savanīya vikāra tvasya eva
vārtike ukta tvāt upekṣyaḥ
yat tu somanāthena sutyā kāla tva sāmya apekṣayā eka kāla ālambhanīya gaṇa saṃbandhi tva sādṛśyasya ādhikyāt ekādaśinī vikāra tvam samarthitam
tad tad apekṣayā api śīghra upasthita eka yāga tva rūpa antaraṅga sādṛśyasya ādhikyāt savanīya vikāra tvasya eva
prāpteḥ ekādaśinyāḥ svatantra karma tva abhāvena gaṇa saṃbandhi tvena tad vikāra tvasya siddhānte
pi anaṅgīkārāt tad antargata ekatara yāge ca paryāpti saṃbandhena gaṇa tva sattve pi paśu gaṇa saṃbandhi tva anupapatteḥ ayuktam iti upekṣyam

original: yadyapi caupadeśikyā paśusaṅkhyayā ātideśikyā bādhaḥ syāt;
analyzed: yadi api ca aupadeśikyā paśu saṅkhyayā ātideśikyā bādhaḥ syāt
tathā api hṛdaya ādi ekatvasya bhinna viṣaya tvena bādhā abhāvāt hṛdaya ādi ekatvasya saptadaśa prakṛti tva anupapattiḥ tad avasthā eva

original: yāgabhede tu pratiyāgamatideśabhedāt tāvatāṃ gaṇānāṃ prāptestāvat paśuprakṛtitvopapattiḥ /
analyzed: yāga bhede tu pratiyāgam atideśa bhedāt tāvatām gaṇānām prāpteḥ tāvat paśu prakṛti tva upapattiḥ
atas tideśena eva vākyaśeṣa sthānīyena nirṇaya upapatteḥ devatā tva anvaya uttaram dravya mātre

original: viśiṣṭa eva bahutvānvayādyāgabheda evetyabhipretya prācāṃ siddhāntayuktimāśaṅkya
analyzed: viśiṣṭaḥ eva bahu tva anvayāt yāga bhedaḥ eva iti abhipretya prācām siddhānta yuktim āśaṅkya
nirākaroti na ca iti
paśugata eka tvasya iti
vākyaśeṣa sthānīyena atideśena avirodhāt tena nirṇayaḥ iti devatā tva anvaya uttaram eva dravya anvaya asaṃbhava upapādanam
prakṛtau hi paśu śāstrasya viśasana ādi rūpa tātparya grāhaka anurodhena sarva avayava dvārā
paśu sādhanatā bodhaka tve prāpte hṛdaya ādi śāstraiḥ itara avayava parisaṅkhyā karaṇāt arthāt
paśu śāstraiḥ hṛdaya ādi sādhanatā bodhaka tvāt tatra ca paśu gata ekatvena hṛdaya ādi ekatvasya artha siddha tvāt na
tad gata eka tva aṃśe vidhi kalpanam
yadi api ca avadāna vidhi anyathā anupapattyā hṛdaya ādi sādhana vidhi kalpanam
tathā api tadgata ekatvasya artha siddha tvāt nā eva vidheya tvam āvaśyakam

original: ataśca yathaiva hṛdayādigaṇasya yāgasādhanasyāpi paśugataikatvānurodhāt ekatvaṃ prakṛtau,
analyzed: atas ca yathā eva hṛdaya ādi gaṇasya yāga sādhanasya api paśu gata ekatva anurodhāt ekatvam prakṛtau
tathā eva tad gata aupadeśika saptadaśa tvena ekatva bādhāt tad anurodhena hṛdaya ādi gaṇe saptadaśa tvam iti
yāga eka tve pi ārthikasya atideśa abhāvāt śruta saṅkhyayā bādhāt ca atideśa avirodhāt na tasya
nirṇāyaka tva saṃbhavaḥ iti arthaḥ
paśūnām iti
yatra hi pramāṇa antareṇa pratyeka vṛtti karaṇa tvam tad tad utpatti vākyeṣu avagatam

original: tatra pratyekakaraṇatāśrayāṇāmeva pārṣṭhike bahutvānvaye sati karaṇānāmeva samuccayaḥ,
analyzed: tatra pratyeka karaṇatā āśrayāṇām eva pārṣṭhike bahu tva anvaye sati karaṇānām eva samuccayaḥ
na tu samuditānām karaṇa tvam ekam

original: yatratu pramāṇāntareṇa na tadbhedāvagamastatra lāghavenaikasyaiva karaṇatvasya kalpanādekakaraṇatāśraya eva pārṣṭhikastadanvaya iti samuditānāṃ  #
analyzed: yatra tu pramāṇa antareṇa na tad bheda avagamaḥ tatra lāghavena ekasya eva karaṇatvasya kalpanāt eka karaṇatā āśrayaḥ eva pārṣṭhikaḥ tad anvayaḥ iti samuditānām
tatra karaṇa tvam
atas yatra pramāṇa antareṇa evā ekā karaṇa tā pratīyate

original: tatraiva samuditānāṃ karaṇatve siddhe prakṛte paśūnāṃ yāgakaraṇatvayogyatāyāḥ pratyekameva
analyzed: tatra eva samuditānām karaṇa tve siddhe prakṛte paśūnām yāga karaṇa tva yogyatāyāḥ pratyekam eva

original: pratīteḥ pratyekakaraṇatāśraye dravye bahutvasyānvayāt paśutvāvacchinnasyaiva devatātvapratisaṃbandhitvam /
analyzed: pratīteḥ pratyeka karaṇatā āśraye dravye bahu tvasya anvayāt paśu tva avacchinnasya eva devatā tva pratisaṃbandhi tvam
nahi paśu samudāye ekam sva tvam asti
pramāṇa abhāvāt
yathā iṣṭa viniyoga ādi rūpasya svatva kāryasya pratyekam darśanāt ca
samudāyasya svātantryeṇa viniyoga anarha tvāt ca

original: ataḥ pratyekaṃ paśūnāṃ svatvāśrayatvāt taddhvaṃsānukūlavyāpārākhyayāgakaraṇatvamapi pratyekameveti tadarthavihitadevatātaddhitenāpi pratyekameva  #
analyzed: atas pratyekam paśūnām svatva āśraya tvāt tad dhvaṃsa anukūla vyāpāra ākhya yāga karaṇa tvam api pratyekam eva iti tad artha vihita devatā taddhitena api pratyekam eva
atas eva karaṇa tva viśiṣṭa paśu bodhaka śabdasya eva tātparya grāhaka tvam
na tu bahuvacanasya api
tad arthasya haviṣṭva anavacchedaka tvāt iti arthaḥ
atas ca yāga sādhana tve yogyatā avacchedaka paśu tva avacchinnasya eva bahu tva avicchinnasya
devatā saṃbandhāt tasya ca pratisaṃbandhi tā paryāpti adhikaraṇa tā bhedena bhinna tvāt bheda siddhiḥ iti āha
atas ca iti

original: (saptadaśatve taddhitopāttadevatātvasya saṅkhyānvayātpūrvaṃ dravyānvaya eva yāgabhedasādhaka iti nirūpaṇam)
analyzed: saptadaśa tve taddhita upātta devatā tvasya saṅkhyā anvayāt pūrvam dravya anvayaḥ eva yāga bheda sādhakaḥ iti nirūpaṇam
atas tad anurodhena eva iti

original: yattu śāstradīpikāyāṃ dravyasya taddhitābhihitasya viśiṣṭasyaiva bahutvāvagamamātrādetādṛśe
analyzed: yat tu śāstradīpikāyām dravyasya taddhita abhihitasya viśiṣṭasya eva bahu tva avagama mātrāt etādṛśe

original: viṣaye yāgabhedasādhane “vasantāya kapiñjalānālabhate” ityādau taddhitābhāve bahutvāvacchinneṣveva
analyzed: viṣaye yāga bheda sādhane vasantāya kapiñjalān ālabhate ityādau taddhita abhāve bahu tva avacchinneṣu eva

original: devatāsaṃbandhādyāgabhedānāpatterna kevalaṃ bahutvānvayāt pūrvaṃ devatātvasya taddhitopāttasya
analyzed: devatā saṃbandhāt yāga bheda anāpatteḥ na kevalam bahutva anvayāt pūrvam devatā tvasya taddhita upāttasya
dravye nvayaḥ yoga bheda sādhakaḥ kintu eka paśu niṣpanna ekādaśa avadāna gaṇa eka tā prāpaka codana anugrahaḥ eva iti uktam
tat nirasitum eva kāraḥ

original: tataśca vasantavākye pūrvoktarītyāvadānagaṇagataikatvasyā'rthikatvenānatideśe sati na tena yāgabhedaḥ,
analyzed: tatas ca vasanta vākye pūrva ukta rītyā avadāna gaṇa gata ekatvasya ārthika tvena anatideśe sati na tena yāga bhedaḥ
kintu caturthī upāttasya tyajyamāna dravya uddeśya tva ākhyasya devatā tvasya tyajyamāna dravya tva rūpa haviḥ tvam
vinā anupapatteḥ kapiñjalānām ca pratyekam eva yāga sādhana tva ākhya haviḥ tva yogāt pratisaṃbandhi tā avacchedaka kapiñjala tva avacchinne
pratyekam devatā saṃbandha bhedāt eva iti arthaḥ

original: anenaiva nyāyena “saptadaśa mārutīstrivṛtsā upakaroti saptadaśa praśnīnukṣṇastān
analyzed: anena eva nyāyena saptadaśa mārutīḥ trivṛt sāḥ upakaroti saptadaśa praśnīn ukṣṇaḥ tān
paryagnikṛtān itarāḥ ālabhante pra itarān utsṛjanti iti atra ca paryagnikaraṇa anta aṅga rīti vidhānāt ekādaśa avadāna gaṇa prāpti abhāve
yāga bheda upapādanam jñeyam
na tu prācīna ukta rītyā iti sūcayitum sarvatra iti uktam
yat tu parasvat vākye yathāśruta navama upāntya adhikaraṇa gata śāstradīpikā grantha svārasyāt prakāśakārāṇām yāga aikya uktiḥ
tat dūṣaṇam kaustubhe eva draṣṭavyam

original: ataḥ parasvadvākye nyāyasudhākāropapādito yāgabheda eva yukta iti bhāvaḥ //
analyzed: atas parasvat vākye nyāyasudhākāra upapāditaḥ yāga bhedaḥ eva yuktaḥ iti bhāvaḥ
prayojanam iti

original: ekapaśuvismaraṇena ṣoḍaśabhiḥ kṛte 'pi yāge yāgasya jātatvānna punaryāgakaraṇaṃ pūrvapakṣe /
analyzed: eka paśu vismaraṇena ṣoḍaśabhiḥ kṛte yāge yāgasya jāta tvāt na punar yāga karaṇam pūrvapakṣe
siddhānte tu tad paśu dravyaka yāga antara anuṣṭhānam iti arthaḥ
prayojana antarāṇi prācīnaiḥ darśitāni kaustubhe draṣṭavyāni
iti saptamam saṅkhyā kṛta karma bheda adhikaraṇam
a pā saṃjñā caḥ

original: jyotiṣṭomaṃ prakṛtya “athaiṣa jyotirathaiṣa viśvajyotirathaiṣa sarvajyotiretena sahastradakṣiṇena
analyzed: jyotiṣṭomam prakṛtya atha eṣa jyotiḥ atha eṣa viśva jyotiḥ atha eṣa sarva jyotiḥ etena sahastra dakṣiṇena

original: yajete“ti śruteṣu jyotirādipadānāṃ guṇaviśeṣe prasiddhyabhāvāt dyotanātmakatvena
analyzed: yajeta iti śruteṣu jyotiḥ ādi padānām guṇa viśeṣe prasiddhi abhāvāt dyotana ātmaka tvena

original: prasiddhyupapādane karmaṇyapi tadāpatteretacchabdena ca tadvidhāne vākyabhedādyāpattesteṣāṃ
analyzed: prasiddhi upapādane karmaṇi api tad āpatteḥ etad śabdena ca tad vidhāne vākya bheda ādi āpatteḥ teṣām
nāma tvam tāvat avivādam
tat ca na prakṛtasya yāgasya
jyotiṣṭoma saṃjñā avarodhāt saṃjñā kāryasya vyavahārasya ekena eva siddheḥ itara vaiyarthyāt ca
na ca vinigamaka abhāvāt vikalpaḥ
athaśabdasya pūrva karma adhikāra vicchedakasya niyāmaka tvāt
atas eva vasante vasante jyotiṣe ti vat na ākhyā vikāra tva āśaṅkā
tasya avicchinne dhikāre samāmnānena tathā aṅgīkārāt
na ca evam adhikāra viccheda abhāve udbhida ādi saṃjñātaḥ bheda anāpattiḥ

original: jyotiṣṭomasaṃjñāyā utpattiśiṣṭatvābhāvena dvayorapi vikalpo vaiparītyaṃ vā kiṃ na syāditi ---------- vācyam;
analyzed: jyotiṣṭoma saṃjñāyāḥ utpatti śiṣṭa tva abhāvena dvayoḥ api vikalpaḥ vaiparītyam vā kim na syāt iti vācyam
soma yāge kḷpta pravṛtti nimittaka jyotiṣṭoma saṃjñā avaruddhe udbhid saṃjñāyāḥ katham api niveśa anupapatteḥ tasyāḥ bhedaka tvāt

original: ataeva yatra na kiñcinniyāmakamasti tatra saṃkalpādau saṃjñayorvikalpa eva /
analyzed: ataeva yatra na kiñcid niyāmakam asti tatra saṃkalpa ādau saṃjñayoḥ vikalpaḥ eva
prakṛte tu athaśabdena vicchedāt bhedaka tvam eva saṃjñāyāḥ

original: sahastradakṣiṇena yajetetyetāvataiva prakṛtayāgānuvādena guṇavidhyupapattau etacchabdāntasya jyotirādivākyasya vaiyarthyaprasaṅgācca /
analyzed: sahastra dakṣiṇena yajeta iti etāvatā eva prakṛta yāga anuvādena guṇa vidhi upapattau etad śabda antasya jyotiḥ ādi vākyasya vaiyarthya prasaṅgāt ca

original: ato dyotanādiyogena jyotirādisaṃjñaṃ karmatrayaṃ somayāgaprakṛtikaṃ tattadvākyairutpannaṃ
analyzed: atas dyotana ādi yogena jyotiḥ ādi saṃjñam karma trayam soma yāga prakṛtikam tad tad vākyaiḥ utpannam

original: sahastradakṣiṇakaṃ “ya etena ṛddhikāmo yajete” ti vākyena phale vidhīyate iti saṃjñayā karmabhedaḥ // 8 //
analyzed: sahastra dakṣiṇakam yaḥ etena ṛddhi kāmaḥ yajeta iti vākyena phale vidhīyate iti saṃjñayā karma bhedaḥ  /
iti aṣṭamam saṃjñā kṛta karma bheda adhikaraṇam
guṇa kṛta karma bheda adhikaraṇāt pūrvam saṃjñā kṛta karma bheda adhikaraṇa pravṛtti bīja saṅgati ādi nirūpaṇam
yadi api iha ṣaḍvidhaḥ karma bhedaḥ vakṣyate

original: śabdāntaramabhyāsaḥ saṅkhyā guṇaḥ prakriyā nāmadheyamityadhyāyopakramabhāṣye uddeśakramadarśanāt saṅkhyāguṇayoḥ karmāṅgatvasāmyācca saṅkhyānantaraṃ  #
analyzed: śabda antaram abhyāsaḥ saṅkhyā guṇaḥ prakriyā nāmadheyam iti adhyāya upakrama bhāṣye uddeśa krama darśanāt saṅkhyā guṇayoḥ karma aṅga tva sāmyāt ca saṅkhyā anantaram
guṇa cintā prāpnoti
tathā api guṇa ādi vicārasya aneka adhikaraṇa sādhya tvena bahu āyāsa sādhya tvāt saṅkhyā vat saṃjñāyāḥ
sūtrakṛtā nibaddham saṃjñā vicāram vivakṣuḥ bheda vicāreṇa pāda adhyāya saṃgatim
tathā pṛthaktva niveśa ākhya hetu sāmyāt dṛṣṭānta saṃgatim
athavā saṅkhyā vat saṃjñāyāḥ sva samāna adhikaraṇa sva āśraya pratiyogika bheda vyāpta tva rūpa pṛthaktva
niveśi tva asvabhāvāt na bhedaka tvam iti evam pūrvapakṣa utthānena pratyudāharaṇa rūpām vā anantara saṅgatim
pūrvapakṣam ca spaṣṭa tvāt a pradarśya eva yathāsūtram udāharaṇa pūrvakam siddhāntam eva āha
jyotiṣṭomam iti
dakṣiṇena yajeta iti asya agre etena ṛddhi kāmaḥ yajeta iti api śrutam
atha eṣa jyotiḥ iti atha eṣa gauḥ atha eṣaḥ āyuḥ iti udāharaṇa antarasya api upalakṣaṇam
śabda antara abhyāsa guṇa prakaraṇa antaraiḥ karma bhedasya prakṛte saṃbhavāt saṃjñayā eva tasya upapādanam
tatra eṣa jyotiḥ ityādīni asti iti adhyāhāre pi vibhajyamāna sākāṅkṣa tva abhāvāt trīṇi vākyāni
etena iti api tasmin sīda iti vat caturtham vākyam

original: yadyapi bhāvanāmātrabhedakasya śabdāntarasyātra dhātvarthasya bhāvanānavacchedakatvena na saṃbhavaḥ,
analyzed: yadi api bhāvanā mātra bhedakasya śabda antarasya atra dhātvarthasya bhāvanā anavacchedaka tvena na saṃbhavaḥ
na api vidhi punar śravaṇa rūpa abhyāsasya
vidheḥ aśravaṇāt
sahastra dakṣiṇā ādi vākye tad sattve pi guṇa paratvena anya paratvāt
na api guṇasya
jyotiḥ ādi padānām guṇe rūḍha tvena aprasiddheḥ
na api prakaraṇa antarasya
anupādeya guṇa abhāvāt
ṛddhi vākye tattve pi etad śabdena pūrva karma parāmarśena sannidhi abhāvāt ca

original: tathāpi saṃjñārūpapramāṇāntareṇa bhedaṃ sādhayituṃ nāmatvaṃ sādhayati ---------- jyotirāvipadānāmiti //
analyzed: tathā api saṃjñā rūpa pramāṇa antareṇa bhedam sādhayitum nāma tvam sādhayati jyotiḥ āvi padānām iti
jyotiḥ śabdasya dyuti dhātuka tvena dyotana ātmaka tvasya karma sādhāraṇya upapādanam
dyotana ātmaka tvena iti

original: dyutidhātordyuterisannādeścaja ityauṇādike isin pratyaye kṛte ādibhūtadakārasya jādeśeca kṛte jyotirādiśabdaniṣpatterdyetanātmakatvena prasiddhirityarthaḥ
analyzed: dyuti dhātoḥ dyuteḥ isanna ādeḥ ca jaḥ iti auṇādike isin pratyaye kṛte ādi bhūta dakārasya ja ādeśe ca kṛte jyotiḥ ādi śabda niṣpatteḥ dyetana ātmaka tvena prasiddhiḥ iti arthaḥ
karmaṇi api iti

original: svaphalasādhanatvena jyotiḥ śabdasya samastaphalasādhanatvena viśvajyotiḥsarvajyotiḥ padayośca karmaṇyapyudbhicchabdasyeva mukhyārthatayaiva  #
analyzed: sva phala sādhana tvena jyotiḥ śabdasya samasta phala sādhana tvena viśvajyotiḥ sarvajyotiḥ padayoḥ ca karmaṇi api udbhid śabdasya iva mukhya artha tayā eva
tad āpatteḥ iti arthaḥ
vākya bheda utpanna śiṣṭa jyotiḥ ādi guṇa tad prakhya nyāyaiḥ jyotiḥ ādi nāma tva upapādanam
tad vidhāne iti
etad śabdena pūrva nirdiṣṭa guṇa vidhāne prakṛti jyotiṣṭoma uddeśena jyotiḥ ādi guṇasya sahastra dakṣiṇā ādi guṇasya ca
vidhāne vākya bhedasya ādi pada upātta utpanna śiṣṭa jyotiḥ ādi guṇa niveśasya ca āpatteḥ iti athraḥ
avivādam iti

original: evaṃ gavādipadānāmapi dakṣiṇātvena sārvakāmyavākyaprāptaphalatvenaca prāptestatprakhyanyāyena ca nāmatvamavivādaṃ jñeyamityarthaḥ //
analyzed: evam gavā ādi padānām api dakṣiṇā tvena sārvakāmya vākya prāpta phalatvena ca prāpteḥ tad prakhya nyāyena ca nāma tvam avivādam jñeyam iti arthaḥ
nāma eka deśe nāma grahaṇa nyāyena jyotiḥ ādi nāmnām abhedaka tva śaṅkā

original: nanu nāmatve 'pi prakaraṇāt bhāmā satyabhāmetivat svārthavācakapadaghaṭitapadavattvasaṃbandhena vasantavākye jyotiḥ padasyevātratyajyotirādipadānāmapi  #
analyzed: nanu nāma tve pi prakaraṇāt bhāmā satyabhāmā iti vat svārtha vācaka pada ghaṭita padavattva saṃbandhena vasanta vākye jyotiḥ padasya iva atratya jyotiḥ ādi padānām api
jyotiṣṭoma nāma tva upapattiḥ

original: saṃbhavatica jyotīrūpastomasaṃbandhena jyotiṣṭomanāmna iva tādṛśastomasaṃbandhenaiteṣāmapi tannāmatvam /
analyzed: saṃbhavati ca jyotīḥ rūpa stoma saṃbandhena jyotiṣṭoma nāmnaḥ iva tādṛśa stoma saṃbandhena eteṣām api tad nāma tvam

original: ataḥ kathaṃ tenāpi bhedasiddhirityata āha --------- tacceti //
analyzed: atas katham tena api bheda siddhiḥ iti atas āha tat ca iti
athaśabdasya iti
na hi atra atha śabdasya ānantarya artha tvam śaṅkitum śakyam
ānantarya pratiyoginaḥ karmāntarasya asattvena tad arthaka tva anupapatteḥ
kāmyānām karmaṇām eka prayoga vidhi parigraha abhāvena krama asaṃbhavasya pañcame vakṣyamāṇa tvāt ca
uttara kāla tā mātrasya tu prāptatvena athaśabda vaiyarthya āpatteḥ ca
nā api pūrva prakṛta apekṣi tva paratvam
saṃhatya phala sādhana tva abhāvāt aṅga aṅgi bhāva abhāvāt ca tad anapekṣaṇāt
atas pariśeṣāt atha śabda anuśāsanam ityādi vat adhikāra viccheda dyotana pūrvakam adhikāra antara pratipādana ārthatvam eva iti

original: tasya niyāmakasya sattvāt na pūrvaprakṛtayāgasañjñātvaṃ vikalpenāpītyarthaḥ //
analyzed: tasya niyāmakasya sattvāt na pūrva prakṛta yāga sañjñā tvam vikalpena api iti arthaḥ
athaśabdasya pradhāna karma vicchedaka tvam na tu prayoga vicchedaka tvam iti nirūpaṇam
etena athaśabdena pūrva saṃjñā avacchinna prayogasya eva adhikāra vicchedāt tad anurodhena
ca etad śabdasya saṃjñā antara yukta prayoga parāmarśi tva avagateḥ tatra sahastra dakṣiṇā ādi vyavasthā ārtha tvena
saṃjñā antara sārthakyam iti api apāstam
karmaṇaḥ eva pradhāna tvena para sphūrttimatvena atha śabdena adhikāra viccheda pratīteḥ
ataeva iti
soma yāga adhikāra madhya vartinī hi saṃjñā tad viṣayiṇī iti śīghram niścīyate
na vicchinna ādhikārikā iti arthaḥ
katham api iti
bhāmā satyabhāmā pada nyāyena api iti arthaḥ
jyotiṣṭoma padasya tad vidhi anta prāpaka tvena sārthakya saṃbhavāt bhedaka tvam eva iti nirūpaṇam
ataeva yatra iti

original: yathā “vaiśvānaro jyotiṣṭomaḥ prāyaṇīyamaharbhavatī“ti vākye vaiśvānaraprāyaṇīyapadayoḥ kathamapi na sārthakyam;
analyzed: yathā vaiśvānaraḥ jyotiṣṭomaḥ prāyaṇīyam ahar bhavati iti vākye vaiśvānara prāyaṇīya padayoḥ katham api na sārthakyam

original: vaiśvānaradevasya grahāmnānāt tadīyavaiśvānaradevatayā yāge 'pi prasaṅgenopakārajananānnāmatvaṃ vaiśvānarapadasya,
analyzed: vaiśvānara devasya graha āmnānāt tadīya vaiśvānara devatayā yāge pi prasaṅgena upakāra jananāt nāmatvam vaiśvānara padasya
prāyaṇīya padasya prāthamya guṇa yogena nāma tvam

original: tatra vinigamanāvirahāt saṅkalpollekhādau vikalpa iṣṭa eva,

analyzed: jyotiṣṭoma padam tu gaṇa tva sāmānyena prāpta dvādaśa aha vidhi anta apodita jyotiṣṭoma vidhi anta prāpakam sat na vyartham iti na tasya saṃkalpa ullākha ādau

analyzed: sārthakyam yatra vā vinigamana aviraheṇa dvayoḥ api vikalpaḥ tatra saṃjñāyām karma bhedaka tva abhāve

original: pārṣṭhikastu devatātvasya dravyeṇa dravyasyaca yāgena saṃbandho yukta ityabhipretya niṣkṛṣṭāni pakṣāntarāṇyāha --------- vastutastviti //
analyzed: pārṣṭhikaḥ tu devatā tvasya dravyeṇa dravyasya ca yāgena saṃbandhaḥ yuktaḥ iti abhipretya niṣkṛṣṭāni pakṣa antarāṇi āha vastutas tu iti
āmikṣā anuniṣpanna vājina pratipatti artha yāga paratvam vājina vākyasya iti upapādanam
vājina pratipatti artham iti

original: āmikṣānuniṣpannajalarūpasya vājinasya pratipattyākāṅkṣayā'kāṅkṣita- vidhitvalābhāt pratipattyarthaṃ yāgāntaraṃ vidhīyata ityarthaḥ //
analyzed: āmikṣā anuniṣpanna jala rūpasya vājinasya pratipatti ākāṅkṣayā ākāṅkṣita vidhi tva lābhāt pratipatti artham yāga antaram vidhīyate iti arthaḥ

original: (guṇasya pūrvatrāniviśamānatvena vākyabhedāpattyā ca bhedakatvamiti śāstradīpikāyā ekaprasaratābhaṅgāpattyupalakṣaṇatvam)
yattu śāstradīpikāyāṃ ------- utpattiśiṣṭaguṇāvarodhena svaniveśamalabhamānatvena kvacit guṇasya bhedakatvam,
analyzed: yat tu śāstradīpikāyām utpatti śiṣṭa guṇa avarodhena sva niveśam alabhamāna tvena kvacid guṇasya bhedaka tvam

original: kvacittu vākyabhedāpattyeti dvaividhyaṃ guṇasya bhedakatve -------- uktaṃ tadupalakṣaṇam;
analyzed: kvacid tu vākya bheda āpattyā iti dvaividhyam guṇasya bhedaka tve uktam tat upalakṣaṇam

original: tṛtīyaprakārasyāpi saṃbhavāditi sūcayituṃ prakāratrayasādhāraṇyena guṇasya bhedakatve anugatarūpamāha --------- guṇasyaceti --------- ekaprasaratābhaṅgeti
analyzed: tṛtīya prakārasya api saṃbhavāt iti sūcayitum prakāra traya sādhāraṇyena guṇasya bhedaka tve anugata rūpam āha guṇasya ca iti eka prasara tā bhaṅga iti
vaṣaṭkartṛ vākye iti śeṣaḥ
vāsasā krīṇāti ityādiṣu na guṇāt kraya bhedaḥ iti nyāyasudhākāra mata nirāsa sūcanam
yat tu atra nyāyasudhā kṛta aruṇā vākye na eka guṇa upādānena viśiṣṭa kraya vidhi avaśyaṃbhāvena
tena vihite kraye utpatti śiṣṭa eka hāyanī ādi guṇa avarodhe vāsasā krīṇāti ityādibhiḥ vihitānām utpanna śiṣṭānām api
vāsaḥ prabhṛti dravyāṇām vikretrā an atirūpa kārya bhedāt niveśa saṃbhavāt na vāsaḥ prabhṛti vākyeṣu
guṇāt kriyā antara vidhānam iti uktam
tad dūṣaṇam kaustubhe draṣṭavyam
aruṇa adhikaraṇe ca iha api vakṣyate vistara bhayāt nā ucyate
pūrva uttara kalpa prayojanam
prayojanam āmikṣā vājinābhyām athavā ekatareṇa vā āmikṣā yāga anuṣṭhānam pūrvapakṣe
siddhānte tu kevalayā āmikṣayā eva vaiśvadeva yāgaḥ
vājinena ca yāga antara anuṣṭhānam iti spaṣṭa tvāt na uktam
iti navamam guṇa kṛta karma bheda adhikaraṇam
a pā aguṇe tu
yatra tu na utpattau guṇa śravaṇam
yathā agnihotram juhoti iti
tatra tad anuvādena dadhnā juhoti
payasā juhoti ityādibhiḥ sarvaiḥ eva guṇa vidhānam vikalpena

original: tatra khale kapotanyāyena sarveṣāmeva yugapatpravṛtterekāvaruddhatvābhāvāditi pratyudāharaṇamātram // 10 // 27 //
analyzed: tatra khale kapota nyāyena sarveṣām eva yugapad pravṛtteḥ eka avaruddha tva abhāvāt iti pratyudāharaṇa mātram
iti daśamam guṇāt karma bheda apavāda adhikaraṇam
spaṣṭa artham etat
iti daśamam guṇāt karma bheda apavāda adhikaraṇam
phala śruteḥ
agnihotram prakṛtya dadhnā indriya kāmasya juhuyāt iti śrute

original: sa eva homo dadhiviśiṣṭaḥ phaloddeśena vidhīyate /
analyzed: saḥ eva homaḥ dadhi viśiṣṭaḥ phala uddeśena vidhīyate
na ca prāpta karma anuvādena guṇa saṃbandhaḥ phala saṃbandhaḥ ca iti vākya bhedaḥ

original: prāptānāmapi karmaṇāṃ rājakartṛviśiṣṭānāṃ phaloddeśena rājasūyavākye vidhānavadihāpi tadupapatteriti prathamaḥ pakṣaḥ /
analyzed: prāptānām api karmaṇām rāja kartṛ viśiṣṭānām phala uddeśena rājasūya vākye vidhāna vat iha api tad upapatteḥ iti prathamaḥ pakṣaḥ
dvitīyaḥ tu na atra rājasūya nyāyaḥ

original: karturhi prayogānvayitvāt phalasya ca viniyogānvayitvādutpannasyāpi karmaṇaḥ prayogavidhau phalaviśiṣṭaviniyogasya kartuśca vaiśiṣṭyopapattiḥ,
analyzed: kartuḥ hi prayoga anvayi tvāt phalasya ca viniyoga anvayi tvāt utpannasya api karmaṇaḥ prayoga vidhau phala viśiṣṭa viniyogasya kartuḥ ca vaiśiṣṭya upapattiḥ

original: prakṛte tu dadhna utpattyanvayitvena prāptotpattyanuvādena guṇavidhiḥ phalaviśiṣṭaviniyogavidhiśceti vaiśiṣṭyābhāvādvākyabhedaḥ /
analyzed: prakṛte tu dadhnaḥ utpatti anvayi tvena prāpta utpatti anuvādena guṇa vidhiḥ phala viśiṣṭa viniyoga vidhiḥ ca iti vaiśiṣṭya abhāvāt vākya bhedaḥ
atas guṇāt karma bhedaḥ
dadhi viśiṣṭam ca tat phala uddeśena vidhīyate
na dadhi mātram
sati api darvi homa tve dadhi dravyaka homa tva sādṛśyāt ca agnihotra homa atideśena rūpa lābhaḥ

original: siddhāntastu yatra dvayorapi dhātvarthaguṇayoraprāptiḥ sambhavatprāptiḥ prāptireva vā dhātvarthasyaiva vā aprāptiḥ,
analyzed: siddhāntaḥ tu yatra dvayoḥ api dhātvartha guṇayoḥ aprāptiḥ sambhavat prāptiḥ prāptiḥ eva vā dhātvarthasya eva vā aprāptiḥ

original: yathā “somena yajeta” “uruprathā uruprathasveti puroḍāśaṃ prathayati” “aindravāyavāgrān grahān gṛhṇīyādyaḥ kāmayeta yathā pūrvaṃ prajāḥ kalperan”  #
analyzed: yathā somena yajeta uru prathāḥ uru prathasva iti puroḍāśam prathayati aindra vāyava agrān grahān gṛhṇīyāt yaḥ kāmayeta yathā pūrvam prajāḥ kalperan  /
agnihotram juhoti ityādau
tatra bhāva artha adhikaraṇa nyāyaḥ
yatra tu guṇasya eva aprāpta tvāt vidheya tvam
tatra tasya eva phala sambandhaḥ
na ca dadhnaḥ api niyatā prāptiḥ
api tu vikalpena
atas pākṣika anuvāda tva parihārāya tasya eva vidheya tvāt phala sambandhaḥ
karaṇībhūta guṇa sattvena vacanam vinā api phala utpatti sambhavāt vacana vaiyarthya prasaṅgena
svakṛti sādhya dhātvarthasya dṛṣṭa vidhayā guṇa sambandhinaḥ āśrayasya apekṣāyām prakaraṇāt homasya āśraya tva lābhāt juhotiḥ
sādhu tva artham anuvādaḥ
dadhi karaṇakam bhāvanā antaram eva tu phala uddeśena vidhīyate
prāpta bhāvanā anuvādena ubhaya karaṇe vākya bhedāt
kecid tu karaṇatva viśiṣṭam dadhi
dadhi karaṇa tvam vā tṛtīya upāttam phala karaṇa tvena vidhīyate
tṛtīyārtha karaṇa tvasya nirūpaka apekṣā eva ca āśraya apekṣā iti āhuḥ tat na
yāga vaiṣamye pramāṇa abhāvāt
sarvathā siddhaḥ guṇa phala sambandhaḥ

original: prayojanaṃ dadhno na pratinidhirullekhaviśeṣo vā siddhānte draṣṭavyam // 1.1 //
analyzed: prayojanam dadhnaḥ na pratinidhiḥ ullekha viśeṣaḥ vā siddhānte draṣṭavyam  /
iti ekādaśam guṇa kāma adhikaraṇam
pra pūrva adhikaraṇe vākya bheda āpādakasya guṇasya bhedaka tva ukteḥ iha apavāda karaṇāt āpavādakīm anantara saṅgatim
spaṣṭa tvāt a pradarśya udāharaṇa pūrvakam pakṣa dvayena pūrvapakṣam āha agnihotram iti
dadhnā juhoti iti dadhnaḥ prāptau api indriya kāma prayoge niyamena prāpti asaṃbhavāt guṇa phala saṃbandha kathanam

original: prācīnairanuktamapīmaṃ pakṣaṃ yuktivibhavādupapādayati ---------- sa eva homa iti //
analyzed: prācīnaiḥ anuktam api imam pakṣam yukti vibhavāt upapādayati saḥ eva homaḥ iti
dvitīyam pakṣam āśaṅkya nirākaroti na ca iti

original: yadyapi guṇasya dadhnā juhotītyanenaiva prāptatvāt tadvācakapadasyānuvādatvena nāmadheyatvena vopapatteḥ kevalaphalasaṃbandhamātrakaraṇādvākyabhedaḥ
analyzed: yadi api guṇasya dadhnā juhoti iti anena eva prāpta tvāt tad vācaka padasya anuvāda tvena nāmadheya tvena vā upapatteḥ kevala phala saṃbandha mātra karaṇāt vākya bhedaḥ
tathā api agnihotra prayoge dravya antarāṇām api vihita tvena prāpteḥ indriya kāma prayoge niyamena
prāpti abhāvāt pākṣika anuvāda tva nāma tvayoḥ asaṃbhavena tad vidhānasya āvaśyaka tvāt vākya bhedam
duṣpariharam matvā prakāra antareṇa pariharati prāptānām api iti
anumati ādi iṣṭīnām ahnā ādi paśūnām rājasūya vākyena phala saṃbandhasya rāja kartṛ saṃbandhasya

original: ca vidhāne prāpto 'pi vākyabhedaḥ yathāca kartuḥ prayogāṅgatvādvākyāntareṇa rājasūyaprayogāvidhānāt
analyzed: ca vidhāne vākya bhedaḥ yathā ca kartuḥ prayoga aṅga tvāt vākya antareṇa rājasūya prayoga avidhānāt
prayogasya ca utpatti vat kriyā viṣaya tvāt kartṛ viśiṣṭa rājasūya prayoga bhāvanāyāḥ phala uddeśena
vidhānam aveṣṭi adhikaraṇa darśita nyāya sudhā ukta rītyā aṅgīkṛtya parihriyate
evam iha api tad parihāraḥ sulabhaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: (rājasūyavākye iva prakṛte na viśiṣṭaguṇakarmaṇaḥ phalasaṃbandha iti pakṣāntareṇa pūrvapakṣopapādanam)
analyzed: rājasūya vākye iva prakṛte na viśiṣṭa guṇa karmaṇaḥ phala saṃbandhaḥ iti pakṣa antareṇa pūrvapakṣa upapādanam
dravya devatā ādīnām utpatti paricāyaka tvāt utpattau anvayasya phala ādīnām aṅgitā paricāyaka tvāt aṅga aṅgitā
saṃbandha bodhaka rūpa viniyoga vidhi anvayasya kartṛ deśa kāla ādīnām kartavyatā paricāyaka tvāt
kartavya tā bodhaka prayoga vidhi anvayi tvasya ca ekādaśe vakṣyamāṇa tvāt rājasūya vākye
utpannānām api karmaṇām tad tad deśa kāla vidhiṣu daiśika kālika prayogāṇām prāptau api aprāpta kartṛ saṃbandhi tayā
prayoga vidhau phala viśiṣṭa viniyogasya kartuḥ ca anvaya upapattiḥ
prakṛte tu viniyoga viśiṣṭa prayoga anvayi guṇa abhāvena tad viśiṣṭa karma prayoga viniyogayoḥ
saṃbhavāt tad anurodhena karma utpatti antarasya āvaśyaka tvāt anyathā utpatti anuvādena dadhnaḥ
indriya uddeśena homa viniyogasya ca vidhau vākya bheda āpatteḥ aparihārāt karma antara tvam eva
yuktam iti abhipretya dvitīyam pakṣam āha dvitīyaḥ tu iti
dadhnaḥ phala saṃbandhaḥ iti siddhāntasya bhāvārtha adhikaraṇa nyāya virodhena nirāsaḥ

original: siddhānte homāśritasya dadhnaḥ phalasaṃbandhāṅgīkāraṃ dūṣayati --------- na dadhimātramiti //
analyzed: siddhānte homa āśritasya dadhnaḥ phala saṃbandha aṅgīkāram dūṣayati na dadhi mātram iti

original: bhāvārthādhikaraṇe upapadārthasya phalabhāvanākaraṇatvanirākaraṇena dhātvarthakaraṇatvasya sthāpanāttena virodhāpatterityarthaḥ /
analyzed: bhāvārtha adhikaraṇe upapadārthasya phala bhāvanā karaṇa tva nirākaraṇena dhātvartha karaṇa tvasya sthāpanāt tena virodha āpatteḥ iti arthaḥ
rūpa abhāvāt karma antara vidhi anupapattim pariharati sati api iti
sati api darvi homa tve ākāṅkṣā vaśena dadhi dravyaka tva sādṛśyena agnihotra dharma atideśaḥ
nahi darvi homānām apūrva tvam iti rāja ājñā
kṛtsna vidhāna tvāt prakṛti viśeṣa nirṇaya abhāvāt ca tat iti hi aṣṭame vakṣyate
na ca atra tat dvayam api asti
atas rūpa lābhāt yuktam karma antara tvam iti arthaḥ
bhāva artha adhikaraṇa viṣaya vivecana pūrvakam dadhnā indriya kāmasya iti vākye tad apravṛttyā dadhi rūpa guṇa vidhāna upapādanam yatra iti
somena yajeta iti atra ubhayoḥ api aprāptiḥ

original: uruprathetivākye prathanasya puroḍāśatvānyathānupapattyā mantrasyaca liṅgādarthaprāpta eva tasmin prāptirityubhayoḥ saṃbhavatprāptiḥ /
analyzed: uru prathā iti vākye prathanasya puroḍāśa tva anyathā anupapattyā mantrasya ca liṅgāt artha prāpte eva tasmin prāptiḥ iti ubhayoḥ saṃbhavat prāptiḥ
aindra vāyava vākye dvayoḥ niyatā prāptiḥ
agnihotra vākye dhātvarthasya eva aprāptiḥ
tatra bhāva artha adhikaraṇa nyāyena dhātvarthasya eva vidhānam

original: yatratu dhātvarthaprāptau dhātvarthasyāpi vidhāne gauravāpatterguṇasyaivāprāptatvāt vidhānam,
analyzed: yatra tu dhātvartha prāptau dhātvarthasya api vidhāne gaurava āpatteḥ guṇasya eva aprāptatvāt vidhānam

original: tatra tasyaiva vidheyatvāt tṛtīyāntatvena nirdeśācca phalabhāvanāṃ prati svanirūpakaphaloddeśyakatvarūpaṃ karaṇatvam /
analyzed: tatra tasya eva vidheya tvāt tṛtīyā anta tvena nirdeśāt ca phala bhāvanām prati sva nirūpaka phala uddeśyaka tva rūpam karaṇa tvam
na ca dadhi payasoḥ tad prakhya nyāyena nāma tvam
yena upapada artha vidhānam na saṃbhāvyeta
phale guṇa vidhi tvena api upapattau nirartha prāya nāma tva kalpanasya ayukta tvāt iti arthaḥ
pākṣika anuvāda tva iti
aindra vāyava agrān iti atra pākṣika anuvāda tve pi dadhi vākye na tad saṃbhavaḥ iti upapādanam

original: nacaindravāyavāgrānitipadasya śukrāgratayā vikalpāt pākṣikānuvādatvavat ihāpi tadaṅgīkāre na doṣaḥ;
analyzed: naca aindra vāyava agrān iti padasya śukra agra tayā vikalpāt pākṣika anuvāda tva vat iha api tad aṅgīkāre na doṣaḥ

original: pākṣikānuvādatvasāmye 'pi aindravāyavāgratāyāḥ phalasaṃbandhe tasyāḥ kāmyatvena bṛhatsāmatvapakṣe
analyzed: pākṣika anuvāda tva sāmye pi aindra vāyava agra tāyāḥ phala saṃbandhe tasyāḥ kāmya tvena bṛhatsāma tva pakṣe
pi prāpti āpatteḥ yadi rathantara sāma iti etad vākya gata yadi rathantara sāma padābhyām aindra vāyava agra tā padasya
pākṣika anuvāda tva svīkāre pi iha dadhi pade tad svīkāre pramāṇa abhāvena viśiṣṭa vidhi gaurava parijihīrṣayā
ca guṇa mātra vidhānasya eva yukta tvena vaiṣamyāt iti arthaḥ
siddhasya dadhnaḥ homa āśrita dadhi karaṇaka bhāvanā antara paratvam eva indriya kāma vākyasya ityādi upapādanam

original: tatraca dadhitvajātestallakṣyavyaktervā phalārthaṃ vidhāne 'pi tasya siddharūpatvena yāgādivat kriyāntarānapekṣasya phalajanakatvaṃ na tāvat  #
analyzed: tatra ca dadhi tva jāteḥ tad lakṣya vyakteḥ vā phala artham vidhāne pi tasya siddha rūpa tvena yāga ādi vat kriyā antara anapekṣasya phala janaka tvam na tāvat
saṃbhavati

original: tathātve vidhiṃ vināpi phalakāmanāyāṃ satyāṃ karaṇasattvena phalotpattyupapatteḥ karaṇavidhivaiyarthyāpatteḥ /
analyzed: tathātve vidhim vinā api phala kāmanāyām satyām karaṇa sattvena phala utpatti upapatteḥ karaṇa vidhi vaiyarthya āpatteḥ
nahi kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ vidhinā janyate
apitu bodhyate
na ca tad bodhasya yāga ādau iva kiñcid phalam asti
tam antareṇa api kāraṇasya sattvena phala upapatteḥ
ataeva itikartavya tā vidhayaḥ eva param upayujyantām
na tu dadhi rūpa kāraṇa vidhiḥ api
atas vidhi sārthakyāya dṛṣṭa vidhayā kṛti sādhya dhātvartha viśeṣa rūpa āśraya saṃbandhi tva apekṣāyām
yogyatā balāt sva sādhya bhojana homa ādi rūpa aneka dhātvartha prasaktau api prakaraṇena adhikāra ākhyena
vidhi kalpana dvārā homasya eva upanayāt na teṣām āśraya tva prasaktiḥ

original: ataeva kalpitenāpi vidhinā na dadhihomayoraṅgāṅgibhāvo bodhyate; gauravāt,
analyzed: ataeva kalpitena api vidhinā na dadhi homayoḥ aṅgāṅgibhāvaḥ bodhyate gauravāt
kṛpta prayojanavat tvāt ca

original: apitu lokasiddhakāryakāraṇabhāvaniyamamātram - dadhnā homaḥ kartavya iti /
analyzed: apitu loka siddha kārya kāraṇa bhāva niyama mātram dadhnā homaḥ kartavyaḥ iti

original: naca ------- dadhijanyahomakartavyatāyā api dadhnā juhotītyanenaiva siddherindriyakāmavākyavaiyarthyamiti ------- vācyam;
analyzed: naca dadhi janya homa kartavya tāyāḥ api dadhnā juhoti iti anena eva siddheḥ indriya kāma vākya vaiyarthyam iti vācyam
tad vidhi abhāve dadhi viśiṣṭa homa anuṣṭhānasya indriya rūpa phala uddeśya tāyāḥ asiddheḥ indriya kāmanāyāḥ adhikāri viśeṣaṇa tva jñāpaka tvena tad sārthakyāt

original: ataśca śuddhadadhividhinā tasya kratvaṅgatvabodhane 'pi anena tasya phalārthatayā vidhānāt homāśritadadhikaraṇakaṃ bhāvanāntarameva vidhīyate
analyzed: atas ca śuddha dadhi vidhinā tasya kratu aṅga tva bodhane anena tasya phala artha tayā vidhānāt homa āśrita dadhi karaṇakam bhāvanā antaram eva vidhīyate
dhātuḥ tu prakaraṇa prāpta āśraya saṃbandha anuvādakaḥ sādhutva mātra arthaḥ iti abhipretya āha karaṇībhūta iti
jyotiṣṭomasya paśu kāmam ukthyam gṛhṇīyāt ityādīnām āśraya tvena anvaya nirūpaṇam
atra ca guṇasya siddha rūpasya kṛti sādhya dhātvartha upakṣipta tvena āśraya tayā homa anvaya upapādanam utsarga mātreṇa jñeyam
paśu kāmaḥ ukthyam gṛhṇīyāt ityādau samāpti rūpa saṃsthā ādi guṇasya sākṣāt eva kṛti sādhya tvāt kratoḥ āśraya viṣaya apekṣayā āśraya tva anupapatteḥ
atas tatra samāpteḥ sasaṃbandhika tvena eva apekṣayā jyotiṣṭomasya āśraya tvam iti dhyeyam

original: evañca bhāvanāyāḥ karaṇākāṅkṣyānvitasyāpi dadhnaḥ karaṇatvaṃ yāvadāśrayānvayaṃ na nirvahatītyevaṃ karaṇākāṅkṣayaivāśrayagrahaṇam,
analyzed: evam ca bhāvanāyāḥ karaṇa ākāṅkṣya anvitasya api dadhnaḥ karaṇa tvam yāvat āśraya anvayam na nirvahati iti evam karaṇa ākāṅkṣayā eva āśraya grahaṇam
na tu āśraya ākāṅkṣā caturthī iti bhāvaḥ
phalasya vijātīya yatna janya tva siddhi artham tad saṃbandhasya api āvaśyaka tvena vākya bhedena bhāvanā bheda kathanam

original: yattu atra bhavadevena dhātvarthavat bhāvanāyā api pratyabhijñānasya tulyatvāt na bhāvanābhede pramāṇam /
analyzed: yat tu atra bhavadevena dhātvartha vat bhāvanāyāḥ api pratyabhijñānasya tulya tvāt na bhāvanā bhede pramāṇam

original: naca prāptabhāvanānuvādena guṇasaṃbandhasya phalasaṃbandhasyaca vidhāne vākyabhedāpatterguṇādeva bhedo bhāvanāyāḥ,
analyzed: na ca prāpta bhāvanā anuvādena guṇa saṃbandhasya phala saṃbandhasya ca vidhāne vākya bheda āpatteḥ guṇāt eva bhedaḥ bhāvanāyāḥ
phala saṃbandhasya rāgataḥ prāptatvena avidheya tvāt iti uktam
tat nirasyata prāpta bhāvanā iti
indriya ākhya phalasya janya tvena vyāpāra mātra janya tva avagame pi lokāt vijātīya yatna janya tva anavagamāt
viśeṣataḥ ca agnihotra homa anukūle yatne svarga janaka tayā avagate vākyena eva vidheya tva avaśyaṃbhāve
vākya bheda āpādaka guṇāt bhedasya āvaśyaka tvam

original: ata eva bhāvanāntarasyāpyavacchedakībhūtadhātvarthaviśeṣāpekṣāyāṃ sannidhiprāpte homa evāvacchedakatvena saṃbadhyamāne 'pi na tadaṃśe 'pi vidheyatvam;
analyzed: atas eva bhāvanā antarasya api avacchedakībhūta dhātvartha viśeṣa apekṣāyām sannidhi prāpte home eva avacchedaka tvena saṃbadhyamāne pi na tad aṃśe pi vidheya tvam
anyatas prāpta tvāt

original: kintu homāṃvacchinnaṃ pratyayopāttaṃ bhāvanāntarameva dadhikaraṇakaṃ vidhīyata ityarthaḥ //
analyzed: kintu homa avacchinnam pratyaya upāttam bhāvanā antaram eva dadhi karaṇakam vidhīyate iti arthaḥ

original: (dadhikaraṇatvasya karaṇībhūtadadhno vā karaṇatvena bhāvanānvaya iti pārthasārathimatanirūpaṇam)
analyzed: dadhi karaṇa tvasya karaṇībhūta dadhnaḥ vā karaṇa tvena bhāvanā anvayaḥ iti pārthasārathi mata nirūpaṇam
evam tāvat dadhi vṛtti kaṇatā indriya nirūpitā

original: tasyaca dadhyādirūpasya guṇasya svavṛttikaraṇatāsampādanāya yā kṛtisādhyadhātvarthaviśeṣāpekṣā,
analyzed: tasya ca dadhi ādi rūpasya guṇasya sva vṛtti karaṇatā sampādanāya yā kṛti sādhya dhātvartha viśeṣa apekṣā
sā eva āśraya ākāṅkṣā

original: tayāca homasyānvaya iti svamatamabhidhāya pārthasārathyādibhiḥ tṛtīyopāttaṃ karaṇatvaṃ
analyzed: tayā ca homasya anvayaḥ iti sva matam abhidhāya pārthasārathi ādibhiḥ tṛtīya upāttam karaṇa tvam

original: karaṇatāsambandhenendriyabhāvanānvayīti dadhno dharmittvena prādhānyāt karaṇatāśaktimato dadhnaḥ karaṇatvam,
analyzed: karaṇatā sambandhena indriya bhāvanā anvayi iti dadhnaḥ dharmi ttvena prādhānyāt karaṇatā śaktimataḥ dadhnaḥ karaṇa tvam

original: athavā ------- prakṛtyarthāpekṣayā pratyayārthaprādhānyāt dadhikaraṇatvasyaiva vā karaṇatvam /
analyzed: athavā prakṛti artha apekṣayā pratyaya artha prādhānyāt dadhi karaṇa tvasya eva vā karaṇa tvam
dvitīya karaṇa tvasya tu samabhivyāhāra gamya tvāt saṃsarga maryādayā bhānam aṅgīkṛtya tṛtīya upātta dadhikaraṇa tvasya
nirūpaka apekṣāyām pratisaṃbandhi vidhayā eva prākaraṇika āśraya lābhaḥ iti uktam
tad upapādana pūrvakam nirasyati kecid tu iti

original: (yāgasya yathā karaṇatvaṃ natu yāgakaraṇatvasya karaṇatvaṃ tathā prakṛte 'pīti pūrvatanamatanirāsaḥ)
analyzed: yāgasya yathā karaṇa tvam na tu yāga karaṇa tvasya karaṇa tvam tathā prakṛte pi iti pūrvatana mata nirāsaḥ
yāga vaiṣamye iti
prakṛti pratyayau pratyaya artham saha brūtaḥ iti anuśāsanāt yāga gata karma tva karaṇa tvayoḥ api

original: padārthavidhayā bhānasya bhāvārthādhikaraṇe vyutpāditatvāt tatrāpi yāgakaraṇatvasyaiva
analyzed: padārtha vidhayā bhānasya bhāvārtha adhikaraṇe vyutpādita tvāt tatra api yāga karaṇa tvasya eva
karaṇa tva āpatteḥ vaiṣamye pramāṇa abhāvāt

original: tatraca nirūpakatāsaṃsargāpekṣayā karaṇatāsaṃsargasya gurubhūtatvena parihāra ihāpi tatparihāropapatterayuktaḥ /
analyzed: tatra ca nirūpakatā saṃsarga apekṣayā karaṇatā saṃsargasya guru bhūta tvena parihāraḥ iha api tad parihāra upapatteḥ ayuktaḥ
yadi api dadhi karaṇa tva nirūpakaḥ homaḥ eva śabdāt ānīyate

original: tathāpīndriyapadavaiyarthyānupapattyā homadvārā pāraṃparikamindriyanirūpitamiti svīkāre na kaściddoṣa ityarthaḥ //
analyzed: tathā api indriya pada vaiyarthya anupapattyā homa dvārā pāraṃparikam indriya nirūpitam iti svīkāre na kaścid doṣaḥ iti arthaḥ
atra ca yatra vidhīyamānaḥ guṇaḥ kāraka tām āpadyate

original: sa āśraya ityādyaudumbarādhikaraṇaśāstradīpikā- granthasvārasyena vidhīyamānaguṇajanyatvamāśrayalakṣaṇaṃ kurvanti,
analyzed: saḥ āśrayaḥ ityādi audumbara adhikaraṇa śāstra dīpikā grantha svārasyena vidhīyamāna guṇa janya tvam āśraya lakṣaṇam kurvanti
tat manthi agrān abhicaran ityādi guṇa phala vidhau grahaṇānām manthi agra tā janya tva adarśanāt ayuktam
kintu adṛṣṭa advāraka saṃbandhena guṇa viśeṣa avacchinna tvam eva āśraya tvam iti kaustubhe draṣṭavyam
prayojanam iti

original: ādye pakṣe ārambhottaraṃ dadhyapacāre prakrāntasamāpanānurodhena pratinidhyupādānam /
analyzed: ādye pakṣe ārambha uttaram dadhi apacāre prakrānta samāpana anurodhena pratinidhi upādānam
tatas prāk dadhi abhāve anārambhe eva

original: dvitīye yadyapi “etadyajñasya chidyate yadanyasya tantre pratate anyasya tantraṃ
analyzed: dvitīye yadi api etat yajñasya chidyate yat anyasya tantre pratate anyasya tantram
iti niṣedhāt eka prayoga madhye parasya kāmyasya prayoga asaṃbhavāt agnihotrāt bahis aniyata kālaḥ

original: dadhihomaḥ sakṛdeva darvihomatvādapūrvaḥ kartavya iti prayojanamuktaṃ prācīnaiḥ;
analyzed: dadhi homaḥ sakṛt eva darvi homa tvāt apūrvaḥ kartavyaḥ iti prayojanam uktam prācīnaiḥ
tathā api darvi homa tve pi agnihotra dharma atideśasya pūrvapakṣe sthāpita tvāt agnihotra kāla
eva anuṣṭhānasya tantreṇa prāptau tadīya prayogāt bahis anuṣṭhāna aprasakteḥ ayuktam iti saṃkalpa ādau

original: tattatphalārthaṃ karmadvayamapi tantreṇa kariṣya ityullekhaprayojanaṃ kaustubhoktaṃ
analyzed: tad tad phala artham karma dvayam api tantreṇa kariṣye iti ullekha prayojanam kaustubha uktam
draṣṭavyam iti viśeṣa siddhānta padayoḥ upādānāt vyatirekeṇa sūcitam
atra ca dadhi karaṇaka indriya karmaka bhāvanā bhedāt guṇa janyam apūrvam ekam
svarga prayuktasya eva homasya āśraya tvāt homa janya svarga anukūlam aparam iti apūrvasya api bhedaḥ
yatra tu praṇayana ādeḥ dṛṣṭa vidhayā eva uttara deśa prāpti rūpa sva kārye upayogaḥ tatra guṇa janyam eva apūrvam iti

original: ata eva homasyāpi dadhiniṣṭhakaraṇatāsaṃpādakatvenāpūrvājanya- tvānnaivendriyānukūlaṃ homajanyamaparamapyapūrvamiti draṣṭavyam //
analyzed: atas eva homasya api dadhi niṣṭha karaṇatā saṃpādaka tvena apūrva ajanya tvāt na eva indriya anukūlam homa janyam aparam api apūrvam iti draṣṭavyam
sādṛśya abhāve pi āśraya dharma atideśena bhāvanā antara itikartavya tā ākāṅkṣā nivṛttiḥ iti nirūpaṇam

original: bhāvanāntarasya cetikartavyatākāṅkṣāyāṃ yadyapi na prakaraṇādāśrayasyaivetikartavyatātvena grahaṇaṃ saṃbhavati;
analyzed: bhāvanā antarasya ca itikartavya tā ākāṅkṣāyām yadi api na prakaraṇāt āśrayasya eva itikartavya tā tvena grahaṇam saṃbhavati
svarga ādi saṃyuktasya homasya prakaraṇa a viṣaya tvāt
naca aṅga tva abhāve pi āśrayasya sataḥ prasaṅgena itikartavya tā ākāṅkṣā nivartaka tva upapatteḥ na atiriktā itikartavya tā ākāṅkṣā iti vācyam
āśrayasya karaṇatā nirvāhaka tvena karaṇa koṭau antarbhāvāt tad anugrāhaka itikartavya tāyāḥ bhedena eva apekṣita tvāt
tathā api āśrayataḥ dharma atideśāt tad nivṛttiḥ
sādṛśya abhāvāt katham kalpita vacana atideśaḥ
sādṛśya kāryasya prakṛti viśeṣa upasthāpanasya prakaraṇena eva siddheḥ iha tad anapekṣaṇāt
atas yuktaḥ dharma atideśaḥ

original: tatra keṣāñcideva dharmāṇāṃ saḥ keṣāñcittu neti vivekaḥ kaustubhe draṣṭavyaḥ //
analyzed: tatra keṣāṃcid eva dharmāṇām saḥ keṣāṃcid tu na iti vivekaḥ kaustubhe draṣṭavyaḥ
iti ekādaśam guṇa kāma adhikaraṇam
a pā sameṣu

original: “trivṛdagniṣṭudagniṣṭoma” ityanena vihitasyāgniṣṭudyāgasya phalasambandhe “tasya vāyavyāsvekaviṃśamagniṣṭomasāmakṛtvā brahmavarcakāmo hyetena  #
analyzed: trivṛt agniṣṭut agniṣṭomaḥ iti anena vihitasya agniṣṭut yāgasya phala sambandhe tasya vāyavyāsu ekaviṃśam agniṣṭoma sāma kṛtvā brahmavarca kāmaḥ hi etena
yajeta iti anena kṛte paścāt āmnātam

original: “etasyaiva revatīṣu vāravantīyamagniṣṭomasāma kṛtvā paśukāmo hyetena yajete“ti /
analyzed: etasya eva revatīṣu vāravantīyam agniṣṭoma sāma kṛtvā paśu kāmaḥ hi etena yajeta iti
tatra api pūrvavat ādyaḥ pūrvapakṣaḥ rājasūya nyāyena sva kāraka viśiṣṭa agniṣṭoma stotra bhāvanā viśiṣṭa ktvā
iṣyate ca ayam eva prakāraḥ vāyavya vākye siddhāntinā api
dvitīyaḥ tu na atra rājasūya nyāyaḥ

original: prayogasya agniṣṭomastotrottarakālatvasya ca vāyavyavākyenaiva prāptatayā tadanuvādena revatīvidhiḥ phaloddeśena agniṣṭudviniyogavidhiśceti  #
analyzed: prayogasya agniṣṭoma stotra uttara kāla tvasya ca vāyavya vākyena eva prāpta tayā tad anuvādena revatī vidhiḥ phala uddeśena agniṣṭut viniyoga vidhiḥ ca iti
vākya bhedāt

original: vāyavyavākye hi atideśena sambhavatprāptikamagniṣṭomastotrottarakālatādi tataḥ pūrvapravṛttyaṅgīkāreṇa prayogaviśeṣaṇatayā vihatam /
analyzed: vāyavya vākye hi atideśena sambhavat prāptikam agniṣṭoma stotra uttara kāla tā ādi tatas pūrva pravṛtti aṅgīkāreṇa prayoga viśeṣaṇa tayā vihatam
na tu atra vāyavya vākyasya api kḷpta tvena asya pūrva pravṛtti aṅgīkāra anupapatteḥ
na ca vinigamanā virahaḥ
prāthamyasya eva niyāmaka tvāt

original: ato lāghavād guṇa eva revatyadhikaraṇakavāravantīyākhyo revatyākhya eva vāprāptatvāt phaloddeśena vidhīyate /
analyzed: atas lāghavāt guṇaḥ eva revatī adhikaraṇaka vāravantīya ākhyaḥ revatī ākhyaḥ eva vā aprāpta tvāt phala uddeśena vidhīyate
vāravantīyam agniṣṭoma sāma kāryam iti prākaraṇikena vākyena vāravantīyasya api prāpta tvāt
na ca antya pakṣe tṛtīyā antena etad śabdena viliṅga saṅkhya tvāt revatī mātra nirdeśa anupapattiḥ
tena revatī viśiṣṭa vāravantīya nirdeśe pi dākṣāyaṇayajña nyāyena aprāpta revatī mātrasya eva phala saṃbandha upapatteḥ
atas dadhi nyāyena guṇa phala saṃbandhaḥ eva yuktaḥ
siddhāntaḥ tu na atra āśraya lābhaḥ śakyate vaktum
yāgasya tāvat prakṛta tve pi agniṣṭoma sāma iti anuvāda anupapatteḥ na sākṣāt āśraya tvam

original: agniṣṭomastotradvārā tasyaiva vā sākṣādāśrayatvaṃ tu agniṣṭomastotrasyātideśataḥ stotrāntarasādhāraṇyenopasthitatvādanāśaṅkyam /
analyzed: agniṣṭoma stotra dvārā tasya eva vā sākṣāt āśraya tvam tu agniṣṭoma stotrasya atideśataḥ stotra antara sādhāraṇyena upasthita tvāt anāśaṅkyam
na ca vāyavya vākyena tasya aupadeśikī viśiṣya upasthitiḥ
ātideśika rga bādha saṃbhave aupadeśika tad bādhasya anyāyya tvena viśiṣya upasthiteḥ āśraya tva asādhaka tvāt

original: naca sāmno gāyatidhātuvācyatvena kriyārūpatvādāśrayālābhe 'pi na kṣatiḥ;
analyzed: na ca sāmnaḥ gāyati dhātu vācya tvena kriyā rūpa tvāt āśraya alābhe na kṣatiḥ

original: sāmno dhvanyātmakasvarasamāhārarūpatvena vākyaśeṣādau prasiddhasya siddharūpatayā dhātuvācyatvasyāprayojakatvāt,
analyzed: sāmnaḥ dhvani ātmaka svara samāhāra rūpa tvena vākyaśeṣa ādau prasiddhasya siddha rūpatayā dhātu vācya tvasya aprayojaka tvāt
anyathā saubharasya api stotra āśraya tva anupapatteḥ
vāravantīyasāmnā āśraya an apekṣaṇe agniṣṭoma sāma ityādi anuvāda anupapatteḥ ca
atas sāmnaḥ āśraya sāpekṣa tvāt na tāvat prakaraṇena āśraya lābhaḥ

original: naca ------ vāravantīyamagniṣṭomasāma kāryamiti prākaraṇikena vākyenaiva gauravabhiyā aṅgatvāvidhānādāśrayasamarpaṇamiti ------- vācyam;
analyzed: na ca vāravantīyam agniṣṭoma sāma kāryam iti prākaraṇikena vākyena eva gaurava bhiyā aṅga tva avidhānāt āśraya samarpaṇam iti vācyam

original: sāmno guṇatvapakṣe tallābhopapattāvapi revatīmātrasya guṇatve tadayogāt /
analyzed: sāmnaḥ guṇa tva pakṣe tad lābha upapattau api revatī mātrasya guṇa tve tad ayogāt
sāmnaḥ guṇa tvam tu vidheḥ aprāpta revatī mātra saṅkamāt eva asaṃbhavi

original: phalapadābhāve hi vidhiryadviṣaye aprāptatayā vyāpriyate tasyaiva prayojanākāṅkṣayā phalasaṃbandho yathā godohanādeḥ /
analyzed: phala pada abhāve hi vidhiḥ yad viṣaye aprāptatayā vyāpriyate tasya eva prayojana ākāṅkṣayā phala saṃbandhaḥ yathā godohana ādeḥ

original: tadatra paśupadābhāve vāravantīyasya prākaraṇikavākyenaiva prāptatvādvidhiraprāptarevatīmātraviṣayaḥ saṃpadyata iti tasyaiva phalasaṃbandho  #
analyzed: tat atra paśu pada abhāve vāravantīyasya prākaraṇika vākyena eva prāpta tvāt vidhiḥ aprāpta revatī mātra viṣayaḥ saṃpadyate iti tasya eva phala saṃbandhaḥ
vācyaḥ
na ca asya āśrayaḥ kena api prakāreṇa labdhum śakyaḥ
na ca prakāra antareṇa alābhe pi anena eva vākyena āśraya viśiṣṭa guṇa vidhānāt āśraya guṇa ubhaya viśiṣṭa bhāvanā vidhānāt vā tad lābha upapattiḥ
kḷpta prayojana tvāt lāghavena āśraya tā saṃbandhena eva vaiśiṣṭya aṅgīkārāt ca na guṇa aṅgatā āpattiḥ iti vācyam
āśrayasya guṇa anvaya avyutpatteḥ
karmatva atiriktasya āśraya tvasya durvaca tvena bhāvanāyāḥ phala āśraya rūpa ubhaya karmaka tva aṅgīkāre eka karmaka tva bhaṅga āpatteḥ ca
naca kṛtvā śabda uktāyām āśrayasya agniṣṭoma stotrasya karma tvāt tad uttara kāla tā viśiṣṭa guṇa bhāvanāyāḥ
ākhyāta upāttāyāḥ paśu karmaka tvāt na ekasyāḥ bhāvanāyāḥ avacchedakībhūta dhātvartha apekṣāyām

original: yāgasyāvacchedakatvāṅgīkāre revatīnāṃ yāgakaraṇatvāpattyā stotraṃ prati karaṇatvānāpatteḥ,
analyzed: yāgasya avacchedaka tva aṅgīkāre revatīnām yāga karaṇatva āpattyā stotram prati karaṇatva anāpatteḥ
stotrasya eva avacchedaka tva aṅgīkāre tu dhātvartha dvaya avacchinna bhāvanā dvaya abhāvāt ttkāpratyaya anupapattiḥ
naca revatī viśiṣṭa agniṣṭoma stotra bhāvanā uttara kāla viśiṣṭa revatī karaṇaka yāga ā śrayaka bhāvanā eva phala uddeśena vidhīyatām iti vācyam
ākhyāta upātta bhāvanāyāḥ dvikarmaka tva āpatteḥ tad avasthatvāt
na ca prakaraṇāt yāgasya āśraya tva upapatteḥ na dvikarmaka tvam

original: tathātve 'pi tṛtīyāntaitacchabdasya dhātupārārthyabhayena yāgaparāmarśitvasyaivāpattau revatyādiparāmarśakatva eva pramāṇābhāvāt,
analyzed: tathātve pi tṛtīyā anta etad śabdasya dhātu pārārthya bhayena yāga parāmarśi tvasya eva āpattau revatī ādi parāmarśaka tve eva pramāṇa abhāvāt
atas tad īpekṣayā laghu bhūta karma antara vidhānam eva jyāyaḥ
tathā hi nikāyi tvena etasya agniṣṭut yāga vikāra tvāt vāvantīyam prāptam eva anūdyate
kevalam revatī viśiṣṭa stotra bhāvanā uttara kāla tā viśiṣṭa yāga antara bhāvanā eva phala uddeśena vidhīyate
ṣaṣṭhī anta etad śabdaḥ prakṛti vikāra bhāva anuvādakaḥ
tṛtīyā anta etad śabdaḥ prastoṣyamāṇa karma vacanaḥ na duṣyati
uttarakāla lakṣaṇaḥ guṇaḥ ca prayoga anvayi tvāt aveṣṭi vat yadi api tad bhedam eva āpādayet

original: tathāpi kālasyātra saṃbhavatprāptikasya vākyabhedaparihārārthaṃ vidheyatve 'pi tātparyagatyā
analyzed: tathā api kālasya atra saṃbhavat prāptikasya vākya bheda parihāra artham vidheya tve pi tātparya gatyā
yāge paramparā saṃbandhena vidheyasya revatī ākhyasya guṇasya utpatti anvayi tvāt karma bheda bodhaka tva avighātaḥ  /
iti dvādaśam revatī adhikaraṇam
pūrva adhikaraṇena āpavādika saṃgatiḥ ca
adhikaraṇa viṣaya vākyam udāharati trivṛt iti
etat ca bheda pratiyogi pradarśana mātra artham udāhṛtam
revatī vākya mātrasya eva vicāra viṣaya tvāt

original: tāṇḍyabrāhmaṇe prathamato “yo pūta iva syādagniṣṭutā yajetāgninaivāsya pāpmānamapahatya
analyzed: tāṇḍya brāhmaṇe prathamatas yaḥ pūtaḥ iva syāt agniṣṭutā yajeta agninā eva asya pāpmānam apahatya

original: trivṛtā tejo brahmavarcasaṃ dadhātī” tyekaṃ trivṛdagniṣṭutaṃ vidhāya tatra trivṛttve
analyzed: trivṛtā tejaḥ brahmavarcasam dadhāti iti ekam trivṛt agniṣṭutam vidhāya tatra trivṛt tve
doṣam saṃkīrtya catuṣṭomam agniṣṭut yāga antaram vidhāya trivṛt agniṣṭut agniṣṭomaḥ tasya
vāyavyāsu iti paṭhitvā etasya eva revatīṣu iti āmnātam
tatra yadi api prathama anta pada trayam yajeta iti anena anvaya ayogyam
tathā api kartavyaḥ iti pada adhyāhāreṇa trivṛt ādi guṇa dvaya viśiṣṭa agniṣṭut saṃjñaka yāga vidhānam
tatra eteṣām ṣaṇṇām agniṣṭutām devatā adhikaraṇa gata parimala lekhanāt nikāyi tvena samāmnānāt
teṣām ca pūrvasya uttareṣu atideśasya aṣṭame prasādhanāt pūrva yāgāt trivṛt pañcadaśa saptadaśa ekavaṃśi rūpa catuṣṭomaka tvasya
prāptasya bādhena sarva stotreṣu api trivṛt tva vidhānam
ataeva tasmāt eva agniṣṭoma saṃsthā vidhāyakam agniṣṭoma padam iti na śakyate vaktum
tathā api rājanya nimittaka agniṣṭoma saṃsthā vikāra bhūta atyagniṣṭoma tā vyāvṛtti phalaka tvena agniṣṭoma saṃsthā vidhāna param draṣṭavyam
yat tu kaustubhe etad pūrva bhāvi yāgasya ukthya saṃsthākasya nikāyi tvena etad yāga prakṛti tva avasāyāt tata
ukthya saṃsthāyāḥ eva prāpyamāṇa tvena agniṣṭoma saṃsthāyāḥ pratiprasava artha tayā vidhāna param iti
pakṣa antaram pūjya pādaiḥ uktam

original: tattāṇḍye pūrvaṃ catuṣṭomāgniṣṭudyāgasya vidhāne 'pi tasyokthyasaṃsthatvenānāmnānātkiṃmūlamiti cintyam /
analyzed: tat tāṇḍye pūrvam catuṣṭoma agniṣṭut yāgasya vidhāne tasya ukthya saṃstha tvena an āmnānāt kim mūlam iti cintyam
agniṣṭut padam vā agni devatya mantra sādhya stotra āmnānāt tad prakhya nyāyena nāmadheyam
tasya vāyavyāsu iti vākyena u patvā jāmayaḥ giraḥ ityādi vāyavya ṛc adhikaraṇa tva ekaviṃśati stomaka tva viśiṣṭa agniṣṭoma stotra bhāvanā uttara kāla viśiṣṭa yāga prayogasya
phala artham vidhānam

original: tatrāgniṣṭomastotre pūrvātideśena prāptasyaiva viṃśastomasya trivṛttvena bādhitasya pratiprasavaḥ /
analyzed: tatra agniṣṭoma stotre pūrva atideśena prāptasya eva viṃśa stomasya trivṛt tvena bādhitasya pratiprasavaḥ

original: evamatideśaprāptānāṃ yajñā yajñāvo iti mantrāṇāṃ bādhena vāyavyāmantrāṇāṃ vidhānam /
analyzed: evam atideśa prāptānām iti mantrāṇām bādhena vāyavyā mantrāṇām vidhānam
revatī vākye revatīḥ naḥ sadhamāde ityādi revatī ṛc adhikaraṇaka vāravantīya sāmaka agniṣṭoma stotra bhāvanā uttara kāla viśiṣṭa yāga bhāvanāyāḥ phale vidhānam

original: tena revatībhirvāravantīyādhārabhūtāyā 'aśvaṃ natvā vāravantaṃ vandadhyā' iti yonestaduttarayośca bādhaḥ /
analyzed: tena revatībhiḥ vāravantīya ādhāra bhūtāyāḥ aśvam natvā vāravantam vandadhyai iti yoneḥ tad uttarayoḥ ca bādhaḥ
yadi api agniṣṭoma stotrasya sarva antya tvena tad bhāvanāyāḥ yāga prayoga pūrva kāla tvam saṃbhavati
tathā api sarva aṅga anuṣṭhāna saukarya artham āditas va dhāraṇāt agniṣṭoma stotrasya api tad siddheḥ vācā
karoti manasā karoti ityādau adhyavasāne pi karoteḥ prayogāt adhyavasāna apara paryāya pratipatti pūrva kāla tvena

original: athavā -------- mukhaṃ vyādāya svapitītyādāviva lakṣaṇayā samakālatvena ktvāpratyayopapattirdraṣṭavyeti vivekaḥ //
analyzed: athavā mukham vyādāya svapiti ityādau iva lakṣaṇayā sama kāla tvena ktvāpratyaya upapattiḥ draṣṭavyā iti vivekaḥ
tatra pūrva adhikaraṇa upapāditayoḥ guṇa phala saṃbandha dhātvartha abhedayoḥ eva apavāda karaṇāt āpavādikīm anantara saṅgatim spaṣṭa tvāt a pradarśya eva pūrvapakṣam āha
tatra api iti

original: (revatīvākye viniyogaprayogayoreva rājasūyanyāyena vidhānānna karmabheda iti kathanam)
analyzed: revatī vākye viniyoga prayogayoḥ eva rājasūya nyāyena vidhānāt na karma bhedaḥ iti kathanam
prakṛta pratyabhijñānāt etad śabda śruteḥ pramāṇa abhāvāt ca na tāvat karmāntaram
siddhānte vakṣyamāṇa rītyā eva ca āśraya alābhāt nā api guṇa phala saṃbandhaḥ

original: ato vāyavyavākyavadeva revatyadhikaraṇakāgniṣṭomastotrabhāvanottara- kālaviśiṣṭasya tasyaiva karmaṇaḥ prayogasya phale vidhānamityādyaḥ pakṣa  #
analyzed: atas vāyavya vākya vat eva revatī adhikaraṇaka agniṣṭoma stotra bhāvanā uttara kāla viśiṣṭasya tasya eva karmaṇaḥ prayogasya phale vidhānam iti ādyaḥ pakṣa
iti arthaḥ
nahi atra dadhi ādi rūpa guṇasya iva itpatti anvayi tvena utpatti antara āpādaka tva saṃbhavaḥ

original: kartṛkālādirūpasya prayogānvayitayā prayogaviśeṣaṇatvasya tvayāpi vaktavyatvāditi sūcayitumiṣyate cetyuktam //
analyzed: kartṛ kāla ādi rūpasya prayoga anvayi tayā prayoga viśeṣaṇa tvasya tvayā api vaktavya tvāt iti sūcayitum iṣyate ca iti uktam

original: (akḷptakāryakalpanābhiyā sāmāṅgatvena na revatyā vidhānaṃ kintu stotrāṅgatayetyupapādanam)
analyzed: akḷpta kārya kalpanā bhiyā sāma aṅga tvena na revatyāḥ vidhānam kintu stotra aṅga tayā iti upapādanam
tad anuvādena iti
agniṣṭoma stotra anuvādena iti arthaḥ
yadi api revatīnām sāma ādhāra tā eva agniṣṭoma sāma pada samabhivyāhārāt pratīyate
tathā api akḷpta kārya kalpanā āpatteḥ na sāma aṅga tvena revatī vidhiḥ

original: kintu pārṣṭhikānvayalabhyaṃ sāmasaṃbandhamanūdya viśeṣaṇapradhānamagniṣṭomaśabdaṃ aṅgīkṛtya stotrāṅgatayaiva mantravidhyuktiriti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: kintu pārṣṭhika anvaya labhyam sāma saṃbandham anūdya viśeṣaṇa pradhānam agniṣṭoma śabdam aṅgīkṛtya stotra aṅga tayā eva mantra vidhi uktiḥ iti bhāvaḥ

original: revatyākhyaguṇamātrasya vidhāne viliṅgaitacchabdena parāmarśayogāt tadviśiṣṭavāravantīyaguṇamāha --------- revatyadhikaraṇaketi //
analyzed: revatī ākhya guṇa mātrasya vidhāne viliṅgā etad śabdena parāmarśa yogāt tad viśiṣṭa vāravantīya guṇam āha revatī adhikaraṇaka iti
aprāpta tvāt iti
etat eva upapādayati vāravantīyam iti

original: (revatīvārayantīyayoḥ pārṣṭhikabodhena vaiśiṣṭye revatīviśiṣṭavāravantīyasya dhātvarthasyāpi akriyārūpasya yāgāśrayeṇa agniṣṭomastotrāśrayeṇa  #
analyzed: revatī vārayantīyayoḥ pārṣṭhika bodhena vaiśiṣṭye revatī viśiṣṭa vāravantīyasya dhātvarthasya api akriyā rūpasya yāga āśrayeṇa agniṣṭoma stotra āśrayeṇa
vā phala saṃbandhaḥ

original: atra cādye pakṣe etacchabdopapattāvapi nāgniṣṭomastotrasya revatyaṅgakasya phalasaṃbandhaḥ;
analyzed: atra ca ādye pakṣe etad śabda upapattau api na agniṣṭoma stotrasya revatī aṅgakasya phala saṃbandhaḥ
agniṣṭoma sāma padasya viśeṣaṇa pradhāna tve lakṣaṇa āpatteḥ
apitu revatī adhikaraṇaka vāravantīyasāmnaḥ eva
yadi api revatī vāravantīyayoḥ kāraka tvāt paraspara vaiśiṣṭya asaṃbhavaḥ

original: tathāpi kṛtvāśabdoktabhāvanāyāṃ prathamato dvayoranvayāṅgīkāreṇa pārṣṭhikabodhe revatīnāṃ
analyzed: tathā api kṛtvā śabda ukta bhāvanāyām prathamatas dvayoḥ anvaya aṅgīkāreṇa pārṣṭhika bodhe revatīnām

original: vāravantīyavaiśiṣṭye bādhakābhāvādrevatīṣu kṛtvā vāravantīyaṃ tena phalaṃ bhāvayedityarthe nānupapattiḥ /
analyzed: vāravantīya vaiśiṣṭye bādhaka abhāvāt revatīṣu kṛtvā vāravantīyam tena phalam bhāvayet iti arthe na anupapattiḥ
tasya ca svara samāhāra ātmakasya dhvani ādi śabda rūpatayā saubhara ādi vat siddha rūpatvena āśraya apekṣāyām prakṛta agniṣṭut yāgasya eva āśraya tva upapatteḥ yaja iti anuvādaḥ
na ca gāyati dhātu vācya tvāt sāmnaḥ kriyā rūpa tvam
vadana eka deśe ityādau gaṇḍa ādīnām dhātu vācya tve pi siddha rūpa tvena akriyā ātmaka tvāt

original: sāmaśabdasya sāmārthopāyaḥ kaścidgauṇaḥ svara iti śruteḥ ṣaḍjādisvarasamāhāravācitvāt
analyzed: sāma śabdasya sāma artha upāyaḥ kaścid gauṇaḥ svaraḥ iti śruteḥ ṣaḍja ādi svara samāhāra vāci tvāt
svara śabdasya mārutaḥ tu urasi caran mandram janayati svaram
ityādi saṅgīta śāstra paryālocanayā siddha rūpa vāravantīya saṃyoga vibhāga vibhāga janita dhvani ātmaka śabda viśeṣa vāci tva avagamena vāravantīya ādeḥ siddha tva avagateḥ ca
atas tasya āśraya apekṣāyām yuktam eva tasya āśraya tvam

original: śakyate hi sāmnāṛgakṣarābhivyaktidvārā stotramiva yāgaḥ sādhayitum /
analyzed: śakyate hi sāmnā āṛc akṣara abhivyakti dvārā stotram iva yāgaḥ sādhayitum

original: ataśca saubharasāmnaḥ stotrāśritatvamiva vāravantīyasyāpi yāgāśritatvaṃ tadīyayājyādimantrādhāratayoccaiṣṭvādivat na virudhyate /
analyzed: atas ca saubharasāmnaḥ stotra āśrita tvam iva vāravantīyasya api yāga āśrita tvam tadīya yājyā ādi mantra ādhāra tayā uccaiṣṭva ādi vat na virudhyate
ataeva revatīnām api yājyā ādi kārye niveśaḥ pi unneyaḥ
kāmyena ca vāravantīyena sāmānya vidhi prāptasya ekaśruti ādeḥ bādhe na kṣatiḥ
yadi tu agniṣṭoma sāma iti anuvāda anupa pattiḥ āśaṅkyeta
tadā agniṣṭoma stotrasya eva vāyavyā vākye viśiṣya upasthiteḥ tasya eva āśraya tvam
tasya ca agniṣṭut yāga saṃbandhi tvena prāpteḥ yaji ṣaṣṭhī anta etad śabda kṛtvā pratyayānām anuvāda tvam iti na kaścid doṣaḥ
revatyāḥ agniṣṭoma saṃbandhasya phala saṃbandhasya ca vidhāne bhāvanā upasarjana bhāvanā antara aṅgīkārāt a vākya bhedaḥ

original: dvitīye pakṣe yadyapi revatīnāmagniṣṭomastotramātravṛttitvaṃ mānyato labhyate,
analyzed: dvitīye pakṣe yadi api revatīnām agniṣṭoma stotra mātra vṛtti tvam mānyataḥ labhyate
yena tasya āśraya tvena prāptyā agniṣṭoma soma iti anuvādaḥ ucyeta
tathā api revatīnām agniṣṭoma stotra rūpa āśraya saṃbandhasya anena eva vidhānena na kā api kṣatiḥ
na ca vākya bhedaḥ

original: kṛtvāśabdoktabhāvanāyāṃ revatīṣvagniṣṭomastotraṃ prakṛtvetyevamanvayena tasyā uttarabhāvanāyāmanvayāṅgīkāreṇa tadaprasakteḥ /
analyzed: kṛtvā śabda ukta bhāvanāyām revatīṣu agniṣṭoma stotram prakṛtvā iti evam anvayena tasyāḥ uttara bhāvanāyām anvaya aṅgīkāreṇa tad aprasakteḥ

original: ataśca yathaiva siddhānte revatyādiviśiṣṭastotrabhāvanāviśiṣṭayāga- bhāvanāviśiṣṭaguṇabhāvanāvidhyaṅgīkāre 'pi na kṣatiriti bhāvaḥ //
analyzed: atas ca yathā eva siddhānte revatī ādi viśiṣṭa stotra bhāvanā viśiṣṭa yāga bhāvanā viśiṣṭa guṇa bhāvanā vidhi aṅgīkāre pi na kṣatiḥ iti bhāvaḥ

original: (prathamapūrvapakṣasya dvitīyapakṣopakrama eva dūṣitatvāddvitīyapakṣe stotradvārā yāgasya stotrasya vāśrayatvāsaṃbhavopapādanam)
analyzed: prathama pūrvapakṣasya dvitīya pakṣa upakrame eva dūṣita tvāt dvitīya pakṣe stotra dvārā yāgasya stotrasya vā āśraya tva asaṃbhava upapādanam

original: prathamapūrvapakṣasya dvitīyapakṣa eva dūṣitatvāt taddūṣaṇamupekṣya dvitīyaṃ pakṣaṃ prakaraṇādāśrayalābhopapādane kiṃ yāgasya sākṣādāśrayatvam?
analyzed: prathama pūrvapakṣasya dvitīya pakṣe eva dūṣita tvāt tad dūṣaṇam upekṣya dvitīyam pakṣam prakaraṇāt āśraya lābha upapādane kim yāgasya sākṣāt āśraya tvam

original: utāgniṣṭomastotradvārā veti vikalpāśayena dūṣayan siddhāntamāha -------- siddhāntasttviti //
analyzed: uta agniṣṭoma stotra dvārā vā iti vikalpa āśayena dūṣayan siddhāntam āha siddhāntaḥ ttu iti
āśraya tvam iti

original: agniṣṭomastotrasyādṛṣṭavidhayā yāgāṅgatvāt taddvārā yāgasyāśrayatvopapattirasaṃbhavaduktiketi tuśabdena sūcitam /
analyzed: agniṣṭoma stotrasya adṛṣṭa vidhayā yāga aṅga tvāt tad dvārā yāgasya āśraya tva upapattiḥ asaṃbhavat uktikā iti tuśabdena sūcitam
dṛṣṭa vidhayā hi kṛti sādhya dhātvartha saṃbandhi tvam guṇasya apekṣitam

original: adṛṣṭavidhayā hi tadāśrayaṇe guṇasyāśrayaṃ vināpi phalakaraṇatvasyādṛṣṭadvāropapatterā- śrayasyākāṅkṣāyā evābhāvaprasaṅgāt /
analyzed: adṛṣṭa vidhayā hi tad āśrayaṇe guṇasya āśrayam vinā api phala karaṇa tvasya adṛṣṭa dvāra upapatteḥ ā śrayasya ākāṅkṣāyāḥ eva abhāva prasaṅgāt

original: ataeva āśrayalakṣaṇe adṛṣṭādvārakasaṃbandhena guṇaviśeṣāvacchinnatvaṃ niveśitaṃ pūrvādhikaraṇe /
analyzed: ataeva āśraya lakṣaṇe adṛṣṭa a dvāraka saṃbandhena guṇa viśeṣa avacchinna tvam niveśitam pūrva adhikaraṇe
atas na tad dvāra āśraya tvam iti arthaḥ
dūṣaṇa antaram api āha agniṣṭoma stotrasya iti
revatīnām atideśika ṛga bādhaka tvam eva yuktam iti sarva stotra āśraya tva āpatti upapādanam
ātideśikā iti
aupadeśikī hi agniṣṭoma stotrasya upasthitiḥ vāyavya ṛc adhikaraṇa tvena iti revatībhiḥ aupadeśika vāyavya ābādha prasaṅga apekṣya atideśa prāpta sarva stotra āśraya tva aṅgīkāreṇa
tadīya atideśa prāpita ṛ g bādhasya nyāyya tvena sarva stotrāṇām eva āśraya tva āpattiḥ iti arthaḥ

original: naca ------- kāmyena nityabādho nyāyasiddha eveti -------- vācyam;
analyzed: naca kāmyena nitya bādhaḥ nyāya siddhaḥ eva iti vācyam

original: revatyadhikaraṇavāravantīyasāmno guṇatvapakṣe sāmnaḥ kāmyatve 'pi revatīnāṃ tadabhāvāt,
analyzed: revatī adhikaraṇa vāravantīyasāmnaḥ guṇa tva pakṣe sāmnaḥ kāmya tve pi revatīnām tad abhāvāt
revatīnām guṇa tva pakṣe yāvat tābhiḥ ātideśika ṛgbādhaḥ saṃbhavati
na tāvat aupadeśika vāyavya ābādhaḥ ucitaḥ iti bhāvaḥ
yat tu vārtike ātmanā hi akriyā rūpaiḥ guṇaiḥ āśrīyate kriyā
vāravantīya gīteḥ tu kriyāyāḥ kim prayojanam
ityādinā sāmnaḥ kriyā rūpa tvena āśraya ākāṅkṣā bhāvāt na guṇa phala saṃbandhaḥ iti uktam
tad prauḍhyā iti dūṣayitum anūdya dūṣayati na ca iti
vyākhyāta pūrvam etat
catuṣṭoma prakaraṇa gatasya vāravantīyam agniṣṭoma sāma kāryam iti vacanasya agniṣṭut prakaraṇa gata tva upapādanam
prākaraṇikena iti

original: yadyapīdaṃ vacanaṃ etadagniṣṭudyāgāt pūrvaṃ catuṣṭomāgniṣṭutprakaraṇe tāṇḍyabrāhmaṇe āmnātam,
analyzed: yadi api idam vacanam etat agniṣṭut yāgāt pūrvam catuṣṭoma agniṣṭut prakaraṇe tāṇḍya brāhmaṇe āmnātam
na etat agniṣṭut prakaraṇe
tathā api catuṣṭomasya nikāyi tvena uttara etat agniṣṭut prakṛti tvāt atideśa prāpta vacana atideśa tvena prākaraṇika vākyena iti uktam

original: ataeva “atha punarviśiṣṭe yāge upādīyamāne tadrevatīṣu vāravantīyaṃ sāma kathaṃ bhavatītyucyate”
analyzed: ataeva atha punar viśiṣṭe yāge upādīyamāne tat revatīṣu vāravantīyam sāma katham bhavati iti ucyate

original: ityāśaṅkottaraparaṃ vacanāditi bhāṣyamātideśikavacanaṃ draṣṭavyamiti vārtike vyākhyātam //
analyzed: iti āśaṅkā uttara param vacanāt iti bhāṣyam ātideśika vacanam draṣṭavyam iti vārtike vyākhyātam
gaurava bhiyā iti
para uddeśa pravṛtta kṛti kāraka tva rūpa aṅga tva apekṣayā karmatva rūpa āśraya tvasya laghu bhūta tvam iti arthaḥ
na ca asmin pakṣe ātideśika ṛk bādhā apekṣayā aupadeśika ṛk bādhā āpattiḥ dūṣaṇam

bhāvaḥ
evam āśraya lābha saṃbhavena revatī ādhāra vāravantīya guṇasya phale vidhānam iti prathama pakṣasya āśraya lābhāt asaṃbhavam

original: vastutastu ------- prākaraṇikasyāpyasya vākyasyātideśaprāptasyāpi catuṣṭomavāravantīyasāmno 'gniṣṭoma- stotrāṅgatvabodhakatvam ihacāśrayasaṃbandhabodhakatvamiti  #

iti api śabdena uktam

kṛpta prayojana tvāt iti

original: agniṣṭomastotrāśrayaviśiṣṭarevatīnāṃ phale vidhāne 'pyubhayorapi kārakatvādvaiśiṣṭyāsaṃbhava ityāha -------- āśrayasyeti //
analyzed: agniṣṭoma stotra āśraya viśiṣṭa revatīnām phale vidhāne pi ubhayoḥ api kāraka tvāt vaiśiṣṭya asaṃbhavaḥ iti āha āśrayasya iti

atas pariśeṣāt karma tvena

stotrasya eva iti

ktvā pratyaya iti

original: samānakartṛkayoḥ kriyayoḥ pūrvakālīnakriyāvācakadhātoḥ parato vihitasya ktvāpratyayasya kriyābhedābhāve 'nupapattirityarthaḥ //

revatī karaṇa yāga āśraya bhāvanā bodha upapattiḥ na ca iti

original: yadyapi revatīṣviti padamagniṣṭomastotrabhāvanānvayīti na revatīkaraṇakayāgāśrayakabhāvanābodhaḥ saṃbhavati;

tathā api etena iti etad śabdasya dākṣāyaṇa pada vat revatī guṇa parāmarśaka tva upapatteḥ revatī karaṇaka yāga āśrayaka bhāvanā bodha upapattiḥ iti āśayaḥ
laghu bhūta tvam eva upapādayati tathā hi iti
agniṣṭut yāga vikāra tvāt iti

original: trivṛdagniṣṭudagniṣṭomaḥ iti vākyavihitapūrvāgniṣṭutastatpūrvatana- catuṣṭomāgniṣṭudvikāratvāt tadatideśaparaṃparayā prāptatvādvāravantīyapadamanuvādaḥ

original: yadyapi cāgniṣṭomastotrasya vāravantīyasya cātideśāt prāptau taduddeśena vidhāne vaiśiṣṭyāsaṃbhavāt vākyabhedaḥ prāpnoti;
analyzed: yadi api ca agniṣṭoma stotrasya vāravantīyasya ca atideśāt prāptau tad uddeśena vidhāne vaiśiṣṭya asaṃbhavāt vākya bhedaḥ prāpnoti

original: tathāpi vaiśiṣṭyasaṃpattaye “viśiṣṭavidhisandaṣṭaṃ prāptaṃ yacca vidhīyate” iti viśiṣṭavidhisandaṣṭanyāyenātideśapravṛtteḥ
analyzed: tathā api vaiśiṣṭya saṃpattaye viśiṣṭa vidhi sandaṣṭam prāptam yat ca vidhīyate iti viśiṣṭa vidhi sandaṣṭa nyāyena atideśa pravṛtteḥ

original: pūrvapravṛttyaṅgīkāreṇa vā vāyavyāvākya iva vidhāne 'pi prāptatvādanūdyata ityuktam //

original: nanu -------- ṣaṣṭhyantaitacchabdabalāt karmāntarasyāpyasya pūrvakarmāṅgatvapratīteḥ kathaṃ phaloddeśena vidhānamityata āha -------- ṣaṣṭhyantaitaditi

etad padasya api uddeśya samarpaka tve uddeśya anekatva prayukta vākya bheda āpattiḥ

yadi api pūrva parāmarśi tvam sarvanāmnām
tathā api atha eṣa jyotiḥ ityādi vākya gata etad śabdasya prastoṣyamāṇa karma vacana tvasya api
dṛṣṭa tvāt sarvanāmnām pūrva parāmarśi tva tyāgena prastuta prastoṣyamāṇa sādhāraṇyena
sannihita mātra vācita aṅgīkārāt iha āpitasya na virodhaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: (aveṣṭau prayogānvayikartṛvidhāna eva tātparyādyathā prayogabhedamātraṃ tathā prakṛte tādṛśakālavidhānāttadeveti śaṅkā)

analyzed: pṛthak prayogāḥ pañca iṣṭīḥ āmnāya yadi brāhmaṇaḥ yajeta ityādi śrutaiḥ vākyaiḥ brāhmaṇa kartṛ tvasya

yadi agniṣṭoma stotra bhāvanā prāpta tvāt na vidhīyeta

original: tadāvidheyakriyāviśeṣaṇatvena revatīnāṃ vidhānāyogāt śrutena yajetetyanena vidhinā vidheyatveca pūrvokto vākyabhedaḥ /
analyzed: tadā avidheya kriyā viśeṣaṇa tvena revatīnām vidhāna ayogāt śrutena yajeta iti anena vidhinā pūrva uktaḥ vākya bhedaḥ

original: atastasyāḥ prāptāyā api vidhāne sati tasyā uttarakālatvasaṃbandhenottarabhāvanānvayena

stotra mātra bhedaka tva śaṅkā nirāsaḥ ca

original: tathātve phaloddeśena yāgaviniyogavat prayogāntarasyāpi avaśyavidheyatvāpatterlāghavena karmamātrabhedakatvasyaiva yuktatvādityarthaḥ //

original: prayojanaṃ pūrvapakṣe pūrvāgniṣṭutyeva kāmyaguṇānuṣṭhānāt siddhānteca nikāyināṃ ca

spaṣṭam iti na uktam

a pā saubhare
