original: svargakāmaḥ sa saubhareṇa stuvīta “ityetairvākyairuktastotrāśritaṃ saubharaṃ sāma
analyzed: svarga kāmaḥ sa saubhareṇa stuvīta iti etaiḥ vākyaiḥ ukta stotra āśritam saubharam sāma

original: saubhare ca śākhābhedena nidhanākhyāntimasāmāvayavādhāratayā hīṣ ū ūrk ityādīnyakṣarāṇyāmnātāni /
analyzed: saubhare ca śākhā bhedena nidhana ākhya antima sāma avayava ādhāra tayā hi iṣ ū ūrj ityādīni akṣarāṇi āmnātāni

original: tadevaṃ saubharaṃ prakṛtya “hīṣiti vṛṣṭikāmāya nidhanaṃ kuryāt,
analyzed: tat evam saubharam prakṛtya hi iṣ iti vṛṣṭi kāmāya nidhanam kuryāt

original: tatra vṛṣṭikāmādiśabdānāṃ phalaparatvāttaduddeśenaiva hīṣādayo guṇā vidhīyante /

original: nidhanādhāratayā hīṣādipāṭhasyaiva niyāmakatvādbhāgāntare stobhādyakṣarāntarabādhāpatteśca na nidhanātiriktabhāgasyāśrayatvāpattiḥ /
analyzed: nidhana ādhāra tayā hi iṣ ādi pāṭhasya eva niyāmaka tvāt bhāga antare stobha ādi akṣara antara bādha āpatteḥ ca na nidhana atirikta bhāgasya āśraya tva āpattiḥ

original: naca lāghavādvṛṣṭisādhanasaubharīyanidhane '- niyamena prāptānāṃ hīṣādīnāṃ niyamamātrakaraṇādvyavasthārthatvaṃ śaṅkyam;
analyzed: na ca lāghavāt vṛṣṭi sādhana saubharīya nidhane niyamena prāptānām hi iṣa ādīnām niyama mātra karaṇāt vyavasthā artha tvam śaṅkyam
tasya ca nidhana viśeṣaṇa tve viśiṣṭa uddeśa āpatteḥ ca
atas saubhara phalāt phala antara arthāni hi iṣa ādīni iti prāpte niyama vidhi lāghava anurodhāt vṛṣṭi kāma ādi padaiḥ vṛṣṭi sādhana saubhara lakṣaṇām aṅgīkṛtya api
hīṣā ādi niyama vidhi rā iva āśrīyate
pakṣa prāptiḥ ca pāṭhāt nidhana sthāne eva iti niyamasya api tad sthānaka tva lābhaḥ

original: vastutastu ------- niyamavidhilāghavānurodhena hīṣādervṛṣṭyādyarthataiva svasādhanasaubharādhāratvasaṃbandhenāśrīyata iti na lakṣaṇāpi /
analyzed: vastutas tu niyama vidhi lāghava anurodhena hi iṣa ādeḥ vṛṣṭi ādi arthatā eva sva sādhana saubhara ādhāratva saṃbandhena āśrīyate iti na lakṣaṇā api
saṃbandha ghaṭakībhūtam ca saubharam na saubhara tva avacchinnam
api tu saubhara viśeṣaḥ eva

original: śākhābhedena hi kvacidvijātīyāni saubharāṇi nidhanāntarayuktāni samāmnātāni /
analyzed: śākhā bhedena hi kvacid vijātīyāni saubharāṇi nidhana antara yuktāni samāmnātāni

original: tatraca hīṣaḥ pakṣe 'pyaprāptatvānna tasya saubharasya saṃbandhaghaṭakatvam,
analyzed: tatra ca hi iṣaḥ pakṣe pi aprāpta tvāt na tasya saubharasya saṃbandha ghaṭaka tvam
apitu yad jātīya saubharehīṣa ādīni aniyamena samāmnātāni tad jātīyasya eva tat
atas ca vṛṣṭi artham nirukta saṃbandhena hi iṣā iva iti niyama karaṇāt saṃbandha ghaṭakībhūta saubhare nidhana antara vyāvṛtti vat vijātīya saubhara antarasya api
atas ca tat nitya prayoga viṣayam eva saṃpadyate iti vivekaḥ
iti trayodaśam saubhara adhikaraṇam

original: iti śrīkhaṇḍadevaviracitāyāṃ bhāṭṭadīpikāyāṃ dvitīyādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ //
analyzed: iti śrīkhaṇḍadeva viracitāyām bhāṭṭa dīpikāyām dvitīya adhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ
tāṇḍya brāhmaṇe ṣoḍaśi saṃsthā avāntara prakaraṇe saubharam ukthyānām brahma sāma bhavatī
ti anena ṣoḍaśī apūrva sādhanībhūta brahmasāma stotra uddeśena samāmnāya avagatam saubharam nitya tayā vihitam
tathā eva atirātra saṃsthā avāntara prakaraṇe yadi bṛhat sāma atirātraḥ syāt

original: tathā yadi rathantaraṃ sāma saubharamukthyeṣu kuryādi“ti vacanābhyāṃ krameṇa ukthyatrayoddeśena naimittikatayāpi vihitam /
analyzed: tathā yadi rathantaram sāma saubharam ukthyeṣu kuryāt iti vacanābhyām krameṇa ukthya traya uddeśena naimittika tayā api vihitam

original: evaṃ samāmnāne 'pi nityavidhisannidhau paṭhitam yat tasyaiva kāmārthatvena viniyojakavākyamātraṃ prastutādhikaraṇavicāropayuktamityudāharati--------  #
analyzed: evam samāmnāne nitya vidhi sannidhau paṭhitam yat tasya eva kāma artha tvena viniyojaka vākya mātram prastuta adhikaraṇa vicāra upayuktam iti udāharati
brahma sāma ākhyam iti
saubhara sāmnaḥ ca ṣaḍja ādi svara samūha ātmaka dhvani ādi śabda ātmaka tvena siddha rūpa tvasya

original: pūrvādhikaraṇe sādhitatvāttasya phalasaṃbandhe āśrayāpekṣāyāṃ prakaraṇāt brahmasāmastotrasya
analyzed: pūrva adhikaraṇe sādhita tvāt tasya phala saṃbandhe āśraya apekṣāyām prakaraṇāt brahma sāma stotrasya
āśraya tvam iti bodhayitum āśritam iti uktam

original: tataśca saubharasyāpi kratvarthatayā prāptatvādubhayordhātvarthopapadārthayoḥ prāptāvaindravāyavāgrānitivat dhātvarthasyaiva vidhānaṃ yadyapi
analyzed: tatas ca saubharasya api kratu artha tayā prāpta tvāt ubhayoḥ dhātvartha upapadārthayoḥ prāptau aindra vāyava agrān iti vat dhātvarthasya eva vidhānam yadi api

original: tathāpi stotrasyaiva phalasaṃbandhe tasya bahiḥkratuprayogāpattestatra saubharasyāprāptasyāpi vidhāne viśiṣṭavidhigauravāpattyā na tadāśrayaṇamiti  #
analyzed: tathā api stotrasya eva phala saṃbandhe tasya bahis kratu prayoga āpatteḥ tatra saubharasya aprāptasya api vidhāne viśiṣṭa vidhi gaurava āpattyā na tad āśrayaṇam iti
bhāvaḥ
etena saubharasya gīti rūpa kriyā vāci tvāt vāravantīya vat āśraya anapekṣaṇāt stuvīta iti anuvāda anupapattim āśaṅkya
stuvīta iti anena ekavākyatvāt tad anuvāda anyathā anupapattyā eva tṛtīyā anta saubhara padena
saubhara viśiṣṭa karaṇatvasya eva karaṇatā saṃbandhena vidhānāt tasya nirūpaka apekṣāyām āśraya tvena
stotrasya anvayāt tad anuvāda upapattiḥ

original: vāravantīyasyatu dvitīyāntatvena karaṇatvābhāvāt kṛtvāśabdārthaṃ prati karmatvānnāśrayāpekṣeti yat śāstradīpikāyāṃ prayāsakaraṇaṃ tat ---------
analyzed: vāravantīyasya tu dvitīyā anta tvena karaṇa tva abhāvāt kṛtvā śabda artham prati karma tvāt na āśraya apekṣā iti yat śāstradīpikāyām prayāsa karaṇam tat
vāravantīyasya api etena iti tṛtīyā antena parāmarśāt karaṇa tva upapatteḥ vaiṣamye pramāṇa abhāvāt ca
iti etaiḥ vākyaiḥ iti yat uktam tasya upapattim āha uddeśya anekatvena iti

original: yo vṛṣṭikāma ityevaṃ yacchabdatrayasya tacchabdatrayasāpekṣatvāt sa saubhareṇa stuvītetyevamanuṣaṅgeṇa pratyekānvayāt bhinnavākyataiveṣṭetyarthaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ vṛṣṭi kāmaḥ iti evam yad śabda trayasya tad śabda traya sāpekṣa tvāt sa saubhareṇa stuvīta iti evam anuṣaṅgeṇa pratyeka anvayāt bhinna vākyatā eva iṣṭā iti arthaḥ
nidhana ākhyā iti
sāmnaḥ hi prastāva udgītha pratīhāra upadrava nidhana ākhyāḥ pañca bhaktayaḥ
teṣu yad nidhana ākhyaḥ ntimaḥ sāma avayavaḥ tad ādhāra tayā iti arthaḥ
bhāvanā bhedasya prāsaṃgika tvāt apavādāt ca saṃgati dvaya nirūpaṇam saṃśaya ākāra nirdeśaḥ ca

original: tatra saṅkhyāvat guṇasyāpi sākṣāt bhāvanābhedakatvāyogādiha guṇaprakaraṇe dhātvarthabhedābhedayoḥ
analyzed: tatra saṅkhyā vat guṇasya api sākṣāt bhāvanā bhedaka tva ayogāt iha guṇa prakaraṇe dhātvartha bheda abhedayoḥ
vicārya tvāt atra ca ubhayathā api dhātvartha bhedāt prakaraṇa asaṅgatau api indriya kāma adhikaraṇāt prabhṛti
prāsaṅgika bhāvanā bhedasya api vicārya tvāt tad saṅgatim tathā indriya kāma adhikaraṇa revatī adhikaraṇayoḥ
dvayoḥ api apavādāt āpavādikīm anantara saṅgatim tathā kim hi iṣ ādi stobha akṣarāṇi prakṛta saubhara āśritāni
vṛṣṭi ādi artha tvena vidhīyante

original: uta vṛṣṭyādyarthaṃ saubhara evāniyamena prāptāni niyamyanta iti saṃśayañca spaṣṭatvādapradarśya pūrvapakṣamevāha -------- tatreti //
analyzed: uta vṛṣṭi ādi artham saubhare eva aniyamena prāptāni niyamyante iti saṃśayam ca spaṣṭa tvāt a pradarśya pūrvapakṣam eva āha tatra iti
svatas eva sādhya saubhara āśraya hīṣā ādi vidhiḥ iti pūrvapakṣaḥ
phala paratvāt iti
svarga kāma adhikaraṇa nyāyena lakṣaṇayā phala paratvāt iti arthaḥ
tad uddeśena eva iti

original: tādarthyacaturthyā hīṣādīnāṃ śeṣatvāparaparyāyatādarthyasya vṛṣṭyādīnāṃ śeṣitvāparaparyāyoddeśyatvasyaca pratītistaduddeśena vidhāne hetutvenaivakāreṇa  #
analyzed: tādarthya caturthyā hi iṣa ādīnām śeṣatva apara paryāya tādarthyasya vṛṣṭi ādīnām śeṣi tva apara paryāya uddeśya tvasya ca pratītiḥ tad uddeśena vidhāne hetu tvena evakāreṇa
sūcitā
naesaubharam ca iti

original: hīṣādyakṣarāṇi tāvatsiddharūpāṇi sāmabhāgaparipūrakatvena yogyatvāt prakṛtaṃ saubharākhyaṃ sāmaivāśrayatvena gṛhṇanti /
analyzed: hīṣā ādi akṣarāṇi tāvat siddha rūpāṇi sāma bhāga paripūraka tvena yogya tvāt prakṛtam saubhara ākhyam sāma eva āśraya tvena gṛhṇanti

original: yuktaṃhi tasya svāvayavadvārā stobhādhāratvāt dṛṣṭavidhayā hīṣādisaṃbandhitvamiti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: yuktam hi tasya sva avayava dvārā stobha ādhāra tvāt dṛṣṭa vidhayā hi iṣa ādi saṃbandhi tvam iti bhāvaḥ
sāmnaḥ sva avayava dvārā stobha akṣara sādhya tvāt āśraya tvam iti arthaḥ
sāmnaḥ siddha rūpa tvena sādhya tva abhāvāt āśraya tva anupapattim parihartum yūpa ādi vat iti uktam

original: tataścotpādanakriyāviṣṭatvena yūpe khadirāśrayatvasyevoccāraṇakriyāviṣṭatvena kṛtisādhyatvāt dhvanyātmakaśabdasya nityatānaṅgīkārācca tasyāpyāśrayatvasyopapattiriti  #
analyzed: tatas ca utpādana kriyā viṣṭa tvena yūpe khadira āśraya tvasya iva uccāraṇa kriyā viṣṭa tvena kṛti sādhya tvāt dhvanya ātmaka śabdasya nitya tā anaṅgīkārāt ca tasya api āśraya tvasya upapattiḥ iti
bhāvaḥ
nidhana pada anuvāda tvena hi iṣ ādeḥ nidhana sthānaka tvasya api vidhāna śaṅkā nirāsaḥ

original: nanu hīṣādernidhanasthānakatvasya phalasaṃbandhasya ca vidhāne vākyabhedāpattirityata āha ------ nidhanādhāratayeti //
analyzed: nanu hi iṣ ādeḥ nidhana sthānaka tvasya phala saṃbandhasya ca vidhāne vākya bheda āpattiḥ iti atas āha nidhana ādhāra tayā iti
atas ca nidhana padasya anuvāda tvena vidheya samarpaka tva abhāvāt na tad āpattiḥ iti arthaḥ
siddhānta abhimata niyama vidhi tva asaṃbhavena apūrva vidhi tvam eva yuktam iti nirūpaṇena parihāraḥ

original: yattu siddhānte ------- pūrvapakṣe 'pūrvavidhitvāpatterniyamavidhitvalābhāya na guṇaphalasaṃbandha ityucyate,
analyzed: yat tu siddhānte pūrvapakṣe pūrva vidhi tva āpatteḥ niyama vidhi tva lābhāya na guṇa phala saṃbandhaḥ iti ucyate
tat anuvadati na ca iti
kiṃnidhana padam uddeśya samarpakam uta vṛṣṭi kāma padam vā

original: nādyaḥ; tasya pāṭhata eva prāptisaṃbhavena vaiyarthyāt,
analyzed: na ādyaḥ tasya pāṭhataḥ eva prāpti saṃbhavena vaiyarthyāt
vṛṣṭi kāma pade saubhara lakṣaṇa āpattiḥ ca
atas eva na dvitīyaḥ
vṛṣṭi ādi sādhana saubhara vṛtti nidhana uddeśena api hi īṣā ādeḥ pāṭhataḥ prāpta tvena vidhāna asaṃbhavāt ca

original: yaditu vṛṣṭyādisādhane saubhara iva tadasādhanasaubharanidhane 'pi kadāciddhīṣādeḥ prāptisaṃbhavāt tadvyāvṛttiphalako niyamavidhirityucyate,
analyzed: yadi tu vṛṣṭi ādi sādhane saubhare iva tad asādhana saubhara nidhane pi kadācid hīṣā ādeḥ prāpti saṃbhavāt tad vyāvṛtti phalakaḥ niyama vidhiḥ iti ucyate
tadā nitya naimittika saubhara prayoga nidhana ādhāra stobha akṣara abhāvena sāpekṣa tva āpattiḥ

original: ato laghubhūtasyāpi niyamavidherasaṃbhava ityabhipretya dūṣayati --------- tathātva iti //
analyzed: atas laghu bhūtasya api niyama vidheḥ asaṃbhavaḥ iti abhipretya dūṣayati tathātve iti

original: ataḥ saubharasya hīṣādinidhanasyaca phalabhūte dve vṛṣṭī tadubhayamelanānmahatī vṛṣṭiriti pūrvapakṣe prayojanaṃ darśayan tamupasaṃharati --------  #
analyzed: atas saubharasya hi iṣ ādi nidhanasya ca phala bhūte dve vṛṣṭī tad ubhaya melanāt mahatī vṛṣṭiḥ iti pūrvapakṣe prayojanam darśayan tam upasaṃharati
atas iti
āśraya lābhena guṇa vidhi tve pi niyama vidhi lāghava anusāreṇa vyavasthāpaka tvam eva yuktam iti upapādanam
prācīnaiḥ āśraya alābhāt guṇa phala saṃbandha vidhānasya dūṣitasya api pūrva ukta rītyā āśraya lābha saṃbhavena ayukta tām
tat dūṣaṇasya matvā niyama vidhi lāghava mātreṇa eva siddhāntam āha niyama vidhi iti
niyama vidhi lāghavena anyatra iva lakṣaṇa āśrayaṇam api na doṣāya ityādi vivecanam

original: phalatrayārthamapi saubharaṃ yogasiddhyadhikaraṇanyāyenaikasmin prayoge sakṛduccaritamekameva phalaṃ sādhayati,
analyzed: phala traya artham api saubharam yoga siddhi adhikaraṇa nyāyena ekasmin prayoge sakṛt uccaritam ekam eva phalam sādhayati

original: netarat; saubharāṅgatvenaikārthatvāt trīṇyapi tāni vikalpena prāpyeran /
analyzed: na itarat saubhara aṅga tvena ekārtha tvāt trīṇi api tāni vikalpena prāpyeran

original: tataśca vṛṣṭiphalārthe saubharaprayoge yathā hīṣaḥ prāptiḥ,
analyzed: tatas ca vṛṣṭi phala arthe saubhara prayoge yathā hi iṣaḥ prāptiḥ

original: tathānyānyapi vikalpena prāpyeranniti hīṣaḥ pakṣe prāptasya yukto niyamaḥ /
analyzed: tathā anyāni api vikalpena prāpyeran iti hi iṣaḥ pakṣe prāptasya yuktaḥ niyamaḥ

original: so 'pica vidheyahīṣādigataphalasaṃbhave uddeśyagatatvena tatphalāṅgīkārasyānyāyyatvāt śeṣaniyama eva //
analyzed: vidheya hīṣā ādi gata phala saṃbhave uddeśya gata tvena tad phala aṅgīkārasya anyāyya tvāt śeṣa niyamaḥ eva

original: pratyakṣasyāpi pāṭhasya vidhikalpanayā sāmānyamukhenaca vṛṣṭikāmaprayogamupārūḍhasya mantharapravṛttikatayā tataḥ pūrvapravṛttyaṅgīkāreṇātra  #
analyzed: pratyakṣasya api pāṭhasya vidhi kalpanayā sāmānya mukhena ca vṛṣṭi kāma prayogam upārūḍhasya manthara pravṛttika tayā tatas pūrva pravṛtti aṅgīkāreṇa atra
hi iṣe eva vidheya tvāt

original: ataśca tadgatasyaiva niyamasya phalatvāt śeṣiniyamābhāvena nityanaimittikasaubharīyaprayoge hīṣādiprāptyavighāta iti hīṣādiniyamavidhirevetyevakāreṇa  #
analyzed: atas ca tad gatasya eva niyamasya phala tvāt śeṣi niyama abhāvena nitya naimittika saubharīya prayoge hīṣā ādi prāpti avighātaḥ iti hīṣā ādi niyama vidhiḥ evā iti evakāreṇa
sūcitam
niyama vidhi lāghava anurodhena vārtraghnī paurṇamāsī pade paurṇamāsī pradhāna saṃbandhi ājyabhāga lakṣaṇāyāḥ

original: prayājaśeṣavākye vibhaktyorlakṣaṇāyāścāṅgīkārāt ihāpi tasyā aduṣṭatvamapinā sūcitam //
analyzed: prayāja śeṣa vākye vibhaktyoḥ lakṣaṇāyāḥ ca aṅgīkārāt iha api tasyāḥ aduṣṭa tvam apinā sūcitam
pāṭhāt iti

original: yadi tu pāṭhasya nidhanākhyadvārasaṃbandhena kṛtārthatvānna nityanaimittikaprayoge śrutikalpakatvamiti tatprayoge hīṣādyaprāptistadavasthetyucyeta,
analyzed: yadi tu pāṭhasya nidhana ākhya dvāra saṃbandhena kṛtārtha tvāt na nitya naimittika prayoge śruti kalpaka tvam iti tad prayoge hi iṣa ādi aprāptiḥ tad avasthā iti ucyeta
tadā vṛṣṭi sādhana saubhara mātra lakṣaṇāyām api laghu bhūta niyama phalaka tva lābhāya eva nidhana sthānaka tva lābhaḥ

original: etadvidhyabhāvehi pāṭhena nidhana evāniyamena hīṣādi prāpyeta //
analyzed: etad vidhi abhāve hi pāṭhena nidhane eva aniyamena hi iṣ ādi prāpyeta
tatas ca vidhi phala sāmarthyāt eva nidhana sthānaka tva lābhaḥ
na tu pāṭhāt

original: ataeva niyamāpekṣitapākṣikatvasiddhyarthaṃ kalpitāpi śrutiḥ sāmānyato yatkiñcitprayogavṛttisaubharīyanidhanasaṃbandhitayaiva kalpyata iti yuktam
analyzed: ataeva niyama apekṣita pākṣika tva siddhi artham kalpitā api śrutiḥ sāmānyatas yat kiñcid prayoga vṛtti saubharīya nidhana saṃbandhi tayā eva kalpyate iti yuktam

original: tayā hīṣādernityanaimittikaprayogaviṣayatvaṃ vṛṣṭyarthasaubhareca nidhanasthānakatvamiti kaustubhe draṣṭavyam //
analyzed: tayā hi iṣ ādeḥ nitya naimittika prayoga viṣaya tvam vṛṣṭi artha saubhare ca nidhana sthānaka tvam iti kaustubhe draṣṭavyam
lakṣaṇām vinā eva pūrva ukta artha sādhanam

original: yathaiva vāsiṣṭhānāṃ nārāśaṃso dvitīyaḥ prayāja ityatra vāsiṣṭhābhilaṣitaphalajanakadarśapūrṇamāsāṅgadvitīya- prayājadvārā vāsiṣṭhārthatvena
analyzed: yathā eva vāsiṣṭhānām nārāśaṃsaḥ dvitīyaḥ prayājaḥ iti atra vāsiṣṭha abhilaṣita phala janaka darśa pūrṇamāsa aṅga dvitīya prayāja dvārā vāsiṣṭha artha tvena

original: tadvadihāpi paraṃparāsaṃbandhena vṛṣṭyarthahīṣādiniyamavidhyupapatterna lakṣaṇāpīti pakṣāntaramāha --------- vastutastviti //
analyzed: tadvat iha api paraṃparā saṃbandhena vṛṣṭi artha hīṣā ādi niyama vidhi upapatteḥ na lakṣaṇā api iti pakṣa antaram āha vastutas tu iti
saubhara viśeṣaḥ eva iti
hīṣādi nidhana ghaṭita saubhara viśeṣaḥ eva iti arthaḥ
atas ca iti

original: vṛṣṭau hīṣeva vijātīyasaubharadvārā kuryāditi niyamavidhyarthe phalite vṛṣṭyarthasaubharavidhāvapi
analyzed: vṛṣṭau hi iṣā iva vijātīya saubhara dvārā kuryāt iti niyama vidhi arthe phalite vṛṣṭi artha saubhara vidhau api

original: vṛṣṭyarthaṃ vijātīyānāṃ saubharāṇāṃ vikalpena prāptānāṃ hīṣnidhanakasyaiva saubharaviśeṣasya
analyzed: vṛṣṭi artham vijātīyānām saubharāṇām vikalpena prāptānām hīṣ nidhanakasya eva saubhara viśeṣasya
vṛṣṭi sādhana tā na anyeṣām iti api niyama antaram phalitam bhavati

original: nahi bhinnanidhanakasaubharasya vṛṣṭyādyarthatvena tādṛśaniyamāntarābhāve vṛṣṭau hīṣeveti niyamaḥ kathamapi saṃpādayituṃ śakyate /
analyzed: nahi bhinna nidhanaka saubharasya vṛṣṭi ādi artha tvena tādṛśa niyama antara abhāve vṛṣṭau hi iṣā iva iti niyamaḥ katham api saṃpādayitum śakyate
nidhana antara yuktasya api saubharasya tad artham kriyamāṇa tvāt
kāṃsyabhojinyāya svarūpam
tena prakṛta artha nirṇayaḥ
pūrva uttara kalpa prayojanam ca

original: ataśca yathaiva śiṣyācāryayoḥ saha bhojanaprāptau śiṣyasya kāṃsyabhojitvaniyamamaniyatapātrabhojyā- cāryo 'nurundhāno loke dṛśyata iti dvādaśādhikaraṇe  #
analyzed: atas ca yathā eva śiṣya ācāryayoḥ saha bhojana prāptau śiṣyasya kāṃsya bhoji tva niyamam aniyata pātra bhojyā ā cāryaḥ nurundhānaḥ loke dṛśyate iti dvādaśa adhikaraṇe
kāṃsyabhojinyāye vakṣyate

original: tena nyāyena vṛṣṭyarthasaubharavidhiraniyatasaubharagrāhyopi dvitīyaniyamamanurundhāno hīṣādinidhanaghaṭitasaubharaviśeṣameva gṛhṇātīti siddhaṃ  #
analyzed: tena nyāyena vṛṣṭi artha saubhara vidhiḥ aniyata saubhara grāhyaḥ api dvitīya niyamam anurundhānaḥ hīṣā ādi nidhana ghaṭita saubhara viśeṣam eva gṛhṇāti iti siddham
niyama antaram iti arthaḥ

original: kva tarhi śākhāntarasthasaubharasya niveśa ityapekṣāyāmāha ---------- ataśceti //
analyzed: kva tarhi śākhā antara stha saubharasya niveśaḥ iti apekṣāyām āha atas ca iti

original: siddhānte saubharaphalāt vṛṣṭyādernātiriktaṃ vṛṣṭyādiphalaṃ hīṣādibhya iti prayojanaṃ vyatirekata eva jñātuṃ śakyamiti noktam //
analyzed: siddhānte saubhara phalāt vṛṣṭi ādeḥ na atiriktam vṛṣṭi ādi phalam hi īṣā ādibhyaḥ iti prayojanam vyatirekataḥ eva jñātum śakyam iti na uktam
iti trayodaśam saubhara adhikaraṇam

original: iti kavimaṇḍana - khaṇḍadevaśiṣya - śaṃbhubhaṭṭaviracitāyāṃ bhāṭṭadīpikāvyākhyāyāṃ prabhāvalyāṃ dvitīyādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ //. //
analyzed: iti kavi maṇḍana khaṇḍadeva śiṣya śaṃbhu bhaṭṭa viracitāyām bhāṭṭa dīpikā vyākhyāyām prabhāvalyām dvitīya adhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ
